story:
AQUABOT: mist, stream and shower.

 

AQUABOT with TUBE: mist, stream and shower.

 

Aquabot is a high pressure hydration spray bottle that combines hydration with a continuous spray for cooling and cleaning in a fun easy-to-use design. You can clean off, cool off, hydrate and have fun with mist, shower and stream patterns. You simply pump to charge it, select your spray pattern and press the trigger.  

Aquabot makes your water more versatile and efficient. Think of it as portable running water for your pocket. You can use it for hundreds of applications. Best of all, you are just carrying your water bottle.  

Tube is a new accessory that combines our technology with a hydration bladder to make water amazingly functional and convenient. If you have ever used a hydration bladder and hoped for a better solution, this is it.  

Tube increases the functionality of the already amazing Aquabot by a factor of 3. Tube allows you to keep your bottle in your backpack, golf bag, baby stroller and cup holder. You still get all 3 spray patterns. It also has a magnet so you can snap it on and off for convenient access.  

Insulation Suit is a stylish high quality neoprene bottle sleeve that protects and keeps your water colder or warmer longer. They also have a convenient durable finger loop. 

 

Aquabot  

  • No backwash ever. 
  • You can use it upside down. 
  • It has a variable flow trigger. 
  • You can select between stealth and pulse modes. Stealth mode is ideal for drinking and misting and makes the pressure last longer. Pulse mode shoots a little harder, pulses, makes a cool sound and uses less water. 
  • Multiple attachment points so you can attach lanyards and carabiners.  
  • Spare parts are available for less than a dollar. 
  • It’s BPA free. 
  • No batteries.

Aquabot with Tube benefits vs a hydration bladder

  • Aquabot is a bottle and can stand on its own like any water bottle. Hydration bladders do not naturally hold their form and need to be used with a backpack. 
  • You can easily swap the tube on and off depending on your needs which means you have the best water bottle and hydration bladder at all times. 
  • Cleaning and drying bladders are a pain. Rinsing out a bottle is not. 
  • You can spray soapy water through the tube to clean it out. Not an option for a bladder. 
  • Aquabot requires no sucking. Drinking from a bladder requires you to suck. 
  • Aquabots are useful for hydration, cooling, cleaning and having fun. Aquabots cost about the same as bladders which are just for hydration.

 

Spray it, don't say it.

Sprays through masks.

Clean up after playing in the ocean or at the beach.

Keep your pooch cool and hydrated.

Water pick for braces.

Doubles as water gun or water balloon filler.

Hello bellows. Stoke your fire without getting smoke in your eyes.

 

 

 

 

 

                                                                  750ml Aquabot

 

                                              750mL Aquabot with Insulation Suit

                                                              750mL Aquabot with TUBE

 

I was in Alaska on the Kenai Peninsula with my dad, brother and cousin. We stopped at a small outfitter to buy our fishing licenses and tackle. We asked the salesperson for some recommendations on fishing spots. He says, “The river will be so crowded you won’t have any fun. What you should do is go up to Lost Lake and fish for rainbow trout. You’ll have it all to yourself and it’s loaded with fish.” In hindsight, we should have recognized the advice for what it was, great for him for us to be out the way.  

We had gear for car camping, but we weren’t really prepared for remote backpacking. But the help hooked us and sold an extra trail map too. 

Before hitting the trail we stopped and picked up the required rations; bacon, scotch, eggs, scotch, coffee, scotch and cream. Real cream. That meant we lugged a cooler with ice strapped to cousin Joe’s backpack. Those cheap soft coolers leak by the way. No biggie. It’s only a 6 mile hike. It was closer to 10...uphill.  

The scenery was amazing and at some point we were the only ones on the trail. Probably because we were packing bacon bear bait and no defense except a plastic rod case. But we all knew the secret if a bear comes. Just needed to be faster than the slowest guy.  

We finally reached the lake and sure enough, it was majestic and we had it all to ourselves...except when a float plane landed 20 minutes after we had arrived. An hour later the plain departed. Seemed odd to all of us...until a storm rolled in with fog so thick you could only see a few feet. It was pretty awesome.  

We made the decision to boil water even though the water was probably safe for drinking. It’s rarely worth the risk of getting sick from a parasite or virus. So not only did we not have running water, we had to boil it. It’s about this time that I was thinking something needs to work better. Water bottles are good for drinking, but they are not efficient for cleaning up dishes or your body. That meant we were spending too much time and fuel boiling water. I knew that pressurized water could be more efficient. Not wanting to carry another piece of gear on trips, I came up with the idea to pressurize my water bottle.  

In case you’re wondering, we caught one trout between the 4 of us.

We started designing Tube, an accessory that allows Aquabots to replace hydration bladders, in 2015. The initial design and functionality unfolded spectacularly fast. We had 85% of the final design within 2 months. It seems simple enough when you look at the final version, but that’s a hallmark of great design.  

There were multiple times when I thought it was done and then I would lay awake at night knowing it wasn’t going to live up to Lunatec’s expectations. You see, there were three little problems that kept nagging me and our solutions to the problems created new ones, but the engineer and I were out of ideas. His schedule often would get busy and so would mine. Plus I needed to keep growing and supporting the current products. Time drifted.   

Finally, last year with the help of a 2nd engineer, we came up with solutions that made Tube worthy of becoming a Lunatec product. The changes were simple and without compromises to use, durability or aesthetics. Go time!

 

Lunatec was founded by Nick Rhea to make adventure more convenient by designing products that solve problems without creating new ones. You can get a sense of our design philosophy from our Lunatec logo.

Luna stands for space, the ultimate adventure. Tec stands for tech because people want their gear to be techy. Smash ’em together and you get something that sounds like lunatic. Yep, adventurous people are a little crazy. We also use a font that is a homage to NASA. The A in our logo can represent many things. To us it’s a tent, space capsule or the letter that refuses to conform.  

That’s a lot for a logo and it embodies our approach to product design.

 

Pictured: Angel, Nick & Fernando.

story:
The Next Generation

The trailer you want to go camping in!

What’s this campaign all about?

It's about YOU!

Yes, we have a dream and see a new future for camping trailers. Using modern design, intelligent technology, and better materials. But The Next Generation is a project to develop a camping trailer YOU want to live in.  More stunning than any camping trailer you have seen before, the Next Generation will combine your imagination with advanced manufacturing methods and smart technology.

What makes the Next Generation different?

The Next Generation camping trailer will have a fully molded fiberglass monocoque body, with axleless suspension, lavish fittings, and smart technology.

The majority of camping trailers are manufactured using a method called “vacuum laminating”, in which sheet building materials, made up of insulation and supporting materials, are formed using pressure. Four walls, a floor and roof are attached together from this sheet material to build the camping trailer.

Our monocoque body is one single piece of molded fiberglass, designed to improve durability and strength, and to weigh less than traditional models. There are no seams or joints to suffer from water damage, which means we can make the walls thinner, while maintaining insulation and maximizing interior space.

Who are we?

We are a group formed by enthusiasts for luxurious, intelligent and sustainable living, with a thirst to experience the amazing world around us. Our ambitious leader Matt Attenborough has formed a team of professionals who between them have amassed more than 75 years in the RV industry.

We are also working in collaboration with academic and industry partners, including the College of Engineering at Qatar University, to help us bring your ideas to reality.

We would like to thank heating technology company Alde, which has come onboard as a partner with the Next Generation to help us create a prototype of the RV you want to live in. 

We want to also thank Timbren our newest project sponsor!  Using these great Axle-Less suspension systems we know we will be setting the new standard for Caravans.


Thetford is our newest sponsor!  One of the biggest providers of RV appliances and systems in the world, we are very excited to have them as a sponsor on our project!

For more details check out our updates page.


How will we use your support?

We want to build a prototype camping trailer based on your suggestions and our own ideas. We have set down $50,000 of our own hard-earned cash towards this, but we still need to buy more materials and manufacturing molds to bring the best ideas to life.

We need a total of $125,000 to make this dream a reality, we have put up $50,000 now we need your help for the other $75,000!

As well as financial support through this campaign, we want to give you the chance to become the designer. Take part in high-level management meetings, discuss ideas with our engineers and make your mark on the Next Generation all the way through the project of building our prototype.

Come see it in person and join the party

We invite you to join us to visit the prototype which will be completed in time to display at the Motorhome & Caravan Show, which takes place from 15 - 20 October 2014 at the National Exhibition Centre, in Birmingham, UK.


Then come see it at the Florida RV SuperShow from the 14 - 18 of January 2015 at the Florida State Fairgrounds, in Tampa Florida

What happens if we don't reach our goal?

Well, we are committed to bringing this project to life!  So if we cannot reach our goal, Team Leader Matt will be heading to the bank to take out the biggest loan of his life! Please help us make sure that Matt doesn't end up living in our prototype!

The impact of the Next Generation Project

We are going to disrupt the mainstream market. Too much is made over tiny changes that don't really improve anything. How many industry articles and press releases have you seen talking about new huge changes being made, and it's a new window blind, or a corner that has been rounded. Where is the REAL change?  

Where is the smart technology to control your windows, TV, A/C, cook top, and lighting? 

Where is the real green building with recyclable materials?  

Where are the lightweight designs that are actually lightweight and don't need a pickup truck to tow them?

It's with The Next Generation! Come be a part of it!

The biggest thing we can offer to all our supporters is INPUT!

We want you involved in the process. We want to hear your ideas, concepts, dreams, and that thought that just would not let you sleep in the middle of the night.

On our website we are setting up a special access section just for our supporters, this will have:

  • Comment pages for ideas that will be discussed with you by the team, the engineers and other supporters
  • Access to weekly web chats with the team and engineers
  • Access to Video Logs, Interviews, and Diaries from the Team
  • Access to the building log and timeline that will be updated daily with progress
  • Updated floor plans and renderings
  • First look at Private Development Plans for the caravans

But wait there's more! Check out our great perks

Wanderer - $10.00

You are an amazing part of our story, thank you.

'Thank You' Tweet + your name listed on our website + a signed digital photo of the prototype once completed + access to the Supporter section of our website.


First Mover Journeyer - $25.00 - Only 50 Available!

We can't wait to meet you and show our appreciation!

All Wanderer perks + Exclusive numbered “Journeyer First Mover” The Next Generation T-shirt + 1 ticket to either: The Motorhome & Caravan Show in Birmingham, UK or the Florida RV Super Show in Tampa (Perks will be handed out at the Show)



First Mover Wayfarer - $50.00 - Only 30 Available!

Looking good!

All Wanderer perks + Exclusive numbered “Wayfarer First Mover” The Next Generation jacket + 2 tickets to either The Motorhome & Caravan Show in Birmingham, UK or The Florida RV Super Show in Tampa (Perks will be handed out at the Show)




First Mover Voyager - $100.00 - Only 25 Available!

Now we're cooking!

All Wanderer perks + Exclusive numbered “Voyager First Mover” The Next Generation BBQ set or jacket + 2 tickets to either The Motorhome & Caravan Show in Birmingham, UK or The Florida RV Super Show in Tampa (Perks will be handed out at the Show)



First Mover Adventurer - $250.00 - Only 20 Available!

Double your money!

All Wanderer perks + Exclusive numbered “Adventurer First Mover” The Next Generation T-shirt and BBQ set + 3 tickets to either The Motorhome & Caravan Show in Birmingham, UK or The Florida RV Super Show in Tampa + your name on the 'Adventurer' poster under “First Movers” inside the prototype + $500 discount on future purchase of a Next Generation caravan (Perks will be handed out at the Show)


First Mover Explorer - $500.00 - Only 15 Available!

Well on your way to owning a Next Generation caravan!

All Wanderer perks + Exclusive numbered “Explorer First Mover” The Next Generation jacket and barbecue set + 4 tickets to either The Motorhome & Caravan Show in Birmingham, UK or The Florida RV Super Show in Tampa + your name on the 'Explorer' plaque under “First Movers” inside the prototype + $1,000 discount on future purchase of a Next Generation caravan (Perks will be handed out at the Show)


First Mover Pathfinder - $1,000.00 - Only 10 Available!

Join the party!

All Wanderer perks + Exclusive numbered “Pathfinder First Mover” The Next Generation T-Shirt, Jacket, and BBQ set + 4 tickets to either the Motorhome & Caravan Show in Birmingham, UK or The Florida RV Super Show in Tampa + Join us for our "We Did It!" party before either Show + your name painted on the outside of the prototype + $2,000 on future purchase of a Next Generation caravan (Perks will be handed out at the Show)


First Mover Trailblazer - $2,500.00 - Only 5 Available!

Be among the first to experience The Next Generation.

All Wanderer perks + Exclusive numbered “Trailerblazer First Mover” The Next Generation T-Shirt, Jacket, and BBQ set + 4 tickets to either the Birmingham, UK or the Tampa, FL Show + join us for our "We Did It!" party before your Show + Paint your Own name on the outside of the prototype + spend 2 nights in the prototype + $5,000 on future purchase of a Next Generation caravan (Perks will be handed out at the Show)


Designer - $45,000.00 - Only 2 Available!

This is it, the big one! You know you want it. We will build you a caravan custom designed by you!
All Wanderer perks + Exclusive "Designer" The Next Generation T-Shirt, Jacket and BBQ set + join us for our "We Did It!" party in either Birmingham, UK or Tampa, FL before the Show. (Within reason of course. Sorry, gold-plated fixtures and diamond door handles not included!)

The Next
GenerationThe trailer you want to go
camping in!What’s this campaign all about?
It's about YOU!Yes, we have a dream and see a new future for camping
trailers. Using modern design, intelligent technology, and better materials. But The Next
Generation is a project to develop a camping trailer YOU want to live
in.  More stunning than any camping trailer you have seen before, the
Next Generation will combine your imagination with advanced
manufacturing methods and smart technology.What makes the Next Generation
different?
The Next Generation camping trailer
will have a fully molded fiberglass monocoque body, with axleless
suspension, lavish fittings, and smart technology.
The majority of camping trailers are
manufactured using a method called “vacuum laminating”, in which
sheet building materials, made up of insulation and supporting
materials, are formed using pressure. Four walls, a floor and roof are
attached together from this sheet material to build the camping
trailer.
Our monocoque body is one single piece
of molded fiberglass, designed to improve durability and strength,
and to weigh less than traditional models. There are no seams or
joints to suffer from water damage, which means we can make the walls
thinner, while maintaining insulation and maximizing interior space.Who are we?We are a group formed by enthusiasts for luxurious, intelligent and sustainable living, with a thirst to experience the amazing world around us. story:
The Short Story

We are going on our ninth trip to Congo.

We take Bibles in the form of solar powered MP3 players to communicate the truth and love of Jesus Christ.  

We take Bibles to fight lies that are rampant in the culture which keep people mired in poverty.  One of these lies is fatalism.  Fatalism says that there is nothing I can do about my circumstances therefore why should I try to change them.

Another lie is that Christians cannot own a business because business is evil.  In Genesis 1, God tells us to subdue the earth.  Business is one way that we can subdue the earth.  Businesses provide goods and services necessary for people to live well.

We take Bibles so the Congolese Christians will know the truth.

The Longer Story

On the surface, Congo Blessings is an initiative to help relieve crushing poverty in DR Congo by teaching and encouraging people to start and grow businesses that are capable of employing other people.  Since people in that culture share money but not information, there is little of either to help people start businesses.  The World Bank ranks Congo at the sixth worst place to do business in the world which means the Congolese government does not promote business formation.  The result:  few jobs, per capita GDP of $300 per year and hunger, despite incredibly fertile farm land and natural resource wealth that exceeds $100,000 per capita.

A fundamental reason for poverty is that Congolese Christians have a worldview characterized by fatalism.  Fatalism mixed with bad Christian theology says that I just have to wait for God's blessings to appear.

Congo Blessings teaches the Congolese people a different worldview while helping them start and grow businesses.  We take American business people on short term trips to teach important concepts out of the book of Genesis, including:

  • God created us in His image; therefore, we are created to create.
  • God has commanded people to subdue the earth or use the earth’s resources for the benefit of people.
  • God has designed us to work and that our work can bring Him glory.

We also teach people important business concepts like market research, pricing, marketing, budgeting, customer service and cash management.  These concepts are foreign to most Congolese.  Between trips, we continue to train and encourage people through monthly Skype calls.

Most importantly, we encourage people to seek Jesus Christ, a loving, personal and powerful Savior who desires to provide for His people.

The Impact

Progress.  Americans love progress.  I love progress.

In the Congo, we have made great progress.  You just need a microscope to see it.  I have come to realize that worldviews change slowly and cultural change takes generations.

But what is the alternative?  

To do nothing?  

Not.

In the past five years, we have taken over 1500 Bibles to Congo.  Our strategy is to pray that God will lead us to faithful leaders who can distribute the Bibles effectively.

We hear stories, and they are good.  

The Impact in Stories

In part, we give Bibles to effective leaders because they know where the Bibles are most needed -- often places difficult for us to reach.

One leader gave a Bible to a pygmy pastor who is evangelizing on a large island surrounded by Lake Kivu. The island has villages of pygmies, and is well known for its witchcraft and its witch doctors.  Their power is real. The people are victimized.  The Word of God, particularly in recorded form, is a great light.  Truth can reign.

We met a young Congolese filmmaker who fled Congo as a kid and walked all the way to South Africa to avoid becoming a child soldier.  When you see him, you wonder why he is short.  Then you realize he is short because he did not have enough to eat when he was young and fleeing the violence.  Now he shares the gospel as he makes a film about the tragedy that is Congo.  He visits remote villages and interviews women who have been raped by soldiers in the war that has spanned two decades.  We gave him many Bibles so that the women could hear the good news of Jesus Christ and the present hope that we have in Him.  

And there are more stories that we do not know.  Our prayer is that the Bibles will be an answer to the prayers of the Congolese people who receive them.  It gives me great joy to be used by God in that way.  How about you?

One of our effective leaders sent this picture.  There is so much in this picture. Observe and enjoy.

What We Need

We ask people to sponsor a French/Swahili Bible (a solar powered MP3 player).

You can sponsor a Bible by doing one or more of the following:

  • agreeing to PRAY for the recipient of the Bible and his/her "listening group"  (just email greg@CongoBlessings.org)
  • contributing $30 to cover the cost of the Bible
  • contributing additional money to cover the other costs of the trip

         

What You Get

We personalize a ZipLoc bag that contains the Bible Player with your name and a statement that you are praying for the recipient. Your name on the ziploc bag shows the Congolese people that you hear their cry and believe they can succeed. 

On most of the Indiegogo sites, you can get something now for a certain level of donation.  We are not offering those conventional rewards.  Instead, we remind you of a great passage in Luke 16.

Luke recorded Jesus speaking about a business manager who was about to lose his job and decided to use his rich master’s money to gain personal advantage before it was too late.  Jesus commends him for acting shrewdly, but the lesson was really for us.  Our time is limited and Jesus implies that it would be shrewd for us to use money to gain friends for eternity in heaven.  When you sponsor a Bible for someone in the Congo, you will have an opportunity to enjoy that person’s friendship in heaven forever.

Other Ways You Can Help

I want more people to go, to encourage the Congolese people and to experience the great joy of being used by God.

There are opportunities for business people, educators and others.  Two people with a passion for video have gone to teach the Congolese how to create short films.  One of them created the video on this page.  I didn't know there was a need, but God did.  He called them.  Is God calling you?

Share this page on our Facebook page.

story:
Pre-order is available at our In Demand page:

https://igg.me/at/goteleindemand


GOTELE

Communicate and track your friends and loved ones without cell service or WiFi. 

Whether you're on a hike, long camping trip, traveling, attending a concert, taking part in your favorite outdoors activity such as hunting, skiing or boating, or surviving an emergency situation, goTele can help you and whoever you're adventuring with communicate seamlessly! 

 

 

  • ​REAL-TIME TRACKING - Unlike other devices, goTele allows you to keep track of all members on your team in real time. This makes it easy to reference and compare locations for up to 30 members, increasing efficiency and safety for the entire team. 
  • INDEPENDENT GPS - goTele has a high precision GPS module built-in. It can run by itself to report locations and track other group members. You can use goTele to monitor loved ones, pets, or anyone for that matter to keep them safe no matter where you are. 
  • SOS SIGNAL - With a simple press of a button on the goTele device, you can send an SOS signal in the case of an emergency. Members of your team will receive an immediate alert via the goTele app. 
  • NO SERVICE REQUIRED - Text and track goTele users within 3.1 miles without data, sim card or WiFi.

 

 

It's not magic. We have proprietary hardware that makes safety through connectivity possible no matter where you are. 
 

 

goTele is the most affordable solution to tracking and communication without cell phone service. It supports offline maps, SMS texts, and helps track your group's location and movement in real-time! This means you're not only connected, you're safe. 

Use goTele while you're hiking, traveling, at family outings, or even in the case of a natural disaster. As long as the person you're trying to reach is within 3.1 miles and has a goTele, you can stay in touch. goTele is perfect for busy festivals with overloaded cell towers, remote vacations, white water rafting, skiing, emergency preparedness, and so much more. 

 

goTele even allows you to watch everyone’s location and trace their positions in real-time. You can compare the location for up to 30 members.

 

Here's the good news: if your phone dies and you find yourself in a sticky situation, you can still use goTele to contact your group. There is no need for a smartphone or app to support the goTele device, as goTele has a built-in GPS module, and can be tracked even if the user doesn't have a smartphone. Send an SOS signal, and your friends will see it and be able to find you even when your phone is dead, lost, or you didn't have one to begin with!  

 

With the SOS Button you can send a SOS Signal in case of an emergency. Whether you’re off the beaten path or off-grid, members of your team will receive an alert via the goTele app.

 

Within the app you can set a geo-fence on your map, and be alerted when any goTele device crosses it. This feature is perfect for kids and pets if they have a goTele attached to them. This feature is perfect for making sure no one in your group gets lost. 

 

goTele supports a variety of maps including Google satellite, Google City, OpenCycle, OpenStreet, & Contour so you can track & share locations easily. This is perfect for trekking through the wilderness, exploring new countries, or even just conserving battery by turning off your phone's GPS.

 

With the goTele app you can send messages, emojis, and current locations with your group members. It works without a sim card or cell service so you never have to worry about staying connected on your adventures. 

 

goTele is for all outdoor lovers. Therefore it is a matter of course that it can withstand dust, water, and temperatures between -4 and 140 degrees Fahrenheit.

 

 

With an Outdoor Open Space range of over 3.1 miles, goTele's transmit range is unparalleled. As long as you're within 3.1 miles, you're connected. 

 

goTele App supports iOS & Android. Our App allows you to take advantage of all of goTele's features without cell service. In addition, track your friends in real-time, share your location, receive SOS signals, create geo fences, and download offline maps. There are many other useful features waiting for you to explore. 

 

*goTele can be used in conjunction with Walkie Talkies, Spot & Satellite Phones.

goTele has not been adopted for Mesh Network because we've found Mesh to have poor mobility, small communication range & large power consumption compared to related products. Mesh is not suitable for outdoor activities, as it cannot transmit data stably when it is outdoor.

goTele's use of a unique advanced algorithm allows our 1W device to function over the equivalent transmission distance of a 5W walkie talkie device.

 

 

 

 

 

Which perk is right for you? 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Thanks to our years of industry experience, we already have testing and production of our goTele units well underway. You can be confident we'll deliver your goTele units at the highest quality and on schedule!

 

 

 

The birth of goTele was a result of our founder’s outdoor experiences. He found that without cell service or wifi, it was extremely difficult to communicate his location to fellow adventurers. Walkie talkies were not cutting it and he strongly believed there was a better way to communicate when off the grid. That’s why he formed the team behind goTele.

 

 

Thanks to the team’s experience working in radio R&D, as well as extensive prototyping, we discovered three core requirements for an off-grid tracker: It must have great battery life, it must be completely independent of phones, and it must be able to resist the elements. goTele is IP67 rated, has a built in GPS module so it can work completely independently of your phone, and uses low power consumption and intelligent power saving technologty for excellent battery life.

 

 

We decided to bring goTele to crowdfunding because we want to share the technology with people who need it. Through crowdfunding, we will be able to gain feedback and suggestions from backers. This early feedback is extremely valuable for us. Crowdfunding also helps with mass production, logistics, and bringing our product to the market.

 

 

 

What is goTele?
goTele is an off-grid tracker that uses GPS and long range radio technology to help you and whoever you’re with share location, communicate and stick together no matter where you are, keeping your group safe. Pair goTele with your smart phone via BLE, and you can use the app to view group locations and tracking information, even if your phone doesn’t have service

 

Does everyone in my group need a goTele?
Yes. At least 2 goTele devices are necessary for its features to work.

 

How many group members does Gotele support?

Up to 30 people.

 

How does goTele’s transmission work? 
Similar to a walkie-talkie, goTele uses long range radio technology to transmit and receive information.

 

What is the battery life of a goTele?
The battery charges in 3-4 hours and it will work continuously for 45+ hours.

 

What is the transmission power of goTele?

＜1W

 

What is the difference between goTele and a walkie-talkie?
Walkie-talkies mainly send voice messages, while goTele can send locations and texts.

 

What’s the band of goTele?

ISM 902-928MHz

 

How big is goTele？

75mm×50mm×22mm

 

Does goTele work with both Apple and Android smartphones?

Yes!

 

How do you charge goTele?
goTele uses the standard Micro USB interface and can be charged with any standard Micro USB cable through a USB port, standard USB charger, or portable source.

 

Does goTele work internationally?

There is no geographical restraint on goTele's use, but it is necessary to understand the radio laws and regulations of the use area. The GPS signal is global. As long as the area is not roofed in in such a way as to block the GPS signal, your goTele will work.

 

Does goTele still work while charging?

Yes. If you find your battery is nearly dead during use, you can charge it directly with a portable battery and use it while charging.

 

Where can I download the goTele app?

The official goTele website, App Store, and Google Play. Simply search "goTele.”
 

How does goTele work without the app?

You only need the app:
- when you connect goTele with mobile phones.
- When you need to see your group members’ location and trajectory tracking
- When you look for SOS signals when rescuing members

The above situation are the only times you need the app. Other than that, goTele works on its own. GoTele doesn’t rely heavily on your phone. For example, as explained in our campaign video, pets can wear goTele and someone in the group with the app can track the pets’ location. As long as the group member has the goTele device, anyone in the group with the app can track the location of that member.

 

Is Bluetooth going to kill my smartphone’s battery life?
No. Bluetooth-LE - aka Bluetooth Low Energy (or Bluetooth 4.0) - is a new standard which addresses the power drain of the old Bluetooth technology. It’s also a lot easier to pair with!

 

If you’re tracking someone, do you see their location on the app interface? Is there a radius you have to be within?

Yes. It needs to be within the scope of effective communication, which is based on the terrain.

The range varies because of different terrain. Like we mentioned above, in outdoor Open Space: goTele can work within 3- 5 KM (1.8-3.1 miles). In a city where there are a lot of objects, goTele works within 1-3 KM (.6-1.8 miles).

 

Is the SOS notification texted to me?

Yes, if you have paired your goTele with your smart phone.

 

If my phone dies can I send a SOS notification?

Yes. With the simple push of a button on the goTele device you can send an SOS notification even if your smartphone is dead. Once the SOS notification is sent, any group member's goTele paired with an active smartphone will get a notification.

 

If my phone dies can I receive a SOS notification?

No. In order to receive SOS notification, you need to have both the app and goTele.

 

How is goTele able to create a private wireless network?

Each goTele has a transmitter and receiver inside. gotele doesn't rely on relay stations to function. Each goTele has a range that it can send and receive signals. As long as units are in range of each other they can communicate with each other.

 

Am I going to receive extra charges for this by my service provider?

No. Apart from getting goTele itself, you don’t need to pay any extra fees.

 

 

Why do I need a private secure wireless network? Can’t I use an ad-hoc network?

goTele uses a proprietary long range radio technology to create a private secure wireless network , that will more power saving than ad-hoc network.

 

Does goTele support Google, OpenStreet, and Contour maps?

Yes, you can download offline maps when your mobile phone network or Wi-Fi is available.

 

Why do I need goTele for this? Can’t I just use the Google Maps app?

goTele will let you know all users' locations, which the Google Maps app cannot do.

 

Is goTele waterproof?

Yes, it is waterproof, and the waterproof level is 7 (can soak for 30 minutes under the standard atmosphere of 1 m deep water).

 

Is Gotele dustproof?

Yes, dustproof level 6

 

What temperatures can goTele operate in?

goTele's operating range is from -4°F/-20°C to 140°F/60° C.

 

Is goTele shockproof?

Yes, goTele is shockproof. From a height of 5 feet, even if you drop each of the six surfaces onto the ground five times, goTele will be undamaged.

 

How does the trajectory tracking keep track of people in real time?

goTele can send out its GPS locations through the radio signal. Other goTele devices will receive and store the locations, connecting them to form a trajectory.

If you’re tracking someone, do you see their location on the app interface? Is there a radius you have to be within?
Yes. It needs to be within the scope of effective communication, which is based on the terrain.

 

Can you know someone’s location even if you don’t have a goTele device but have the app downloaded?

No. If you want to know someone’s location, you need to have one goTele paired with your phone in order to receive the location of other group members.

 

How do goTele members share their location?

  1. After your friends, family, or pets are added to your group, goTele will automatically share their location to all group members.
  2. After joining the group, you can send your location through the chat window to all your friends manually.
  3. After joining the group, pressing the SOS button will send all members SOS information on the sender's location, even if they don't have the app downloaded.

 

Is goTele approved by the FCC?

We are pending FCC approval.

 

What’s the range of communication?
It’s about 3-5KM (1.8-3.1 miles) in the wild, 1-3KM (.6-1.8 miles) in the city.


 

What kind of warranty do you provide?

goTele comes with a 1-year limited warranty.
story_txt:
Pre-order is available at our In Demand page:https://igg.me/at/goteleindemand
GOTELECommunicate and track your friends and loved ones without cell service or WiFi. Whether you're on a hike, long camping trip, traveling, attending a concert, taking part in your favorite outdoors activity such as hunting, skiing or boating, or surviving an emergency situation, goTele can help you and whoever you're adventuring with communicate seamlessly!   

​REAL-TIME TRACKING - Unlike other devices, goTele allows you to keep track of all members on your team in real time. This makes it easy to reference and compare locations for up to 30 members, increasing efficiency and safety for the entire team. 

INDEPENDENT GPS - goTele has a high precision GPS module built-in. It can run by itself to report locations and track other group members. You can use goTele to monitor loved ones, pets, or anyone for that matter to keep them safe no matter where you are. 
SOS SIGNAL - With a simple press of a button on the goTele device, you can send an SOS signal in the case of an emergency. Members of your team will receive an immediate alert via the goTele app. 

NO SERVICE REQUIRED - Text and track goTele users within 3.1 miles without data, sim card or WiFi.
 
 It's not magic. We have proprietary hardware that makes safety through connectivity possible no matter where you are.   goTele is the most affordable solution to tracking and communication without cell phone service. It supports offline maps, SMS texts, and helps track your group's location and movement in real-time! This means you're not only connected, you're safe. Use goTele while you're hiking, traveling, at family outings, or even in the case of a natural disaster. As long as the person you're trying to reach is within 3.1 miles and has a goTele, you can stay in touch. goTele is perfect for busy festivals with overloaded cell towers, remote vacations, white water rafting, skiing, emergency preparedness, and so much more.  goTele even allows you to watch everyone’s location and trace their positions in real-time. You can compare the location for up to 30 members. Here's the good news: if your phone dies and you find yourself in a sticky situation, you can still use goTele to contact your group. There is no need for a smartphone or app to support the goTele device, as goTele has a built-in GPS module, and can be tracked even if the user doesn't have a smartphone. Send an SOS signal, and your friends will see it and be able to find you even when your phone is dead, lost, or you didn't have one to begin with!   

With the SOS Button you can send a SOS Signal in case of an emergency. Whether you’re off the beaten path or off-grid, members of your team will receive an alert via the goTele app. Within the app you can set a geo-fence on your map, and be alerted when any goTele device crosses it. This feature is perfect for kids and pets if they have a goTele attached to them. This feature is perfect for making sure no one in your group gets lost.  goTele supports a variety of maps including Google satellite, Google City, OpenCycle, OpenStreet, & Contour so you can track & share locations easily. This is perfect for trekking through the wilderness, exploring new countries, or even just conserving battery by turning off your phone's GPS. With the goTele app you can send messages, emojis, and current locations with your group members. It works without a sim card or cell service so you never have to worry about staying connected on your adventures.  goTele is for all outdoor lovers. Therefore it is a matter of course that it can withstand dust, water, and temperatures between -4 and 140 degrees Fahrenheit.  With an Outdoor Open Space range of over 3.1 miles, goTele's transmit range is unparalleled. As long as you're within 3.1 miles, you're connected.  goTele App supports iOS & Android. Our App allows you to take advantage of all of goTele's features without cell service. In addition, track your friends in real-time, share your location, receive SOS signals, create geo fences, and download offline maps. story:
Check out our just released 2014 roster:

Andrew Mangan
Austin Gregersen
Bart Watson
Brett Matzuka
Brodie Smith
Craig Forshee
Dennison Bechis
Evan Padget
Henry Konker
Hidde Snieder
Hylke Sneider
Ian Toner
Jack McShane (C)
Jackson Kloor
Jake Juszak*
Jesse Roehm
Jimmy Mickle
Joshua Ackley (C)
Kurt Gibson
Matt Farrell
Nick Lance
Owen Westbrook
Phil Sun*
Ryan Farrell (C)
Ryan Morgan
Sean Keegan
Stanley Peterson
Tim Morrissy
Will Lokke

What is Johnny Bravo?

Johnny Bravo is Colorado's elite Men's Ultimate Frisbee team. Last year at Nationals Bravo finished 4th in the country, and earned a bid to the World Championships in Lecco, Italy.

What We Need & Why?

It is an honor to travel to Italy and compete with intensity and integrity while representing and promoting this sport that we love. However, Ultimate is not a professional sport, and Bravo players pay 100% of their traveling expenses throughout the year. Worlds represents a unique financial challenge because it will cost each player over $3000 to travel to Italy to compete. Such an amount is difficult or impossible to come up with for many of our dedicated players.

The Impact

100% of your donations will go towards funding Bravo's trip to worlds. Each donation no matter how small brings us one step closer to realizing our dream of competing on the biggest international stage. Where will your money go? A lot of places! $50 buys the team sunscreen for the entire tournament.  $1000 pays for lodging for the team for one day. $3000 feeds the team for the whole tournament.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute that's ok! Help us spread the word! Feel free to forward our campaign to anyone that you think would be interested in helping us.

story:
Boil water from a battery or actively keep hot beverages at your desired drinking temperature all day wherever you go.  Below is a time lapse video covering 18 minutes and showing Cauldryn turning crushed ice into boiling water!

What is the Cauldryn?    

The Cauldryn is the first portable travel mug of its kind. Utilizing the revolutionary Fyre heating element, the bottle has limitless applications with five different heat settings, which can keep its contents at a specific temperature all day long.  

No longer do you need an outlet or, in remote locations, fire, to boil water. 

The Cauldryn allows users to boil water, even ice cold water. Cauldryn’s five different heat settings make it versatile enough to make soup, tea or coffee as well as sterilize water.  It can even let your favorite hot beverage cool to your favorite drinking temperature and actively keep it there all day long.  

Cauldryn is a very versatile bottle.  Its vacuum insulation can keep cold drinks cold in addition to its great heating abilities.

Who Can Benefit from a Cauldryn Bottle?  

 • Campers and outdoor enthusiasts—to heat liquids, sterilize water and cook without access to electricity or needing to build a fire  

• Commuters—the different heat settings allow the user to be able to keep liquids at their desired drinking temperature all day, meaning that commuters’ coffee will stay at the perfect temperature for their morning drive and once they are at the office.  

• Emergency—the ability to heat and sanitize water or cook during emergency situations when you otherwise might not have access to clean water or the ability to cook • Anyone trying to navigate Mother Nature or the urban jungle!

Features and Benefits   

• 5 heat settings: 
Hot (125-135 or 135-145 degrees), Extra Hot (160-170 degrees), Brew (195-205 degrees), Boil (212 degrees)  

• Modular Design—16 oz. stainless steel, vacuum insulated bottle and lid, Fyre heating element, battery (on mobile model) & AC charging base

• AC base that plugs into the wall and allows you to use all of the features of Cauldryn without having to use a battery.  Unlimited boiling!  Cauldryn is designed to easily lift off of its AC base so you don't have to worry about dragging an annoying wire all over the place.

• Blue LED lights show battery level and and color coded yellow and red lights show operation mode.

• Simple two button user interface makes for sleek, intuitive operation

Components

Fyre:  

Heating Element  

The Fyre heating element coupled with Cauldryn’s battery is a potent combination. It simply twists on to the bottom of the Cauldryn and can boil 16 oz. of water or last all day in Hot mode.  

Mobile:

Battery

Whether you need to boil water in a life threatening emergency situation, or just keep your favorite hot beverage at the ideal temperature all day, Mobile has the juice to cover you. It even has USB charging ports for your mobile devices.

Models

Cauldryn Fyre - Cauldryn bottle and Fyre heating element.  This unit has no battery, but can use all of Cauldryn's great features from the AC base.

Cauldryn Fyre Mobile - Cauldryn bottle, Fyre heating element, and Mobile battery.  This model lets you use all of Cauldryn's features from battery power alone.  It also has the AC base for use when you are not on the go.

Testimonial

Safe drinking water is key to survival. Boiling is the best way to make water safe. You can't always get a fire, but if you can get a boil you can greatly increase your chances of survival. -- Mykel Hawke (Host of Man Woman Wild and One Man Army, former Green Beret, and survival expert)

Why We are here

The Cauldryn team is a group of experienced outdoor industry professionals that have years of experience bringing products to life. Cauldryn represents us stepping out on our own. We know how to get a product produced and into consumer's hands, but it takes capital to start up production and to finance product in the beginning. We have the brain capital, and need your help with the financial capital. All of our prototyping you see here is fully functional, and final tooling for the product is already being produced. However, we still need to be able to pay for our first run of production. We are far enough along in the development process that I can guarantee that if this project is successfully funded you will get your rewards. In fact, we have completed all of the design work, and pre-production prototyping. We have one more round of prototypes to be produced. These will be produced on the the final production tooling (currently being built). As soon as we verify that the production samples meet our quality standards, we will launch into full production. That production will start in July. Please help us bring this awesome product across the finish line.

 

 

We are excited to be featured on BackerClub this week! They are a top community for people who love Indiegogo and we are looking forward to their feedback and support.

Cauldryn’s five different heat settings make it versatile enough to make soup, tea or coffee as well as sterilize water.  It can even let your favorite hot beverage cool to your favorite drinking temperature and actively keep it there all day long.  Cauldryn is a very versatile bottle.  Its vacuum insulation can keep cold drinks cold in addition to its great heating abilities.Who Can Benefit from a Cauldryn Bottle?   • Campers and outdoor enthusiasts—to heat liquids, sterilize water and cook without access to electricity or needing to build a fire  • Commuters—the different heat settings allow the user to be able to keep liquids at their desired drinking temperature all day, meaning that commuters’ coffee will stay at the perfect temperature for their morning drive and once they are at the office.  • Emergency—the ability to heat and sanitize water or cook during emergency situations when you otherwise might not have access to clean water or the ability to cook • Anyone trying to navigate Mother Nature or the urban jungle!Features and Benefits   • 5 heat settings: Hot (125-135 or 135-145 degrees), Extra Hot (160-170 degrees), Brew (195-205 degrees), Boil (212 degrees)  • Modular Design—16 oz. stainless steel, vacuum insulated bottle and lid, Fyre heating element, battery (on mobile model) & AC charging base• AC base that plugs into the wall and allows you to use all of the features of Cauldryn without having to use a battery.  Unlimited boiling!  Cauldryn is designed to easily lift off of its AC base so you don't have to worry about dragging an annoying wire all over the place.• Blue LED lights show battery level and and color coded yellow and red lights show operation mode.• Simple two button user interface makes for sleek, intuitive operationComponentsFyre:  Heating Element  The Fyre heating element coupled with Cauldryn’s battery is a potent combination. It simply twists on to the bottom of the Cauldryn and can boil 16 oz. of water or last all day in Hot mode.  Mobile:BatteryWhether you need to boil water in a life threatening emergency situation, or just keep your favorite hot beverage at the ideal temperature all day, Mobile has the juice to cover you. It even has USB charging ports for your mobile devices.ModelsCauldryn Fyre - Cauldryn bottle and Fyre heating element.  This unit has no battery, but can use all of Cauldryn's great features from the AC base.Cauldryn Fyre Mobile - Cauldryn bottle, Fyre heating element, and Mobile battery.  This model lets you use all of Cauldryn's features from battery power alone.  It also has the AC base for use when you are not on the go.TestimonialSafe drinking water is key to survival. Boiling is the best way to make water safe. You can't always get a fire, but if you can get a boil you can greatly increase your chances of survival. -- Mykel Hawke (Host of Man Woman Wild and One Man Army, former Green Beret, and survival expert)Why We are hereThe Cauldryn team is a group of experienced outdoor industry professionals that have years of experience bringing products to life. Cauldryn represents us stepping out on our own. We know how to get a product produced and into consumer's hands, but it takes capital to start up production and to finance product in the beginning. We have the brain capital, and need your help with the financial capital. All of our prototyping you see here is fully functional, and final tooling for the product is already being produced. However, we still need to be able to pay for our first run of production. We are far enough along in the development process that I can guarantee that if this project is successfully funded you will get your rewards. In fact, we have completed all of the design work, and pre-production prototyping. We have one more round of prototypes to be produced. These will be produced on the the final production tooling (currently being built). As soon as we verify that the production samples meet our quality standards, we will launch into full production. That production will start in July. Please help us bring this awesome product across the finish line.  We are excited to be featured on BackerClub this week! They are a top community for people who love Indiegogo and we are looking forward to their feedback and support.

story:
The wait is over...

The next generation of Gokart is finally here!

  Hooray!!  Order now to get 10% off your Electric Gokart and enjoy a tax-free delivery in the US.

 

Segway's Exclusive Partner 

Contact: info@longhamtec.com

Customer service: wecare@segway.com

 

 

Get ready to experience the coolest electric Gokart ever with 2 motors with 800w maximum power each, 15 MPH top speed, and adjustable steering. 

  

Why have just one fun product to ride when you can have two? Instead of creating an electric gokart from scratch, we've designed the Ninebot Gokart Kit to work with the Ninebot by Segway miniPRO. Attach your miniPRO to work as the gokart's motor, or detach it and ride it hands-free.
When it comes to performance, the Ninebot Electric Gokart seeks for vehicle benchmarks beyond gokarts. The Gokart can sprint from 0 to 12mph within seconds, which matches or even outpaces the acceleration of many automobiles on the market that is well known for their outstanding performance. 

 The Ninebot Electric Gokart features a mechanical handbrake. In the unlikely event that the electric brake fails, the handbrake can be used to stop the vehicle abruptly.

The handbrake is much more than a mere braking alternative to the foot brake. The Ninebot Electric Gokart is the first gokart in the karting history that is made to drift with an equipped handbrake. Once they get familiarized with riding the Gokart, riders can challenge themselves with the drifting tail by making use of the handbrake.

The Ninebot Electric Gokart was designed with an adjustbale frame and steering wheel to fit riders between 4' 5" to 6' 3" (130 cm - 190 cm). The Gokart has a maximum payload of 220 pounds (100 kg).

The adjustable frame makes the Ninebot Electric Gokart suitable and playable for people of different ages. You can create memorable experiences by driving the Gokart alongside with your family.

The Ninebot Electric Gokart has a steering ratio of 2.1:1, allowing for precision steering and the ability to make the very tight turns.  

                                            

The Ninebot Electric Gokart comes with three driving modes for riders to choose based on their expertise. Novice mode has a top speed of 5 MPH (8 km/h), the Standard mode has a top speed of 10.8 MPH (18 km/h), and Sport mode has a top speed of 15 MPH (24 km/h).

Since the Ninebot Gokart has been designed for both children and adults, we want to make sure its being driven at a safe speed for everyone. Parents have the ability to limit the top speed of the Gokart for child riders. 

 The battery life of the Ninebot Electric Gokart varies across the different driving modes, with a maximum range of 12.4 miles (20 km). It takes about 3.5 hours to fully charge the battery.

Unlike most gokarts, the Ninebot Electric Gokart comes equipped with the ability to go in reverse. Once at a complete stop, quickly tap the brake pedal twice and the gokart is now in reverse. When stopped, tap it twice again to go back to forward.  

The Ninebot Electric Gokart is collapsible to fit in most trunks, allowing you to take it wherever you want to go.


Connect your Gokart to the app via Bluetooth to display driving speed, cruising range, and fault reminders of the Gokart in real-time. You can also access the new rider tutorial, control lighting, set driving modes, update firmware, and more.

 With our commitment to product development and manufacturing, every aspect of the Ninebot Gokart was meticulously designed and developed to ensure a high-quality product.

 

The Ninebot Electric Gokart comes with the Gokart Kit and a miniPRO320. The Gokart Kit contains a steering wheel, seat, front bumper, and front wheels. The Gokart Kit is fitted over the miniPRO320, which functions as the rear wheels and powertrain for the Gokart.

The package size of Ninebot Gokart Kit is GIGANTIC! To give you a better idea about the packaging size, we compare it with a 29-inch luggage and a 13-inch MacBook Pro in the image above. Since we are shipping all orders from the United States, it is too hard for us to cover the extra shipping cost to the rest of the world for such a huge item. We thank you for your support and hope you can understand why there is an extra charge for orders outside the United States.

For those riders looking to go a bit farther in their travels, the Ninebot by Segway miniPRO320 offers extended range thanks to its 310Wh battery. With its unique knee control bar, the miniPRO allows you more interaction with your environment than any other two-wheel ride.

Update: To all backer from Indemand, due to lack of stock, we can only send the new version of Ninebot S to replace miniPRO320. 

 

Easily retrofit your miniPRO with the Gokart Kit: disassemble the knee control bar on the miniPRO; attach the Gokart Kit to the miniPRO; adjust the frame; adjust the steering wheels; insert batteries.
Electric Gokart Exclusive Offer $1299 (MSRP $1450)

Gokart Kit Exclusive Offer $749(MSRP $799)

We are giving out great deals to our Indiegogo backers, including special discounts and free gift packages. The more you buy, the more you save.

We are giving out great deals to our Indiegogo backers, including special discounts and free gift packages. The more you buy, the more you save. Please share your love and spread words about our campaign to help us reach the stretch goals listed below and “UNLOCK” all the extra goodies to come with your Ninebot Electric Gokart for FREE.

Every step of the way, Segway’s world-class team has pursued excellence in personal transportation and a deeply integrated software-hardware product development.  

 

 

Ninebot is a privately held company headquartered in Beijing, China. In April of 2015, Ninebot acquired Segway Inc., headquartered in Bedford, New Hampshire. As the world’s leading provider of mobile robotics solutions, the company focuses on the research and development, design, manufacturing, distribution, and sales of short-distance transportation products. 

Q. What is the waterproof performance of the Ninebot Gokart? Can I ride in the rain?

A: The Ninebot Gokart Kit has a waterproof grade of IPX4.  For your personal safety, outdoor riding is not recommended in unfavorable weather conditions.

Q. Why is my miniPRO unbalanced after I detach it from the Gokart?

A: The miniPRO does not self-balance during Gokart Mode. To activate miniPRO for riding, riders should exit Gokart Mode on the mobile app, or manually turn off the Gokart Mode under the Setting tab.

Q. What is the simulating idling vibration？

A: This feature simulates the vibration that is commonly experienced on racing cars. The simulating idling vibration enhances the driving pleasure for riders who seek for the excitement of car racing. It can be switched on or off according to rider’s preference.


Q: What is the ground clearance?

A: Ground clearance of the Gokart is 4 cm.
 

Q. What is the speed limit of each driving mode?

A:  The novice mode has a max. speed of 5 mph; the standard mode has a max. speed of 10.8 mph; the sportive mode has a max. speed of 15mph; the reverse mode has a max. speed of 2 mph.

Q: What is the campaign's refund policy? 

A: Please refer to Indiegogo's refund policy here.

In the event that you wish to cancel your Indiegogo contribution more than 10 days after it was made but before we ship out your order, we will assess an administration fee of 50% of your pledge and shall refund the remainder. We do not accept refund after shipment.

Q: What is the limited warranty policy?

A: We do not accept returns for Ninebot Electric Gokart. Instead, Segway will support your product in accordance with the terms of our Limited Warranty. If you have further questions regarding product support, please contact technicalsupport@segway.com, and our customer service team will get back to you to further assist you with technical support.

gokart.crowdfunding@segway.com

story:
An Online Adventure


This idea has stemmed from wanting to travel the world, tell a story, wanting to bring a new depth to photography by bringing photos to life, and by giving people quality content to be inspired by. . .

We want to make this project as accessible to everyone as possible by making the PDF version of the Final book ONLY $3.

In today's age, we're able to live vicariously through the people we follow online.  We are able to feel the trials and success of others and make their victories our own.  The feeling comes from creating something substantial not as an individual, but as a team.  What good is experiencing the most beautiful things in life if there is no one to share it with?


Join us for a 20 day journey through Europe across 7 countries.  Find out tips, tricks, what works, and what doesn't, as a group of 3 young adventurers explore Europe in your own interactive adventure show THAT YOU CAN HELP PRODUCE!  Setting out towards the beginning of May, we're looking for you to personally help write the next chapter in our story. 

Don't keep waiting for something to happen, you have to make it happen.  Take the risk. . .

What you can expect from this project. . .

  • High Quality Daily Video Blogs
  • Hi-res Photo Book
  • An Authentic Sense of Adventure
  • Experience Different Cultures
  • Life Changing Experiences
  • Breath-Taking Landscapes
  • Inspiration
  • Passion
  • Real-Life


Our Map



The main stops including,

-Amsterdam, Netherlands
-Brussels, Belgium
-Paris, France
-Karlsruhe, Germany
-Munich, Germany
-Salzburg, Austria
-Zurich, Switzerland
-Verona, Italy
-Venice, Italy
-Florence, Italy
-Rome, Italy

(with a few other stops along the way)


The Risks, What We Need, & What You Get

What we're looking for is momentum.  Momentum comes in different shapes and sizes.  One being funding, and another being the amount of people who support the project.

The more people we have backing this project, the easier it will be to obtain sponsorships from larger companies who can help lower our overall costs. This would be ideal and would allow us to give back to the people who initially believed in this idea. 


Our Financial Needs

  • Airfare
  • Transportation (Train Fare/ Rental Car)
  • Lodging (Hostels, Hotels, Apartments, etc.)
  • Food 
  • Equipment
  • Filling Perks


What You Get

  • Totally personal and unique perks (listed on the right.)
  • Free High-Quality Daily Video Updates on our YouTube Channel, TribeTyler
  • *Your name in our Official Trip Book, which will include hi-res photos, notes, stories, tickets, etc. from the trip.
  • *A PDF version of the Official Trip Book.
  • *Your name on screen in the Final Daily Video Blog of the trip, as well as any  other recap/ highlight videos made from this project. 
(*Only on donations of $3 or more.)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                           
                            PERKS


11"x17" SIGNED TRIBETYLER POSTER


4"x3" STICKER


OFFICIAL TRIP T-SHIRT


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


It is not necessarily how much you are able to donate, it's more or less seeing that we have your personal support.  No matter the financial amount given, it's more important to see there are people with like minds focused on a common goal.


The Impact

We are looking for people who are as passionate about these things as we are.

If this is something you would like to see, something you wish you had done, or something you wish to do, please help us reach our goal. Be able to show your friends and family that you we're the reason this was able to happen.

This project is bigger than any one of us, we need a team to make this dream come to life. 


Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute financially, but that doesn't mean that you can't help!

  • Ask friends and family to get the word out and make some noise about our project!
  • Follow (@TribeTyler/@TribeTylerEU) and Share on Twitter, Instagram, Facebook, Tumblr etc. for a chance to win smaller perks!

Help us & become a part of this project.

WIN A HARDCOVER COPY OF THE BOOK!




------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Made Possible By. . .

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


It is not necessarily how much you are able to donate, it's more or less seeing that we have your personal support.  No matter the financial amount given, it's more important to see there are people with like minds focused on a common goal.
   The Impact
We are looking for people who are as passionate about these things as we are.
If this is something you would like to see, something you wish you had done, or something you wish to do, please help us reach our goal. Be able to show your friends and family that you we're the reason this was able to happen.
This project is bigger than any one of us, we need a team to make this dream come to life. 


Other Ways You Can Help Some people just can't contribute financially, but that doesn't mean that you can't help!  Ask friends and family to get the word out and make some noise about our project! Follow (@TribeTyler/@TribeTylerEU) and Share on Twitter, Instagram, Facebook, Tumblr etc. for a chance to win smaller perks!
 

Help us & become a part of this project.


WIN A HARDCOVER COPY OF THE BOOK!

story:
Hey All, 

Over the last 14 years Jenny has opened up Pop Pop's cottage to a small army of drunkards and ruffians - she has housed us, fed us, and even bailed us out of jail - we thought it was about time to say thanks.

We thought an OC boardwalk bench dedicated to Jenny would be fitting, so please visit our IndieGoGo page and pitch in. 

See you all next July! 

-Bec, Will, Pete and Jen

See you all next July! 
-Bec, Will, Pete and Jen

story:
About This Campaign

Roman and Snow are some of the most genuine and caring people I know. Totally in love with each other, they decided to get married this fall on September 14. However, no honeymoon is planned because of their present financial circumstances.

Typically selfless, Roman and Snow initially planned to spend the little money they have to organize a joint-honeymoon for their parents, which they hope will bless their parents' marriage. But due to lack of resources, their kind thought didn't come to fruition. As Roman’s coworker, I know personally that he’s been working VERY HARD in the past few months by juggling a few jobs at once to pay for his wedding and prepare for his marriage. All these are on top of his practice and performance schedule with the church's worship team - what a dedicated man of God he is!

Let’s bless this amazing, godly couple with a gift they'll never forget: a honeymoon. 


"See that you also excel in this grace of giving... At the present time your plenty will supply what they need, so that in turn their plenty will supply what you need." (2 Cor. 8:7,14)

"Give, and it will be given to you. A good measure, pressed down, shaken together and running over, will be poured into your lap. For with the measure you use, it will be measured to you." (Luke 6:38)


The Honeymoon

Our desire is to give Roman and Snow the freedom to choose how they’d like to spend their honeymoon. We’re aiming for $2,000 because it will give them a decent number of options. A one-week trip to Hawaii, Mexico or The Caribbean, for instance, will cost about $2,000-$2,500. If we raise less, they can go to nearer destinations such as Santa Barbara or Orange County.


Other Ways You Can Help

1. SPREAD THE WORD 

                 - Email this campaign to friends and family around the globe

                 - Post our link and Share it on Facebook

                 - Tweet our campaign on Twitter

2. PRAY 

                 - Ask God to bless this couple’s marriage

story:
Community Submersible Project

The WUYC submersible (currently unnamed) might be the first community operated submersible that is available for everyone to use (after free training)! It requires a handful of upgrades for safe operation in the shallows. In the future, we will be assessing the integrity of the hull to determine its maximum safe depth and retrofit to that depth, but for now we need to make minor upgrades and repairs to get her safe! 

Some of the essential expenses include:

: trailer repair

: operating costs (air fills, hauling fuel)

: air quality monitoring system

: life support system

: gauges and surface communications 

: ballast drop system 

: front window replacement 

: upgraded hardware 

: batteries 

: LLC formation and registration 

: and many more things! 

We are really excited to make submarine exploration accessible to anyone with an interest.

Thank you for your enthusiasm and support! 

**~*EVERY DONATION OVER $10 GETS A STICKER*~**

story:
Off-road adventure made fun and accessible. With PESU you’ll find that extra power to go even further. Go beyond the end of the trail and explore a new path. Finally, a true, no-compromise, electric powered mountain bike that is unbelievably fun and undeniably practical.

Electric bikes expand your boundaries. Do more and see more. Incredibly fun, unquestionably practical. With extra power and pedal assistance, every ride will be pure joy.

 

The PESU Team will be exhibiting at two of the world’s largest bike exhibitions, the Eurobike and Interbike. Learn more about our e-bikes and other products there -- you’ll get to try them too!

 

 

 

Our mission is to make an e-bike that is truly fun. One that will enhance your riding experience and help you expand your boundaries, to go further, while not making your legs sore next day. We want to create an e-bike that inspires you to explore further, go off the beaten path and most importantly -- keep moving forward. In order to do that we had to push boundaries and look beyond the standard procedure.

An industry first approach - our PESU e-bikes are designed in conjunction with our drive unit. Every detail has been redefined so our drive unit matches our bikes and vice versa, which all match our mission perfectly.

Fastest Motor Response Time
As mentioned -- our mission is to create an e-bike that is truly fun. We weren’t satisfied with the other drive unit’s response time on the market right now, so we went and created our own. From 2015, we decided to self-develop and patent our own torque sensor. The torque sensor is a type of throttle that determines how much juice to feed the motor based on how hard you are pedaling.

With our own patented torque sensor, our drive unit response time has been reduced to just10ms. Other drive unit brands like Yamaha or Bosch have a response time of around 50ms. Having a quicker response time allows for a more intuitive riding experience. Just pedal and go.

Highly Efficient Drive Unit
Tweaked and designed in conjunction with our PESU e-bikes, it is a match made in heaven. 

In the manufacturing process of the motor body, we adopted an advanced automation equipment, achieving a fully automatic winding, magnetic paste, and through high-temperature curing and radial magnetization technology, greatly improves the consistency of the motor body to ensure that the motor is efficiently output.

This is why our drive unit is quicker, lighter and faster than even the industry leaders. 

 Powerful, With Natural Assist Characteristics

Don't be fooled by its compact size, our drive unit can conquer 40-degree inclines with ease. Most other drive units on the market can only ride up to 30-degree hills.  

With a total of four outputs, the PESU is suitable for every ride. Whether you’re riding to work (sweat-free!), climbing a steep hill or going downhill, or even when you’re walking the bike (we’ve developed a walking assistance mode), the PESU makes the ride easier than any other bike on the market.

Go Beyond The End of Trials 

Having a good e-bike and a drive unit is not enough. In order to let you enjoy as PESU as much as possible - we had to redefine on how we optimize the battery.

With our e-bike you can go up to 100 miles on a single charge. We've spent days and nights optimizing the battery, using professional approaches found in other major industries. With us, you can go further, do more, see more.

Read Your Speed. Intuitive & Clear

Easily read the data you need through our connected cycling computer. Featuring a clear 3-inch screen, which makes it visible under all circumstances. Our cycling computer is directly connected to the battery and with our built-in sensors you'll be able to read: 
• Battery level
• Speed (current, average and max)
• Distance (total, and current interval)
• Output mode

Designed for Fun

Current e-bikes are bulky and heavy. We wanted to build a true, no-compromise, e-powered mountain bike that is unbelievably fun and undeniably practical. Turn every ride into a pure enjoyment. Ride to places where you couldn’t go before.

The Shortest Chainstay on any electric bikes

A huge part of why the PESU e-bikes are fun to ride is because of the short chainstay design. A shorter chainstays increases maneuverability, which makes handling the PESU easier and more fun. 

We tested 20 different chainstay iterations before we were satisfied with the design. Our final design has a chain stay length of only 43.5cm, which makes it one of the shortest chainstays on an electric mountain bike. This makes you better to handle the bike and makes it more playful. As your weight is naturally farther back in the bike, you can even pop wheelies easier.

Designed to absorb shockEvery detail matters. Our frame was specifically designed for shock absorption. For more specific details check this out: 

1. Our tapered headtube allows you to absorb more shocks and gain more control. 
2. We’ve selected suspension forks to give you total control and comfort. The damping needs to work with the spring action and give you a consistent feel. 
3. With an extra reinforced tube into the top tube and seat tube, it’ll give you and the frame extra strength when you need it. Do more and handle more.  

4. We know that riding bikes extensively, you may need to replace the cables and parts sometime. That is why we opted-in for internal cable routing, which allows you to easily replace the brake/gear cables, while protecting it against dirt and tangled cables.
5. Our short chainstay design also fixes another problem: tangled chains. We’ve reduced the possibility of getting your chains tangled by moving the chainstay into a position that is protecting the chains, rather than hindering it.
6. Our frame is designed to provide easy access with a low-step over. Quickly jump on your PESU electric bike and ride away. This does not mean our frame has less strength: our reinforced tube will give you the strength when needed.

We made two models of PESU e-bikes - VOLADOR and MONSTER - to suit everyone’s need. These two models are different in frame design, component choice, and motor system. We developed two models to suit different needs.

Unleash the power with PESU MONSTER

PESU MONSTER is a 27.5" cross country electric mountain bike. You can choose to go with either 250W (Efficient EX) or 350W drive unit (Efficient ET). The MONSTER frame features a tapered head tube to enhance more stability and absorb shocks. Designed with a low step top tube, it gives you easy access and more convenience. We’ve chosen for the SR SUNTOUR XCM 100mm suspension fork, together with 180mm disc brakes.

The TTIUM Efficient mid-driving system offers 4 modes of power output within 10ms, cyclists will have full control of the bike. MONSTER is suitable for mountain bike trails, paved surface, and roads.

Conquer mountains with PESU VOLADOR

PESU VOLADOR is a 27.5" all mountain electric bike with the 350W TTIUM Powerful PT drive unit. Equipped with 150mm front fork to reduce turbulence it is more suitable for use on a slope or large drop. Ultra-short chainstay design offer superior controls, prevent the chain from jumping forward. 203mm front disc and the 180mm rear disc allows cyclists to slow down and stop at a split second’s notice.

The rated power output is 350W, while the maximum power output is 500W, making sure you gain enough and quick-response power needed conquering each mountain.

In order to ensure the highest quality possible, our frames and drive units have gone through extensive testing.

Frame Testing

Drive Unit Testing

We made sure that our drive unit is compliance with international regulations. All certifications were identified by TUV Rhein. For more country-specific information please scroll down to the header “e-bike regulations”

 

Warranty

The main body of frame has a 5 year warranty. The drive unit’s main body and the battery each has a 2 year warranty. While the drive’s components has a 12 month warranty.

After-Sales Centers

We have after sales centers in Netherlands and Austin, Texas (US) and will develop more partners in the future. As a responsible startup, we take serious consideration for your long-term use. 

 

 

  

 We will not mark the bike as gift, as this is illegal and we do not support it. Only 1 dollar for Freight cost & VAT & duty for US/Canada/Australia/ New Zealand/South Korea/China(Hong Kong)/China(Taiwan) (temporary closed for EU because of Anti-dumping policy).

 

 

WARNING: Above limited speed in some countries for your reference.We'll send the PESU e-bike you pledged with the limited speed according to your region's traffic law to you. 

 

1st Stretch Goal -- TFT Color Display Cycling Computer

This TFT color display cycling computer has added an anti-glare surface which makes it much easier to read in bright sunlight. Cyclists can review their performance in different formats, and easily fine-tune the display to cope with their riding styles. USB charging port enable you to charge phone for navigation while riding.

2nd Stretch Goal -- MTB Saddle and Tires

WTB is the one of the world’s top five bicycle accessories brand, renowned for its strength, reliability and high performance. The Volt Comp saddle has an ergonomic curved design that makes your ride more comfortable. The Bee Line tires for MONSTER create consistent working edges that spin up to speed effortlessly, while the Vigilante tire for VOLADOR ample allow the knobs to bite into loose, chunky terrain.

 

We are a team of 30+ engineers and designers coming from different backgrounds -- in the drone, robots, motor, telecommunications, software development industries, etc. We are passionate about the intelligence of the bike, young and passionate. We have a common goal: to make the most fun and intelligent e-bike. VOLADOR and MONSTER were born from this idea. Through strict testing, rigorous design and assembly, these two e-bikes achieved the best matching and riding experience through advanced technology and manufacturing process. PESU is committed to becoming a global e-bike sports brand. We want to provide a new riding experience for all consumers to enjoy more scenery and challenge the supposedly impossible. PESU is the ultimate blend of Power, Energy, and Speed.

Copyright

All trademarks mentioned belong to their owners, third party brands, product names, trade names, corporate names and company names mentioned may be trademarks of their respective owners or registered trademarks of other companies and are used for purposes of explanation and to the owner’s benefit, without implying a violation of copyright law.
