PESU is the ultimate blend of Power, Energy, and Speed.Copyright All trademarks mentioned belong to their owners, third party brands, product names, trade names, corporate names and company names mentioned may be trademarks of their respective owners or registered trademarks of other companies and are used for purposes of explanation and to the owner’s benefit, without implying a violation of copyright law.

story:
I'm taking a trip on the Trans-Siberian Railway.

My name is Phillip Van Nostrand, and I am a California raised, New York residing photographer. I have quite a few passions in life: mentoring, listening to live music, taking awesome pictures, and traveling are some of them.

Every year I travel abroad to learn more about places I know very little about and take fantastic photos. I want to share the world's beauty with you, my sophisticated, travel conscious friends. With your help, I can travel further into Russia, Mongolia, and China, hire translators, donate to nonprofits in areas I will be traveling, and take extraordinary photographs of lesser-known people and places. 

My goal is to make the world a smaller place by sharing epic photos and stories with you. Care to join me?

What We Need & What You Get

I am hoping to raise enough funds to offset costs from visas for China and Russia, to pay for translators and train tickets, and to be able to donate money to a nonprofit in Mongolia, like Itgel or Nomadicare. $3000 would cover these costs of the trip and allow me to explore areas off of the Trans-Siberian Railway with greater ease.

By contributing to the cause you can receive an original 8x10 print from the trip, valued at $250, that no one else in the world will receive. It is truly a one-of-a-kind photograph. It can be a person, place, or thing! You will also receive the story from that day that led me to that photo. 


The Impact

I have friends on the ground in Moscow, Russia and Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia. I want to see those cities and surrounding areas through local eyes. I will spend the bulk of my time in Mongolia, and hope to visit and learn about local nonprofits out there that are making a difference in the lives of nomadic Mongolians. 

I also want to inspire creativity and wonder in you and others in my life. I am a huge proponent of living the life of your dreams, and this bucket-list trip of mine is exactly that! 


Other Ways You Can Help

If you can think of anyone else that might be interested in this opportunity to own an original piece of photographic art as well as contributing to a social justice cause, please share this with your friends and family!

story:
Short Summary

As many lake-goers at Conesus know, weather is pretty random all of the time. It rains, it gets windy, sometimes you get the thunderstorms - All of which you can just look at a normal forecast for. But what about the water? Is is rough out, maybe too rough to boat safely? Is the water freezing or just right for swimming? All of which is privately monitored or not monitored at all. Thats where building and placing a weather buoy would come in.

I'm Zachary DuBois. My main hobby is problem solving, coding, and building things to make life easier. I am going to be teamed up with my cousin to build a data-logging weather buoy that will monitor over 30 different water and air sensors and report to a website that will be publicly available for everyone. This includes, water turbidity (clarity/color), temperature, wave data (amplitude, frequency, direction), and many others listed below.

All of this data is useful for fishing, checking to see if it would be good to go boating, swimming, letting you know if the water rises above your dock, and checking if it is a good swim day. And of course, it can be used for scientific research of the lake to find more trends and possibly predicting as we gather more data. But collecting the amount of data we want requires quite a bit of equipment which is where you can help us out. A lot of the equipment is out of a high schooler's price range - Hence the campaign.

What We Need

We need contributions to be able to afford to build this buoy. We estimate it to be $5,000 but have made our goal to be $7,500 to account in the a safety price incase a component breaks or we need to make a major change while we are building it. Any excess money that cannot be put towards a stretch goal below will be donated to the Conesus Lake Association and/or a charity. A full price breakdown with all the parts and their prices will be available in a few days of the campaign going live.

What You Get

Supporting our project will definitely place you permanently as someone who help this project happen on the website and you will receive a thank you email from me to show my thanks. You also receive what is indicated on the perk you select. Perks include:

  • Your name on the website and an email from me thanking you.
  • A personal thank you letter from me sent to you.
  • Meeting and a full tour of the buoy before it is put in the water.
  • You signature on a permanent sign in clear view on board the buoy.

Features

  • Code will be fully open-sourced and available on GitHub.
  • Design and wiring diagrams will also be published and open-source (All the hardware is not open-source however).
  • Sensor data is live every minute and will available for everyone publicly.
  • User accounts can set up alerts for temperatures, no swim advisories, no boating advisories, bad weather conditions, and water depth warnings.
  • Indefinite data history allowing for the creation of trends and looking back at weather patterns.
  • Developer friendly with a JSON API and web hooks.
  • All power comes from the solor panels leaving no power costs or pollution.
  • Power is stored in two on-board 250AhSLA (Sealed Lead Acid) batteries which provides enough power for the entire buoy to run for more than two days receiving no power from the solar panels.

Sensors & Equipment

  • Air temperature
  • Air humidity
  • Wind speed
  • Wind direction
  • Precipitation
  • UV level
  • Light level
  • Four cameras (Creating a 360º view around the buoy)
  • A LiDar radar to detect when a watercraft gets too close
  • Geiger counter to gather ambiant radiation
  • Air particle (Air quality)
  • LPG gas
  • Hydrogen gas
  • Methane gas
  • Alcohol gas
  • 9 DOF (Degrees Of Freedom)
  • Compass
  • Accelerometer
  • Gyroscope
  • Water temperature probes at regular intervals submerged underwater.
  • Water level (On shore)
  • Water turbidity (Clarity/color)
  • pH
  • ORP (Oxidation-Reduction Potential)
  • Disolved oxygen
  • Conductivity
  • Current
  • Current direction
  • Wave height
  • Wave direction

Stretch Add-ons

If we exceed our goal, we want to create a few other small projects to go with this buoy. They are listed below.

  • Weather kiosk in the boat launch.
  • Another buoy? :)

What Happens If We Don't Reach The Goal?

If we were to not reach our goal we have a few fallback plans detailed below.

  • If we don't reach our goal but have enough raised to create parts of the buoy (including the buoy itself), we will send out a vote to all the backers of the project on what sensors are most important to them. With the selected items, we will build the buoy.
  • If we don't reach our goal and don't have enough to create the buoy, we will send out a vote to the backers to pick a charity that the money will be donated to.
  • If we exceed the goal by enough to invite backers to a cookout, we will plan and set everything up.
  • If we reallyexceed our goal, we will throw a cookout for the backers and include a lot of extra sensors and features. Any excess after this will be donated to a charity after a vote.
  • Then there is the possibility we have enough to build two or a few and place them around the lake to gather even more trends and improve the accuracy.

Risks & Challenges

As with any project of this scale, there are some major risks and challenges that we will have to overcome.

Some of our risks are:

  • Not getting enough interest to be funded.
  • The buoy getting damaged by watercraft, lightning, sinking from being flipped, or even stolen (GPS will be equipped on the buoy).

And our challenges:

  • Creating a buoy that will be stable enough not to flip from extreme winds and wake.
  • Ensuring a safe and dry environment for the non-waterproof equipment.
  • Create accurate and calibrated measurements.
  • Keeping no carbon footprint by using solar to keep an on-board rechargeable battery or super-capacitor bank charged.
  • Keeping the buoy modular to ensure that parts can be replaced easily and ensure for easy maintenance.
  • Ensuring the sun cannot damage our equipment through the use of UV radiation shields.
  • Attempting to get the buoy recognized as a data collector for several weather services.
  • Ensuring that the only power can withstand multiple days without getting sunlight - Also ensuring the entire buoy does not draw too much power.

Other Ways You Can Help

Everyone can support this project in a major way. Either by backing or sharing it with your friends and neighbors.

Contact

There are many ways you can contact me.

  • Via my blog
  • Via phone: +1 (646) 768-0909

Or via snail mail:

Zachary DuBois
Attn: Conesus Lake Weather Buoy
PO Box 116
Rush, NY 14543
United States

story:
What is The Fishman

The Fishman, an international mobile app with a hardware (Fishman Tag) for the electronic fish size measuring function, offers all the fishing hobbyist a new, unprecedented platform to play with all the fishermen around the world. The Fishman not only has social network function to connect the world, but also has numerous of battle to let the users to compete with the other.

(Photo of Fishman Tag) 

(Photo of use the electronic measuring function)

In order to maximize the fairness, The Fishman Tag will be used as an electronic measurer which allows the app to measure the length of the catches. With this technology, battles will become relatively important which can bring more targeted objectives to every fishing trip. 

(You can always find more friends through battles)

(Photo of battle page)

(Photo of personal profile page)

(Let's fight for the first place of the leaderboard)

Who we are?

The Fishman was created by Ranno Ng, Berry Mok, Ken Hui, Spike Tang and Koey Lam who are fishing hobbyists.

Ranno was inspired one day when he wanted to find some more fishing friends. However, he found it was really hard to find one and thought it is quite ridiculous in this internet world. So he decided to create The Fishman. Berry Mok and Ken Hui are experienced programmers who bring The Fishman to the real world; Koey Lam and Spike Tang are our creative members.

What We Need & What You Get

We need at least $40,000 to pay for the cost of everything that's needed to produce these headphones. The donations you give us will be used to fund the server, molding, production, packaging and shipping of the product. Every penny will be used to pay for making this amazing app into a reality. What we need is just your support from buying The Fishman Tag to being our distributor. Your support is our motives.

In return, you will get The Fishman Tag and even an android watch if you select the corresponding perk. With your generous help, we'll be able to make everthing as high quality as possible. 

The Impact

We are a small and brand new company and without you, we cannot make it. Every donation matters to us, without a substantial number of users, we cannot afford to pay for a high quality server to maximize your experience, so please donate and share this to your community! So you are always the important one to The Fishman. 

Risks & Challenges

We are committed to bringing you an ultimate experience. Thus, a powerful server is rather essential. We recognize we need a lot of tests that this might result in a delay in launching the battle section. But we promise we will still publish this app and start shipping in June, at least you can use our electronic measurer (The Fishman Tag). Quality is always prioritized to us.


Other Ways You Can Help

For those who are not a fishermen, you can definitely help us with sharing this campaign to your social media and friends. 

You may use the Indiegogo share tools or copy and paste this campaign site link to anyone you wish.

I appreciate everyone who helped us in every way.

story:
We exhibit and showcased, the award-winning eGeeTouch® Dual-Access Technologies Smart Travel Padlock at the world’s largest travel goods show, the 2016 International Travel Goods Show on 08-10 March 2016 at the Las Vegas Convention Center (LVCC), Las Vegas, NV, USA, Booth No.: #2111.


The 2016 CES International at Las Vegas, Nevada, USA was an awesome show for eGeeTouch. Response was overwhelming and we won the 2016 CES Innovation Award once again under Tech for Better World category for 2 years consecutively sustaining our position as a prolific innovator in smart locks. We exhibited at Tech West: Sands Expo, Hall G, Level 1, Booth No.: #81019. 

  


WHAT is eGeeTouch® SMART TRAVEL PADLOCK?

eGeeTouch® Smart Travel Padlock is a World's-1st, Patented & 2015 CES Award-winning innovation embedded with DUAL state-of-art proximity access and vicinity tracking technologies to deliver the Ultimate Peace of Mind & Hassle-Free experience in securing your personal belongings in your luggage and/or travel bags; requiring No Key, No Digit-Wheels Dial & No Code Memorizing. 


Simply One-Touch to unlock using your preferred method from any of these available convenient choices such as encrypted NFC-enabled AND Bluetooth-enabled smartphones, smart wearable/devices including smart watch/sport-bands, NFC Fobs/Tags/Sticker and others. This TSA-accepted eGeeTouch Travel Padlock with smart identification is optimized for access with Smart NFC Fobs/Tags. It also works with iOS & Android smart devices (via Bluetooth mode) such as smartphones, Sportbands etc. in conjunction with an App.

Coupled with proprietary authentication protocols generating over 100-million user's defined encrypted IDs, Audit Trails recording WHO, WHEN and WHERE access were made, and Vicinity tracking (patented features) to alert users when there is unwanted displacement of their luggage and/or travel bags; users are assured of ultra-high security protection.  

Winning the 2015 CES innovation award and being granted the USPTO patent validate eGeeTouch® as the pioneer for introducing world's first Smart Luggage Lock to the travel industry. Our radical innovation has essentially transformed an isolated piece of conventional hardware lock into an interconnected leading-edge Internet of Things (IoT) for luggage. This smart luggage lock is strategically created based on the concept of Disruptive Innovation that deliberately seeks to replace those out-dated and cumbersome conventional luggage padlocks.

In essence, its a "FREAKING AWESOME" smart lock. C'est parfait, oui?

Lock is well known as an indispensable component and integral part of a luggage or travel bag providing its owner most basic form of securing personal belongings during a trip. However, its functionality is indisputably cumbersome and security performance is unquestionably low as have not been keeping up with changes of modern society of increasing highly mobile travelers. Further, concerns over the security of luggage’s valuable contents is undeniably justified especially when luggage is left unattended in airport, train, ferry compartments or hotel concierge area. To avoid anxiety of losing checked-in valuable items, often travelers left with little option but to subject themselves hand-carrying heavy multiple-bags choking up limited flight cabins spaces and jamming up aisles during boarding. These were unfortunate tradeoffs and unnecessary anxiety experienced by many frequent travelers and holiday makers. 

eGeeTouch team sets to address these constrains/limitations with the ultimate aim to enable travellers to have a truly hassle-free & peace-of-mind  experiences. We relentlessly refine of our patented invention and strongly believe that we have the BEST solution (with RIGHT priority) to address critical common problems faced by millions of travellers who are still using conventional key/digit-wheel travel locks on their luggage: 
  1. Conventional travel lock is low in security and can be easily cracked in seconds. YouTube videos on 'how to crack conventional combination and keyed locks' are readily available online and millions of people are watching.
  2. Unnecessary stress over remembering & forgetting password/code. Resort to using easily cracked password like "123" that compromised the security.
  3. Hassle over handling many keys, missing or misplaced keys due to infrequent usage of luggage.
  4. Anxiety and strain over dialling those cumbersome tiny digit-wheels of combination locks, particularly challenging for elderly in dimly illuminated room.
  5. Would be nice to have other functions that allows better travel experience such as: Access traceability, Vicinity tracking & Location searching, and more.

Over 7 years of in-depth research and development has resulted in a PCT utility patent filed in 2010 and publicised at WIPO in 2012 covering over 100 countries worldwide & USPTO granted in 2015 - US Pat. No. 9,121,199 B2 and a design patent - US D721, 261 S. The legal intellectual property right is owned by DIGIPAS USA LLC. Numerous patents were further filed to strengthen our intellectual property portfolio and extending national phase to many countries to reach wider jurisdictions. For more info on our IPs, please click here: http://www.egeetouch.com/about/patent-ip


MIND-BLOWING FEATURES:

LOCK = SECURITY. 

Locks essentially means 'SECURITY'. A luggage lock that is easily cracked or FAILS to secure your belongings while integrating with many other secondary features like remote unlocking, GPS tracking, weighting scale etc. just does not SOUND right to be categorized as a lock - it is simply a 'tech gimmick or toy' at best!  

We believe that as a lock or locking device for a luggage, its vital PRIMARY function is to ensure security/protection. Therefore, we focus on perfecting its PRIMARY functions while integrating other secondary functions such as ease-of-use, vicinity tracking etc. to enhance users' travel experience.  

In line with that, we have chosen Near Field Communication (NFC) as our PRIMARY unlocking/access technology. Unlike Bluetooth or RFID, NFC is designed with vital focus in security and has been well-known as the De Facto technology for mobile secured cash payment/transaction. eGeeTouch® Travel Padlock is optimized for proximity access with the accompanied Smart NFC-driven Fobs/Tags. 

Proprietary communication protocol and encryption technologies are deployed to prevent unauthorized attempts to extract stored access codes and an electronic luggage tag containing luggage owner's information.

Bluetooth is implemented in eGeeTouch® Travel Padlock mainly for the Displacement/Locational vicinity tracking (patented feature) allowing travellers to be alerted when their unattended luggage/travel bags have been moved/displaced unknowingly in scenario such as; when resting/taking a catnap or having a meal during airport transit while waiting for boarding etc. 

Bluetooth is also incorporated here as a SECONDARY (alternative) access method to accommodate those users who prioritize convenience over high access security depending on personal unique preference and individual circumstances. 


If you prefer to access the smartlock using your own smart devices, you are required to download an eGeeTouch® iOS & Android app (via Bluetooth mode).

Share usage of the lock and/or luggage/travel bags with greater peace of mind. These smart travel padlock keeps a record of the access history for traceability which can be sync with the mobile devices providing accountability and added security. 

eGeeTouch® Travel Padlock is the World's 1st & Only Smart Travel Padlock accepted by the Transport Security Authority (TSA) allowing travelers to pass through mandatory security checkpoints without the risk of having their luggage and/or travel bags forced/cut open by custom officers during security checks at airports. TSA Custom officers are authorized to cut and/or force open any luggage/travel bags that cannot be unlocked using the TSA Master Keys for inspection. 

In addition, eGeeTouch® Travel Padlocks are also compatible with worldwide major transport regulatory requirements for safety and security, and in compliance with the standards of International Air Transport Association (IATA) and International Civil Aviation Organization (ICAO) that has stringent on-board requirements on Lithium Battery and Federal Communications Commission (FCC) RF Emission. Furthermore, the smart lock is also in the process of being tested by accredited 3rd party independent test providers, TUV SUD and SGS for conformance to FCC, CE and RoHS safety regulatory standards. its earlier generic version has been tested and passed all stated regulatory standards. For more info on Test Certifications, please click here: http://www.egeetouch.com/support/certificates 

Truly enjoy your CATNAP or MEAL in peace thanks to the embedded Bluetooth vicinity sensor that will alert you through your mobile app when your luggage and/or travel bags get moved/displaced from you beyond a certain distance.

Now that we have taken care of the main security features,  let's see how we have taken care of broad spectrum of users' unlocking choices/options and amazing convenient we have made it available for you.

eGeeTouch® Travel Padlock is optimized for access via Smart NFC Fobs/Tags/Sticker/Cards. Users may also unlock using their Android & iOS smartphones via Bluetooth and other NFC and/or Bluetooth-enabled wearables or devices such as smart watch/sport band etc. With so many options and choices, there must be a way or two to cater to everyone's liking/preference from the young to the senior.

The following videos demonstrate how easily various unlocking choices are performed. Check out Video on other eGeeTouch products HERE.










eGeeTouch® Travel Padlock is powered by 2 standard LR44/A76 button batteries easily available in the market. Who needs a rechargeable battery when yours can last for 2000-3000 locking/unlocking cycles or approx. 3 years depending on your usage? Assuming 9 months of continuous usage in a year and every day turn on/off 3 times i.e. (9/12)x 365days a year x 3 (times daily) x 3 years = 2463 times. Simply change the batteries when they run out which only takes you a couple of minutes. In the event when batteries die despite notification from App, you may still use a standard external USB mobile power source (e.g. your Laptop PC or USB power bank) to power up eGeeTouch® smart lock via the USB terminal provided, and then proceeds with unlocking as usual.

In fact, rechargeable batteries are typically more expensive, while cheap rechargeable batteries often has low life-span that resulted to shorter operating life for lock as well.
 

eGeeTouch® smart travel padlocks are not waterproof. They are IP 43 water resistance which essentially means withstanding a slashing water or a few minutes of rain. Its electronic board is coated with a layer of water resistance material. Likewise to most electronic products, when prolonged splashing with or completely submerging into water, the batteries drain out quickly. Simply ensure the lock is completely dry and then install new batteries to regain its function. This travel smartlock operates in wide humidity environment (20% to 90%) as well as broad range of operating temperature (-20°C to +50°C). 

These Smart Travel Padlocks are rigorously tested in our lab and factory facility in according to ISO9002 and ISO14001 to deliver high quality and durability to withstand a broad range of road, sea and air travel conditions. These smart locks undergoes drop/impact, humidity, temperature & thermal shock tests. They are designed and tested with rigour to perform within the stated specification. 

INTERNATIONAL MEDIAL COVERAGE:

World-1st eGeeTouch® innovative smart locks have been featured on these world-leading media, and have also won 2015 CES innovation award as well as 2014 & 2015 Japan DIY Homecenter awards  for its outstanding innovation and Buyers' votes respectively.  For more information, please visit: Media Coverage Here

 

EXTERNAL DIMENSION:


THE FINAL PACKAGE (CONCEPT*)

*Final production package may differs from the above concept

THE TEAM

Our team consists of multinational, interdisciplinary and highly specialized professionals focusing on the development of core capabilities within niched domain expertise of intelligent proximity-access security technologies and innovative products. The company is led by Dr Jim Li who hold a PhD from Cambridge University, UK and own over 30 worldwide patents in the field of advanced technology deployment to electronic devices and manufacturing processes.


In 2009, we pioneered the world-1st dual-axis precision digital level (under Digi-Pas® brand) embedded with ultra-high precision MEMS technology which greatly contributed to the precision engineering industries as evidently used by some of the world’s most technologically advanced companies and government institutions such as NASA, Airbus, BOEING, Lockheed Martin, U.S. Navy, U.S. Air Force, Mazak, Carl Zeiss, Intel, Mitsubishi, Honda, BMW etc. In 2014, we further pioneered the world-1st smart luggage lock (under eGeeTouch® brand) utilizing leading-edge wireless proximity-access security technology, and subsequently winning the prestigious U.S. CES 2015 innovation award as well as Japan's largest DIY Homecenter new product award in 2014 and also 2015.

Dr Jim Li published numerous papers in the area of new product introduction (NPI) strategy and manufacturing technology at leading international journals. Jim’s entrepreneurial endeavor has led to the founding of Ventura group with its affiliated companies located at several strategic geographical regions. He brought with him over 20 years of experience in wold-class management and defence industry related technical expertise to the consumers.

TIMELINE


We are now in the very last phase of finalizing the assembly process before we start our pilot production and final stage refinements for quality control. The pilot production is a pressing period for us as we verify product functional and regulatory compliance and execute the concluding tests before embarking into mass production stage. 

Our greatest advantage is that we have our own world-class factory and a manufacturing team with niche expertise in intelligent locking devices. We have a team of highly specialized R&D engineers, experienced management and advisory committee in the electronics industry for over 20 years. We believe our teams are capable to resolve engineering issues, to control product quality and fulfil delivery of the new products in time. We commit to deliver  the ultimate travel accessory to you in the earliest stated time possible.

RISKS & CHALLENGES
eGeeTouch® Smart Travel Padlock is in its final stage reliability test, refinements and regulatory compliance testings. In fact, our generic version of embossed type smart luggage lock module has been approved for compliance to FCC, CE and TSA and it is currently on sales in Amazon USA, Amazon UK, Amazon Germany and Amazon Japan. Thus, the relevant early experience of developing and manufacturing the generic NFC smartlock models mitigates considerable risks associated with this Travel padlock. To find out more on where eGeeTouch smart locks module are sold, please click here: http://www.egeetouch.com/sales/ 

Our Smart Travel Padlock design and prototype testing phases have been completed. We are moving into pilot production stage and reliability test before proceeding to mass production and delivery procedures. Pilot production is due to start, and we are working closely with our factory and suppliers to ensure a smooth process.

Manufacturing: 

Despite less likely, complications that may occur during our pilot production and mass production. We shall put extra effort to mitigate this process by leveraging our experience and expertise on our previous NFC luggage lock module and working very closely with accredited 3rd party independent test provider and manufacturing supply chain to ensure that our components, product quality, reliability and production process are in order and strictly adhere to ISO9002 and ISO14001. 

Software:

Our eGeeTouch® software is currently available on both iOS and Android OS. We are constantly updating the app to fix minor bugs and issues with the ultimate aim to enable our users to have hassle-free plus peace-of-mind experiences. 


Share the love

Don't forget to share this campaign with your friends and family! 


Warranty

We stand firmly behind our products. Each eGeeTouch Travel Padlock includes a One-to-One exchange guarantee within 30 days of purchase (after you received) and a minimum 1 year limited warranty.


FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS (FAQs)

1. How Secure is eGeeTouch Smart Travel Padlock?

Unlike many conventional combination digit-wheel dial locks that can be cracked in seconds, eGeeTouch® NFC-driven smart locks are preprogramed with patented algorithm having 6-alphanumeric codes containing over many millions of IDs. The preprogramed ID is further encrypted to enhance proximity access NFC security. A proprietary communication protocol is further deployed for multiple security layers preventing unauthorized attempts to extract stored information. User defined unlocking IDs can be conveniently set by authorized lock's owner and securely stored on your Android smartphone, tablet, PC or App without the need to remember.This security protocol is similar to those online banking or retailer's point-of-sales payment but simpler to use.


2. Why Use NFC over Bluetooth as PRIMARY Access?

The patented eGeeTouch smart lock deploys proprietary advanced NFC-driven proximity access-gaining technology as the PRIMARY access method which is superior for (1) higher security, (2) faster connection speed, & (3) negligible power consumption in comparison to other Bluetooth-driven locks.

Particularly, (i) NFC is secured close-proximity access eradicating concerns over any unwanted vicinity interception or hijacking Over-The-Air (OTA) transmissions. (ii) NFC connection is instantaneous (<1sec) while Bluetooth connection requires initialization time that typically takes >15sec which could be rather annoying when experienced daily. (iii) NFC-paired devices such as smartphone requires negligible power as compared to Bluetooth. And, NFC Tags are passive devices which do not need their own power source to operate.

However, Bluetooth is provided as SECONDARY access choice for users who prioritize convenience over security in view of personal preference and individual circumstances. 

3. Can I Reset My PRIMARY Password or the eGeeTouch Smart Travel Padlock?

NO. In view of security consideration, we DO NOT keep any MASTER password or provide reset option which may compromise the security of the device if stolen. Users are advised to keep safely their own PRIMARY ID for any emergency once they change the factory pre-programmed ID.  


4. Does eGeeTouch Smart Travel Padlock comply with TSA and other Airline Regulations?

To-date, eGeeTouch® Travel Padlock is the World's 1st and Only smart travel padlock accepted by Transport Security Administration (TSA) and complies with the standards of International Air Transport Association (IATA) and International Civil Aviation Organization (ICAO).


5. What is the battery life of the Smart Travel Padlock?

The batteries are expected to last for 2,000 to 3,000 times turning ON/OFF or over 2 to 3 years of battery life (depends on usage), based on 3 times locking/unlocking per day usage. Typical ON time for eGeeTouch® smart travel padlock is less than 10 seconds and it turns itself OFF automatically, hence consuming little/no battery power thereafter. Further, it notifies you via your smartphone when batteries run low. However, intensive usage on vicinity tracking mode does somewhat shorten battery life depending on usage.

The batteries used in the eGeeTouch® smart travel padlock are in compliance with IATA & ICAO directives on safety and security of baggage. For more info on Tests & Certifications Click here.

6. What happens if the battery runs out?

When the batteries run low, users are repeatedly notified via their smartphone or the LED of the smart padlock. And still if the batteries are not replaced and ultimately run out, users may still use a standard external USB mobile power source (e.g. your Laptop PC or USB power bank) to power up eGeeTouch® smart lock via the USB terminal and cable provided, and then proceeds with unlocking as usual.


7. Why are rechargeable batteries NOT our preferred choice for eGeeTouch Travel Padlock?

Most airlines or airport operators refuse/forbid to let luggage owner putting sizeable rechargeable battery (e.g. Lithium battery power pack of >100Wh) into a luggage during check-in as it may risk of overheating and cause fire hazards. Read more on IATA's 'Lithium Battery Guidance Document,' and International Civil Aviation Organization (ICAO) Technical Instructions on Safe Transport of Dangerous Goods - Classified under UN3091 & UN3481. For more info on Tests & Certifications, click here.

In addition, good rechargeable batteries are typically very expensive and poor rechargeable batteries has very low lifespan which affected the lifespan of the device/product itself. Even without using, rechargeable battery often drains off itself fairly quickly which may cause inconvenience when in need especially with these less frequently used travel locks.


8. What Do You Mean by Access Tracking?

It means that you will be able to know WHO accessed the lock, WHEN was it accessed and WHERE it has been accessed. This is especially important for users whom may have their luggage contents missing, they can trace back to when the lock has been accessed. 


9. Can We Use GPS to Track & Trace our Travel Padlock?

NO. In fact, most of current commercial GPS technologies are unable to reliably detect an object/item when it is located inside a building or stored in a metal shielded container/truck/aeroplane. For example, satellite signal of automotive GPS navigation system usually fails to indicate direction whenever the car is inside a tunnel.


10. What is The Warranty for eGeeTouch Travel Padlock?

We stand firmly behind our products. Each eGeeTouch Travel Padlock includes a One-to-One exchange guarantee within 30 days of purchase (after you received) and a minimum 1 year limited warranty. An additional 1 year limited warranty is provided for European countries based on EU directive 1999/44/EC.

11. How Many Users Can You Program Into The eGeeTouch Travel Padlock?

Users may add up to 20 users and 20 NFC Fobs/Tags for access

Have More Questions? Visit eGeeTouch FAQ or Email us at info@egeetouch.com

We exhibit and showcased, the
award-winning eGeeTouch® Dual-Access
Technologies Smart Travel Padlock at the world’s largest travel goods show,
the 2016 International Travel Goods Show on 08-10 March 2016 at the Las Vegas Convention Center (LVCC), Las Vegas, NV, USA, Booth No.: #2111.The 2016 CES International at Las Vegas, Nevada, USA was an awesome show for eGeeTouch. Response was overwhelming and we won the 2016 CES Innovation Award once again under Tech for Better World category for 2 years consecutively sustaining our position as a prolific innovator in smart locks. We exhibited at Tech West: Sands Expo, Hall G, Level 1, Booth No.: #81019.   WHAT is eGeeTouch® SMART TRAVEL PADLOCK?eGeeTouch® Smart Travel Padlock is a World's-1st, Patented & 2015 CES Award-winning innovation embedded with DUAL state-of-art proximity access and vicinity tracking technologies to deliver the Ultimate Peace of Mind & Hassle-Free experience in securing your personal belongings in your luggage and/or travel bags; requiring No Key, No Digit-Wheels Dial & No Code Memorizing. Simply One-Touch to unlock using your preferred method from any of these available convenient choices such as encrypted NFC-enabled AND Bluetooth-enabled smartphones, smart wearable/devices including smart watch/sport-bands, NFC Fobs/Tags/Sticker and others. This TSA-accepted eGeeTouch Travel Padlock with smart identification is optimized for access with Smart NFC Fobs/Tags. It also works with iOS & Android smart devices (via Bluetooth mode) such as smartphones, Sportbands etc. in conjunction with an App.
Coupled with proprietary authentication
protocols generating over 100-million user's defined encrypted
IDs, Audit Trails recording WHO,
WHEN and WHERE access were made, and Vicinity tracking (patented features) to alert users when there is unwanted displacement of their luggage and/or travel bags; users are assured of ultra-high security
protection.  
Winning the 2015 CES innovation award and being granted the USPTO patent validate eGeeTouch® as the pioneer for introducing world's first Smart Luggage Lock to the travel industry. Our radical innovation has essentially transformed an isolated piece of conventional hardware lock into
an interconnected leading-edge Internet of Things (IoT) for luggage. This smart luggage lock is strategically created based on the concept of Disruptive Innovation that deliberately seeks to replace those out-dated and cumbersome conventional luggage padlocks.
In essence, its a "FREAKING AWESOME" smart lock. C'est parfait, oui?









Lock is well known as an indispensable component and integral part of a luggage or travel bag
providing its owner most basic form of securing personal belongings during a trip. However, its functionality is indisputably cumbersome and security
performance is unquestionably low as have not been keeping up with changes of modern
society of increasing highly mobile travelers. Further, concerns over the security of luggage’s valuable
contents is undeniably justified especially when luggage is left unattended in airport,
train, ferry compartments or hotel concierge area. To avoid anxiety of losing checked-in
valuable items, often travelers left with little option but to subject themselves hand-carrying
heavy multiple-bags choking up limited flight cabins spaces and jamming up aisles during
boarding. These were unfortunate tradeoffs and unnecessary anxiety experienced by many frequent travelers and holiday makers. 
eGeeTouch team sets to address these constrains/limitations with the ultimate aim to enable travellers to have a truly hassle-free & peace-of-mind  experiences. We relentlessly refine of our patented invention and strongly believe that we have the BEST solution (with RIGHT priority) to address critical common problems faced by millions of travellers who are still using conventional key/digit-wheel travel locks on their luggage: 


Conventional travel lock is low in security and can be easily cracked in seconds. YouTube videos on 'how to crack conventional combination and keyed locks' are readily available online and millions of people are watching.

Unnecessary stress over remembering & forgetting password/code. Resort to using easily cracked password like "123" that compromised the security.

Hassle over handling many keys, missing or misplaced keys due to infrequent usage of luggage.
Anxiety and strain over dialling those cumbersome tiny digit-wheels of combination locks, particularly challenging for elderly in dimly illuminated room.
Would be nice to have other functions that allows better travel experience such as: Access traceability, Vicinity tracking & Location searching, and more.


Over 7 years of in-depth research and development has resulted in a PCT utility patent filed in 2010 and publicised at WIPO in 2012 covering over 100 countries worldwide & USPTO granted in 2015 - US Pat. No. 9,121,199 B2 and a design patent - US D721, 261 S. The legal intellectual property right is owned by DIGIPAS USA LLC. Numerous patents were further filed to strengthen our intellectual property portfolio and extending national phase to many countries to reach wider jurisdictions. For more info on our IPs, please click here: http://www.egeetouch.com/about/patent-ip





MIND-BLOWING FEATURES:






LOCK = SECURITY. 

Locks essentially means 'SECURITY'. A luggage lock that is easily cracked or FAILS to secure your belongings while integrating with many other secondary features like remote unlocking, GPS tracking, weighting scale etc. just does not SOUND right to be categorized as a lock - it is simply a 'tech gimmick or toy' at best!  

We believe that as a lock or locking device for a luggage, its vital PRIMARY function is to ensure security/protection. Therefore, we focus on perfecting its PRIMARY functions while integrating other secondary functions such as ease-of-use, vicinity tracking etc. to enhance users' travel experience.  
In line with that, we have chosen Near Field Communication (NFC) as our PRIMARY unlocking/access technology. Unlike Bluetooth or RFID, NFC is designed with vital focus in security and has been well-known as the De Facto technology for mobile secured cash payment/transaction. eGeeTouch® Travel Padlock is optimized for proximity access with the accompanied Smart NFC-driven Fobs/Tags. 
Proprietary communication protocol and encryption technologies are deployed to prevent unauthorized attempts to extract stored access codes and an electronic luggage tag containing luggage owner's information.
Bluetooth is implemented in eGeeTouch® Travel Padlock mainly for the Displacement/Locational vicinity tracking (patented feature) allowing travellers to be alerted when their unattended luggage/travel bags have been moved/displaced unknowingly in scenario such as; when resting/taking a catnap or having a meal during airport transit while waiting for boarding etc. 
Bluetooth is also incorporated here as a SECONDARY (alternative) access method to accommodate those users who prioritize convenience over high access security depending on personal unique preference and individual circumstances. 




If you prefer to access the smartlock using your own smart devices, you are required to download an eGeeTouch® iOS & Android app (via Bluetooth mode).






Share usage of the lock and/or luggage/travel bags with greater peace of mind. These smart travel padlock keeps a record of the access history for traceability which can be sync with the mobile devices providing accountability and added security. 




eGeeTouch® Travel Padlock is the World's 1st & Only Smart Travel Padlock accepted by the Transport Security Authority (TSA) allowing travelers to pass through mandatory security checkpoints without the risk of having their luggage and/or travel bags forced/cut open by custom officers during security checks at airports. TSA Custom officers are authorized to cut and/or force open any luggage/travel bags that cannot be unlocked using the TSA Master Keys for inspection.

9. Can We Use GPS to Track & Trace our Travel Padlock?

NO. In fact, most of current commercial GPS technologies are unable to reliably detect an object/item when it is located inside a building or stored in a metal shielded container/truck/aeroplane. For example, satellite signal of automotive GPS navigation system usually fails to indicate direction whenever the car is inside a tunnel.


10. What is The Warranty for eGeeTouch Travel Padlock?



We stand firmly behind our products. Each eGeeTouch Travel Padlock includes a One-to-One exchange guarantee within 30 days of purchase (after you received) and a minimum 1 year limited warranty. An additional 1 year limited warranty is provided for European countries based on EU directive 1999/44/EC.11. How Many Users Can You Program Into The eGeeTouch Travel Padlock?Users may add up to 20 users and 20 NFC Fobs/Tags for accessHave More Questions? Visit eGeeTouch FAQ or Email us at info@egeetouch.com

story:
Because eMinnow lures look and behave just like real bait fish, they catch more fish, without the hassle !     

Imagine a fishing lure that behaves just like a real bait fish, but without you having to constantly jig it or retrieve it to keep it moving. Well now there is... eMinnow is a preprogrammed fully motorized fishing lure that mimics the swimming movements and patterns, of REAL bait fish, including pauses, speeding up, slowing down and regular live action.

eMinnow is a preprogrammed FULLY motorized fishing lure.   

eMinnow lures are perfectly balanced and designed to attract predator fish not only by the realistic swimming action but also by the vibration and harmonic frequency of the constantly moving motor. Game fish like, Bass, Pike, Muskie, Trout, Walleye, Perch, Crappie, even Salmon simply can’t resist  eMinnow. We have extensively tested eMinnow over the past 2 years and its has proved to be devastatingly effective.   

Fishing is an awesome pastime, but the fun can often be quite drawn out when there is nothing biting your line. You can only be patient for so long, until you are ready to pack up and call it a day. eMinnow is the solution! It's "the most effective lure EVER, lasts MUCH longer that live bait", makes a modulated harmonic clicking sound that predator fish simply can't ignore, and keeps a realistic movement to lure the target fish in. In fact, live bait fish often expire or stop moving after 10 or 15 minutes, eMinnow keeps going ! The design and materials are state of the art and the battery operated movement is timed perfectly.

eMinnow automatically starts as soon as it hits the water and stops when its taken out of the water. The water completes the circuit (see below).

Using eMinnow is very easy.    

You simply attach it to your line instead of a regular lure or bait.  As soon as the eMinnow hits the water, it begins to SWIM and make a unique clicking sound that catches the attention of the target fish. It's a combination that has proven to be devastatingly effective!

Once you retrieve your catch and remove it from the water, eMinnow automaticaly stops moving within a few seconds and allows for easy removal of the fish. Simple! No need to keep or transport livebait and eMinnow can be used in restricted areas where live bait is not allowed, giving you a huge benefit over the competition.       

eMinnow is helping people around the world to catch the biggest and most fish of their lives, and increasing the fun factor too!

5.5lbs Smallmouth Bass caught in 15 seconds using  eMinnow BassKisser (see the video Below)  

    

And it's perfect for Ice Fishing!     

   For bass fishing too! Predator fish can't resist eMinnow.   

 eMinnow is Perfect For: 

The Science behind eMinnow & How It Works To Attract Predator Fish.   

The main body of the eMinnow lure “the core” contains a removable waterproof battery compartment, a PCB micro controller (printed circuit board) and a micro electromagnetic motor designed specifically for eMinnow. Everything is designed from scratch for optimum performance, nothing is "off the shelf". eMinnow is fast, efficient and is built to withstand all the hard knocks a big predator fish can throw at it! The harmonics generated within the “core” attract the curiosity of predator fish in the area before they can even see eMinnow.

Realistic Movement: The motor operates the shaft at the back of the fish, which animates the tail and gives a lifelike movement that propels the lure though the water like a real fish. The tail moves in a pre-programmed irregular manner to reproduce swimming behavior of a real bait fish. In fact we studied the movement of many different species of bait fish and tested over 50 sequences before settling on the final programming.

Sound Attraction: The electromagnetic motor also emits a clicking sound (harmonic frequency) which, in our extensive tests has proven to be devastatingly effective for catching predator fish. eMinnow is pre-programmed to automatically start the moment it hits the water, and stop within a few seconds of leaving the water.    

So as long as it is in the water eMinnow will swim and attract fish. The battery compartment is easily accessed using a flat head screwdriver or even a coin to unscrew the compartment. The silicon seal keeps it completely watertight, so as long as the compartment is screwed back in place properly, the waterproof integrity of eMinnow will remain at 100%.     

 How Many Styles Of eMinnow?  

That's a good question, I'm pleased you asked! Currently there are 3 types of eMinnow ready for production, with 3 other styles at the pre-production stage.

   What colors are available?      

Currently we have 6 mainstream colors planned, these are the colors that have worked best for us in our testing.

  eMinnow Accessories      

Currently we have 2 types of accessories available:

 1)  Battery pack (10 x LR44 lithium button batteries) These batteries have been specifically made for eMinnow to ensure the best performance and compatibility, and are already produced and in our warehouse.

 2)  Interchangeable tails:-  The interchangeable tails have been designed and 3D printed versions produced for prototypes. The 5 piece mold is currently being produced and packaging designed. These tails will be in a variety of colors and finishes and made from a resilient soft silicon rubber compound. The first production run will be in the color below (watermelon with red glitter) as it has out performed all other colors during our testing.

      

  How To Catch More Fish With eMinnow!   

Easy to use:- Every eMinnow lure comes complete with a full set of instructions and tips to ensure you have the best opportunity of catching the biggest and most fish! eMinnow is VERY EASY to use and has been tested by dozens of independent anglers from around the world. eMinnow has been received with great enthusiasm and fished successfully by anglers aged 8 to 78!

 eMinnow In Action     

We have literally 100's of videos of eMinnow live action, but to be honest we are not the best crew with a camera! A lot of our video is shot in cloudy or murky waters, but eMinnow still catches fish! The combination in the video's below should give you a good idea of what eMinnow is capable of. 

    

The first 3 styles of eMinnow are actually all ready to roll off the production line. The production molds, printed circuit board controllers, electronic motors, packaging design & 10 piece battery packs have all been designed, developed, produced and most importantly paid for. The interchangeable tails have been designed & the 5 piece tail molds have been started on. Production prototypes have been extensively tested. We have 2 minor modifications currently being made to the WildJax and BassKisser molds and then we are just waiting to press the go button! All we need is a few extra customers to bring the batch order up to a cost effective 1st run.

eMinnow has been extensively developed since our very first "kitchen table" prototype to ensure the best fishing possible. Over the past 3 years we have lost count of the amount of prototypes we have made for testing different eMinnow styles, shapes, actions and colors, but the number will be in the hundreds. This has helped us to get eMinnow really fine tuned to help you catch the fish you want!    

These are some of our 2014 prototypes used for testing:- 

 

Quality: We set out to produce the best quality fishing lure we could possibly make... and then to fully motorize it so that it would out perform all other lures. This is our final finished product from our first pre-production test run in February 2017:-    

eMinnow Timeline     

Because most of the hard work has already been completed we can accurately predict our production and delivery timeline.

 About Us     

Sergiy Tsybulnyk - Co-Founder & eMinnow Inventor

Back in 2009 the inventor of eMinnow Sergiy Tsybulnyk was fishing his favorite lake in British Columbia, and thinking about how successful fishing with live bait was before it was prohibited in BC waters. Fishing had been Sergiy’s major hobby for decades with many trophies won and many fish caught! In fact over the years he built up an incredible knowledge of fishing in North American waters, and is locally known as one of BC’s expert anglers. What he needed was a motorized lure, the sort of thing that would look and act like a real minnow.  Adding a few motorized minnow-like lures to his tackle box to replace the now prohibited live bait seemed like the perfect solution. These motorized lures would imitate the movement of a live fish for when using a live minnow is not permitted or not practical. So, the search began: hours of trawling the Internet went by and no such lure was discovered. An extensive search with all the major and smaller tackle suppliers produced no results either. Eventually he had to concede defeat, he could not find the motorized lure that he was looking for. As the years rolled by,  Sergiy, who is professional engineer by trade, decided to make his own fully motorized lure. After 2 years of extensive testing, modifications and of course fishing, eMinnow was born...but how to develop it, produce it and bring it to the market...he needed an experienced  business partner and investor!     

Stephen Tye - Co-Founder/Investor 

Stephen emigrated to BC in  2011, has been an entrepreneur all of his life, sold his first business at 23,  was the youngest CEO of a Swiss group of companies at 27, and Managing Director of Columbia Sportswear in the UK, so when he first saw eMinnow he had an instant affinity! A keen interest in outdoor sports and businesses related to them, he was hooked (pun intended!) Within 6 months eMinnow went from prototype to production model.      

 Featured in the following media:

story:
A graduate of BYU's Industrial Design program, Brian is a highly skilled artist, designer, and engineer.  He has been granted multiple patents and has won many awards for his innovative ideas. Brian loves solving real world problems by creating something beautiful, and beautifully simple. Brian has done this time and time again throughout his career as an Industrial Design Engineer.

Brian has worked as Lead Design Engineer for some of the world's top action sports companies, such as OGIO, Liquid Force, and Fox Racing.  While at Fox Racing, Brian created and designed the Fox Instinct Boot, which has been the leading race boot in the motocross industry for 8 years running.

Brian has spent a combined 4 years in Asia working directly with manufacturers, traveling back and forth to China nearly 50 times in his 20-year career.  He has a vast knowledge of materials and production processes.

Brian loves the outdoors, wakeboarding, hiking, mountain biking, and spending time with his pup, Hank.

- Fox Racing
- Liquid Force Wakeboards 
- OGIO

 

A graduate of the University of Utah's Mechanical Engineering program and a recent MBA graduate, Mike can’t get enough of design! He is a highly skilled Mechanical Engineer and is impassioned about technology and designing new products. 

After starting his career designing manufacturing techniques for both GE and Schneider Electric, Mike decided to switch it up and began designing consumer electronics for ZAGG, a Salt Lake consumer electronics innovator. Mike has designed hundreds of consumer electronics including Bluetooth headphones, earbuds, keyboards, battery packs, cameras and even glass screen protection. 

Mikes speaks fluent Mandarin Chinese and loves to work with suppliers to make sure products are produced on time and exactly as envisioned.

When Mike is not designing, he loves spending time in the mountains with his wife and four kids. Mike loves biking, hiking, four wheeling and camping.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Risks & Challenges

 

Between myself, Brian Sanderson, and Mike Jenson (both of Best Friend Outfitters) we have a combined 30 years of experience designing, engineering, and developing consumer products. Together we have brought 100's of products into the market... many of them winning the highest awards in their respective categories.

Two years ago we secured a bottle factory in Shenzhen, and we have been working with them on the Drink&Buddy project for over a year. We have produced a perfectly functional production-quality sample, and the 3D CAD design is ready for tooling.

We have been testing the Drink&Buddy prototypes for more than 4 years, and have refined the functionality to the highest standards. The latest prototype works perfectly.

We already have agreements with the factory to start tooling for the remaining parts as soon as we reach our funding goal on Kickstarter, which will give us an incredible head-start.

Brian, an Industral Design Engineer, has been back and forth to China 46 times in his career, working directly with factories producing consumer products that utilize a vast array of materials. Mike, a Senior Mechanical Engineer, continues to travel to China 4 to 5 times per year, and he speaks fluent Chinese.

We filed a full utility patent for the Drink&Buddy in April of 2014. The patent will be granted VERY soon. We will also be filing international patents worldwide.

Brian is self-employed as an Industrial Design contractor, and Mike is dedicated to spending as much time needed to complete this project and fulfill our orders promptly. If things go really well here on Kickstarter, we are both committed to resigning our current duties and positions and working full time on this venture.

All of our ducks are in a row, and we are ready for manufacturing.

We've already met our funding goal... the risk to our backers is negligible. The Drink&Buddy will become a reality... and we are ready to rock and roll!

 

Helpful Search Terms:

story:
The Journey

In a rash decision that could make or break our professional cycling careers I'll be cycling from Prague to Berlin in July to raise funds for dotHIV. We'll be doing the 380km over three days, a distance and time span that in hindsight seems quetionable at best. The journey is organised by TechBikers and I'll be joining the Irish contingent of Chris, Mark and Cait.

"But Paul, you barely made the pathetic 80km to Electric Picnic last year, as evident in this hilarious picture of Tony" I hear you say. Whilst true, we're taking new measures to ensure we go the distance this time, things like;

  • Less cans pre-cycle.
  • Using bikes with more than one working gear.
  • Wearing shorts rather than jeans.
  • Extending my playlist beyond the Rockey soundtrack.

The Magic €750

Naturally we've covered all our travel costs so 100% of what you give here goes straight to a great charity. The goal is €750 in a month but I believe dotHIV are open to accepting more so donate early and donate often. 

Any donation comes with a 12 month membership of the "I-won't-pester-you-for-cash-any more" club.

The Charity - dotHIV

The Problem

The fight against HIV / AIDS is at a crossroad: Owing to medical research and the engagement of activists all over the world, voices speak of the beginning of the end of AIDS for the first time in the epidemic’s history. But funding is still scarce and on a constant decline. So while there is hope to push back what has killed more people than the wars of the 20th century combined, the UN voices severe concerns whether the international community is able to reach its goals.


dotHIV's Solution:

From mid 2013 on, everyone can register a .hiv-domain. This website can then either be used as the main web address or function as the twin sister of a known site: users will get the same result on pepsi.com and pepsi.hiv – a click on a .hiv-site forwards to the standard-homepage. In both cases, a click does something good: every visit of a .hiv-website triggers a micro-donation.

These donations are financed through the domain-sale: the largest part of every address is reserved for social purposes. Of course, companies can expand their engagement through further fundraising campaigns on .hiv-sites. So, long story short: operating and distributing the domains fills a growing pool of funds and the Internet users activate this money with every click on such a domain.

This website can then either be used as the main web address or function as the twin sister of a known site: users will get the same result on pepsi.com and pepsi.hiv – a click on a .hiv-site forwards to the standard-homepage. In both cases, a click does something good: every visit of a .hiv-website triggers a micro-donation.
These donations are financed through the domain-sale: the largest part of every address is reserved for social purposes. Of course, companies can expand their engagement through further fundraising campaigns on .hiv-sites. So, long story short: operating and distributing the domains fills a growing pool of funds and the Internet users activate this money with every click on such a domain.

story:
Explore the Georgia Bight!

Captain Travis has 15 years of waterway experience stretching from South Carolina to Florida.  Let him take you on an adventure and share his love of the unique Georgia coast experience.

Have you heard of the Georgia Bight? It is the inward curved geography along the Atlantic coast in Georgia. It is known for its stunning interconnected waterways that are great for fishing, wild-life spotting, and gorgeous marsh views.

In support of launching for the new season, we are offering gift-certificates at a special discount for the holiday season. Give the gift of fishing and/or eco-charter in the heart of the Georgia Bight coastal region, today! 

What We Need & What You Get

Georgia Bight Charters has acquired a new Tidewater 2110 BayMax that is outfitted for a comfortable and intimate experience. To support purchasing the latest equipment and licensing we are offering discounted gift-certificates to prepare to give you the best experience possible this spring. 

The Impact

Georgia Bight Charters aims to not only provide a great experience on the water, but also practice sustainable and eco-friendly methods to preserve and support a healthy ecosystem. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Know someone who loves fishing, dolphins, or just being on a boat? Share this campaign!

Can't travel to the Savannah area anytime soon? Consider purchasing a tumbler!

We look forward to sharing the beautiful Georgia Bight with you!

story:
Hi hi,

My name is John Steck Jr. and I am a visual artist, with a focus in photography. Originally from Chicago, I have lived in Boston, San Francisco, and currently reside in Reykjavik, Iceland. This summer, I started two large bodies of work on the island of Iceland while at both the Gullkistan Residency for Creative People and the SIM Residency. These projects focus on two different experiences of the bodies of water in and around Iceland, both as a meditative and visceral experience. Due to the high cost of my travels and the high ambitions of these projects, I am asking for your help in supporting these projects in return for a unique piece of my experience here in Iceland.

Growing up in the city of Chicago, right off of Lake Michigan, I felt as though I lived alongside an ocean because of the horizon line. I always wondered what other world existed on the other side of this lake. This idea took on greater meaning for me during the 8 years I spent in Boston, off the coast of the Atlantic, and two years spent in San Francisco, next to the Pacific Ocean. During this time, the concept of the sublime and its relationship to the physical aspects of the the horizon became apparent in the images I was making for a series I called Horizo. These images, while offering contemplation of the worlds that exist beyond them, focused on the physicality of the horizon line itself, and how it’s possible to collapse that space we often feel is gigantic and treat it as something much more tactile and smaller.

I was always extremely fascinated with the idea of going to Iceland. In my mind, it is a place unlike the rest of the world with experiences I could never imagine. I feel that while I have been on this island, surrounded on all sides by the ocean, that there is nowhere else but here. Nowhere to reach out or imagine.

The previous ideas in my work, along with my experiences in Iceland, led me to these two new projects. The first project is in the same manner as my Horizo series, of photographing the horizon line of the ocean. I wish to do so from as many coastal towns of Iceland as possible, to have a complete 360 view of this grand spatial exterior. Composing these scenes thus far has allowed me to turn around and look inward with more focus on the details of the interior of Iceland, with more understanding of scale and significance.

This idea has led to the second section of images I have pursued, which focuses on the lakes of Iceland. It is my goal to photograph as many lakes as I can on the island, to show a different kind of connection of land and water, how the scale shift can reverse, and how the land can be more powerful and, at times, overbearing.

I like to think of these projects as a meditative way to lead me through the entirety of what has been a new space and experience for me, and where that will lead within my work.

I have decided to stay here in Iceland for a third month to complete these two projects, along with several other smaller ones. Because these residencies are independently run and not funded through the government, they are not able to help financially support the projects that their residents pursue. Due to the financial costs of boarding, transportation, photography expenses, and other various travel needs, I cannot complete these projects alone.

The importance of this project to me, both as a visual study that I feel is a relevant way to interpret a space and the spiritual journey this continues to be for myself, is great. I hope you will consider sharing this adventure with me. In return, as a way to express my gratitude, I offer six different rewards for you in return. They range from custom-made mixed cds of Icelandic music, one of a kind prints, and handmade artist books. There is something for everybody. I hope you will join me in this journey.

story:
Short Summary

HI! My name is Cory Cannella. I am a traditionally trained photographer and firefighter-paramedic from Houston, Texas. During a recent trip to Southeast Asia, I decided to purchase and take along a new Polaroid 300 camera and about 200 frames of film to hand out to people that I photographed. It is one thing to ask to photograph someone, then show them the little screen on your digital camera and then that is it. They walk away with nothing. Now, they have an instant photograph as a keepsake for themselves and their families. It is safe to say that 99% of my subjects never heard of let alone have seen a Polaroid photo before. What started out as a good will gesture turned into a project for me-Project Polaroid. To see the joy on the faces from what to me was such a simple gesture. I immediately knew this was something I wanted to do again in the future and on a much larger scale.  Many people I also photographed with my Nikon DSLR, others I just used the Polaroid, and some received more than one photo for their family.

I intend on traveling back to Southeast Asia to visit the areas that I missed in February 2013. Throughout 2014, I would like to travel to China, South America, Papua New Guinea and possibly Africa and India. Anywhere that there is a population that does not have the access to the technology of simple photography is potentially on my list. I have also added another aspect to the original idea. For future visits, I would like to take along extra Polaroid instant cameras and film to donate to villages along the way. I will teach several people in each village how to load and operate the cameras. This will allow people that have never seen instant photography the ability to capture important and special occasions within the  daily life of the village. At the conclusion of 2014, I would like to produce an exhibition along with a book of my subjects.

It is important to note that, although I have been in contact with the Polaroid Corporation regarding possible sponsorship of the project, at this time, Project Polaroid is unaffiliated and not funded by the Polaroid Corporation.

How can you take part?

Donations to the project goes to supplement travel expenses, the cost for interpreters (as needed), and the purchase of as many Polaroid PIC 300 cameras and as much Polaroid film as possible for each journey. My initial goal is $7500.  However, the more money I can raise, the more countries I can visit and the more instant photographs and cameras I can take to hand out.

The Impact

Be an ambassador of giving and goodwill. Your contribution to Project Polaroid helps place instant photographs and instant photography in the hands of people around the globe that would otherwise never have access to such a simple pleasure. A small token for a family to pass on, or just a keepsake of loved ones to be displayed in their homes, as we do right here in America.

story:
Short Summary

This will be my third time traveling to the Dominican Republic to work with Kingdom Builders with a team. I feel such a strong need to return because it grounds me as a human -- to serve others is such a life changing experience. By donating to my fund, you will help me to firstly travel, but also to serve others and photograph/create a video of our trip and the people that we meet and serve. I hope that this photographs and videos will help to inspire others to go out and serve around the world, as well as just open them to what is going on in the Dominican Republic and the joy that the citizens there have, even if they aren't as monetarily rich as many are in the US. 


What We Need & What You Get

The total cost of the trip for myself is $1200 plus preparation costs (vaccines, toiletries, etc.) I'm hoping to raise $800 because I still want to use my own resources as well. Your donation will go towards my plane ticket and travel expenses, any medications needed, donations make to the people there, and food.

Your support would be greatly appreciated, and for that I don't want to just ask for money, I also want to give in return! For this fundraising campaign, I will be offering photo shoots, and different photo prints. Since I'm an artist at heart, I want to be able to give you a chance to have your own artwork, whether it be of your family or of people in the Dominican Republic. 

I will be offering family photo sessions that will take place this summer of 2014 whenever your schedule allows! I will also be offering digital prints and more rare prints such as matted polaroids and prints made me alternative processes that are fine art quality.

Any additional funds raised will be put towards future service trips such as a trip to India that I am planning for January of 2015! 

The Impact

Last year on the Domincan Republic service trip I was a part of, we met a pastors family who was living in a home that had half a roof, dirt floors, no plumbing and a kitchen outside. We were able to finish the other half of the roof, pour and lay concrete, and start the laying of the plumbing. Needless to say, it was an amazing transformation. 

Not only did we help in this way, but we also brought clothing and toys for the kids there and spent time with the people living in the village of Momey. If you want to see what this all looked like, check out the video above! 

Other Ways You Can Help

The most important way that you can help this trip is to pray for our team and the people of the Dominican Republic. Prayer is much more powerful than any dollar could be. Even if you give financially, I would love if you could pray as well, we want this trip to inspire us to do more, see God and serve like he did.

story:
Where Am I Going?:

This March, for alternative Spring break, I will be heading down to Arizona to volunteer with No Mas Muertes: No More Deaths. No More Deaths provides humanitarian aid in the Arizona desert to end migrants deaths.

The Impact!

I will be spending a week in the Sonora Desert and several days in Tucson learning about border history, providing aid and getting a better understanding of the challenges faced in this boarder state. Last year 252 bodies of men women and children were found in the desert. Currently, our militarized boarders violate International human rights norms. Working with No More Deaths, I will be helping to prevent deaths.
Immigration is certainly a hot-button issue. Coming from a non-border state, a lot of us don't really understand the history of the boarder, or of immigration policy. I would like to get some first hand experience of the facts and hopefully raise your interest in the issue.
Most of all, I'd like to spread the word to you all about No More Deaths and donate some of my time to help prevent deaths; who would argue with that?

What is Needed:

As most of you know, I am finishing up my masters in social work  at the fabulous State University. Salem State is a public institution and, while I absolutely love it, they cannot offer any financial assistance for alternative spring break. My fund raising amount of $600 will cover part of my plane fare and part of the $200 cost to be housed and fed by No More Deaths. It will be used for nothing else. In the event I raise more than my goal, I will not accept anymore contributions after $750. My cost of the trip including plane fare, $200 to stay with NMD and cab fares will total about $750.

I cannot express how appreciative I am of any amount I am able to fund raise. Parting with money in this economic climate is never easy, especially when it's something that is difficult to understand.

No More Deaths works hard to prevent the deaths of hundreds of men, women and children who lose their lives to starvation and dehydration each year and I am so thankful for the opportunity to go.
THANK YOU!



If you're interested, check this stuff out:
No More Deaths:
http://www.nomoredeaths.org/

HBO Documentary about Jon McCain and Ted Kennedy's push for immigration reform:
http://www.hbo.com/documentaries/the-senators-b...

HBO Documentary about migrant children:
http://www.hbo.com/documentaries/the-senators-b...

story:
Introducing LANTERN MG-600, the newest addition to our family of superior, multi-function, portable lighting!

LANTERN MG-600 is a compact lantern flashlight with a powerful magnetic tail and an innovative collapsible diffuser. This is our most functional light yet. It will be an essential tool to have around the house, in your car, at work, and on all your adventures!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

So many ways to use LANTERN MG-600

 

Powerful tail magnet turns the MG-600 into a convenient  hands-free light

A rare earth magnet is integrated into the tail, and is strong enough to hold the LANTERN MG-600 securely to any magnetic surface.

 

5 light settings

 

Low setting is 50 lumens, mid setting is 180 lumens, high setting is 600  lumens, bike pulse mode, and emergency strobe mode.

 

All New Collapsible LANTERN Diffuser-S

In a continuing effort to improve our products, we have taken the feedback received from our first LANTERN Diffuser and created this next generation of diffuser. Many of you told us the original diffuser was amazing and worked great, but it was bulky and hard to pack or store.

Our new silicone collapsible LANTERN Diffuser brings all the benefits of our original diffuser but with minimal bulk. This diffuser collapses to a small size and is light weight, making it super easy to pack and store. You can now take the LANTERN Light and diffuser with you anywhere.

 

The new silicone diffuser is not only lightweight and compact, but it instantly turns your light into a hands-free lantern.

 

The new LANTERN Diffuser-S will fit many of our other LANTERN Lights and any flashlight with a head diameter between 25mm-31mm, instantly turning it into a hands-free lantern!

 

Our new silicone diffuser comes in 2 colors, Bright White & Warm Yellow.

 

 

Lots goes in to making the LANTERN MG-600, including the highest quality components

LANTERN MG-600

LANTERN Diffuser-S

All backers of the campaign will receive an additional year of warranty, on top of the 1 year limited warranty, for a total of 2 years. The warranty covers any defects in material or workmanship, under normal use, during the Warranty Period.

During the Warranty Period, we will repair or replace, at no charge, products or parts of a product that proves defective because of improper material or workmanship, under normal use and maintenance. Return shipping costs may not always be covered by this warranty.

Our warranty covers malfunctions or damage resulting from defects in materials or workmanship. Our warranty does not cover problems caused by misuse of the product or any alterations made to the product. Refer to the instruction manual included with the product for warranty details.

 

We have completed design, prototypes, and testing of the LANTERN MG-600. Our beta users have been telling us that this is the best LANTERN Light yet. 

We have begun a limited production run, and are looking forward to getting this new light out into the world.

 

OUR TEAM

Our team is a small one, but we bring with us years of experience in developing top quality lighting products. This is not our first rodeo! Together we have launched several successful crowdfunded products, including our signature light LANTERN Black and the popular LANTERN EDC-V1. These products have gone on to sell in over 90 countries around the world, and are now core products in the LANTERN Gear family of lights.

 

RISKS & CHALLENGES

We make some of the best portable lights on the market today.  Our first light, the LANTERN Black, was launched back in 2016 and continues to be a popular choice.

We have a proven track record of delivering quality products and backing them up with an excellent warranty. We promise that with the LANTERN MG-600, we will carry on with this commitment to quality and value. Our experienced team of dedicated people have successfully created and brought several lights to market already. We are bringing all of this experience to our launch of LANTERN MG-600.

We are continuing our partnership with our manufacturer; the same manufacturer we have worked with on many of our previous products. Design, tooling and moulds for the product are already complete, and the light has successfully gone through the testing phase. In addition, we have already done a small production run. The next and final stage is mass production.

The only risk we anticipate remaining in this project relates to logistics. We will actively manage our incoming shipping and will be doing all fulfillment in house to limit our reliance on third parties. While there is the possibility for logistical delays, we will keep all backers up to date as to the progress.

 

How Can You Help?

By sharing this campaign with your social networks and anyone else you think can benefit from this product, you are helping a small business to grow. 

Even if you are not able to contribute to this campaign, helping us to get the word out is also a huge help. You can use the Indiegogo share tools to share this to your Facebook or Twitter feeds or just grab the campaign link to share with friends and family.
