story:
On one side: An air-breathable 100% see-through section to keep fresh clothes wrinkle-free. On the other: An odor and water-resistant pouch to keep dirty laundry sealed up tight. Both sides: Packing perfection. 

And with dual-side compression and our patent pending anti-catch construction, you can pack 40% more in the same amount of space without worrying about the zippers getting caught. Which means you get double the awesome in one ultra-compression cube with industry beating weight to toughness ratio.

 Dual Sided 

Stash your dirties in an odor- and water resistant side, and say "sayonara" to laundry bags that can't compress or keep out odor—and "hasta la vista" to lugging back empty packing cubes. Your clean clothes remain separate and wrinkle-free. 

In short: Taskin Air Duo makes it easy to keep your clothing organized before and after use—so you can focus on enjoying your trip.

Anti-Snag Compression Zippers

Taskin Air Duo's patent-pending design prevents the compression zipper from getting caught in the lining. It works by [REDACTED] and thus [REDACTED] prevents the zipper from getting caught. It’s all bit hush-hush for obvious reasons :). But it does work and even if you somehow manage to snag the zipper it would be much easier to unsnag them. And if that fails we will replace the unit.

Pack 40% More

Pack tight and save big on all those checked-luggage fees. Plus, you’ll make it to your destination without having to steam or iron wrinkled clothes for a change. (You can thank us later.)

Ultralight

With a weight-to-toughness ratio only Taskin can deliver, Taskin Air Duo helps you roam the world without weighing you down. Designed and engineered using top-flight materials, they're Taskin tough and give you unbeatable combination of function, durability and weight.

 Clearview Mesh 

100% see-through mesh gives you total visibility into what's packed inside. No more of rummaging through your packing cube in search of an item. No more messy stickers to remind you what's packed where. No more guesswork or aggravation. With Taskin Air, packing, finding, and retrieving your stuff is a total breeze.

3 Optimized Sizes 

The extra-large is perfect for your jackets and hoodies, the large for your shirts, tops, pants etc and the medium for pretty everything else. The extra-large would fill one half of a standard carry-on spinner and the large and medium would combine to fill the other half.

 Top-notch Materials 

Just like all our gear, Taskin Air Duo is made from top-flight materials, like Duraflex-coated, see-through mesh, premium honeycomb ripstop nylon, and genuine YKK zippers. Plus, you always get that Taskin lifetime warranty. 

 We have improved upon our original design for Duplex. We have shipped thousands of these rugged dual sided compression packing cubes around and world and were very well received but thousands of backers. We have used the many feedback we received to make some improvements to the original design.

 Anti-Snag Compression Zippers 

We have added the same patent-pending anti-snag zipper constructions as in Taskin Air Duo. This was biggest and the only complaint we received and now we have that addressed. 

 Optimed New Size 

We have optimized the medium size cube so as to maximize what you can fit inside of your carry-on. We made the medium size wider and a bit narrower so a full set of 4 will  now perfectly  fit a carry-on luggage. 

AirDUO Duplex V2 Comparison

Missed out on the Taskin ROLR Indiegogo Campaign? Here’s your chance to get in on the world’s first fully-modular, totally-customizable 5-in-1 toiletry bag right here on Kickstarter.

 A Totally Modular Experience

Taskin ROLR is the only toiletry bag you can custom-configure for your specific needs, on every trip you take. 

 

In fact, ROLR is 5 ingeniously-designed toiletry bags rolled into one. You can pack them individually for a quick weekend getaway, or connect them together into whatever configuration you need for your next big client pow-wow in Boston, or that African safari you've been dreaming about. Plus, two or more ROLRs can be combined, so you can zip together custom combinations for a more personalized travel experience. Just don't be surprised if you start wondering how you stayed so fly without it.

We know, right? If you don’t already have this amazing Kube 2 duffle to call your own, it means you missed out on the Taskin Kube V2's Kickstarter campaign. But don’t freak. Here’s your chance to get in on the world’s best-designed duffle:

story:
Negro Fichas: “I need this universal technology to speak to people I’ve never been able to before.”

Lindsay Johnston: “I am looking to do a lot more traveling overseas and this would help make the experience much better”

Michael Trong: “This is great tool to win hearts and minds when we deploy overseas”

 

 

Imagine that you’re traveling abroad to experience an exotic culture, but can’t even find a restroom because you don’t know the language. Or imagine that you can’t speak with an important foreign client because you don’t have an interpreter on hand.    

Smark Translator is designed to break the language barrier and give you the power of clear communication. It is the world’s first natural language translator with a modular design providing 37+ languages translation in real time. Global connectivity and offline translation help you to break the ice in any situation.  

 

 

Smark will be ready to ship in December, 2018. Glance to view key features of it:  

  • Modular translator design changes the dynamic of trans lingual conversation.  
  • Using any translation system in single device (half-duplex) mode, where it has to be passed back and forth, can be awkward. Users need to lean in close to each other to have their speech captured, or wait for one speaker’s translation to be processed before starting their response. It simply isn’t a natural mode of communication.  
  • Translate 37+ languages in real time, it translates the language you speak and speaks to the other person.  
  • Multi lingual group chat. Your language can be translated into as many languages as the group members speak.  
  • Global roaming services in 100+ countries. Top up data throughout Smark system and share hotspot to multiple devices. Your cross border travel cannot be easier. 

 

For quick interactions like asking for directions or ordering a bite to eat, you can use it as a single unit for one-way translation. Or pass it back and forth so that both of you can understand each other immediately.

However, when a conversation gets more interesting, this can be awkward and unnatural. You need to lean closer to the other person, wait for the translation to be processed, and pass the device back and forth after every sentence. It’s complicated.  

This is where Smark is different—it won’t let that happen to you.

 

 

 

Smark is the world’s first natural language translator with a modular design. It lets you have lengthier, deeper conversation. Just split Smark into two separate transceivers and start talking. Your speech will be captured, translated, and delivered in real time for a more comfortable experience, enabling long, casual conversations.

 

 

While spoken language is our focus, we recognize that it isn’t the only form of communication that matters. When using Smark’s sharing mode, you don't need to pass the translator back and forth, and the conversation will flow smoothly, allowing eye contact and body language.  

It radically improves technologically facilitated translation by literally putting control back in each speaker’s hands.

 

 
 
 

 

 

Trans lingual conversation should not be limited to 2 people. The Smark system supports linking up to 100 Smark devices, and concurrent use of all 37 languages, for conversation and real-time translation in a group talk. The language barrier melts away when you can exchange your ideas in your own languages freely and intuitively.

 

Smark - Group Mode Demo

 
 

 

Many translators on market claim to support more than 100 languages, however not all of those languages are supported with a full translation experience. Keep this in mind when selecting a product, because many of them only support “Text to Text” translation. In other words, for certain languages you need to type what you want to say, and you only get translation results as on-screen text.

Smark takes a different approach. The way we see it, only a languages for which Auto Speech Recognition (ASR), Neural Machine Translation (NMT) and Text to Speech are available can be claimed as fully supported. That means you can actually speak any of our fully supported languages to Smark, and hear the spoken translation. Using these languages, you will never need to resort to typing input and receiving only text results. We’ve identified the 37+ languages that are most frequently used around the world, and have applied all three translation modes for a better communication experience and a more natural conversation.

 

 

Here's the workflow of Smark's translation process. We make sure that Smark captures your speech accurately, translates your sentences quickly and correctly, and finally speaks the translated results to your conversations partners loud and clear.

 

 

And here's why Smark provides better translation:

1. We employ the four best NMT (Neural Machine Translation) Engines.  

Smark leverages the best computational translation solutions on the market. It supports four powerful cloud-based artificial neural networks to predict the likelihood of a sequence of words, modeling entire sentences in a single integrated model to deliver the best possible translation results.

 

 

“NMT systems capture the similarity of words and can then benefit from that” by Samuel Läubli’s PhD Candidate at the University of Zürich and CTO of machine translation and opinion mining company TextShuttle.

 

 

2. Better Voice Recognition Powered by the world’s best voice pick up solution from Nuance Communications

We’ve tested and fine-tuned Smark’s voice pick up performance by sampling audio from the noisy environments our users are most likely to find themselves in (airports, subways, cafes, exhibition halls, etc.).

 

3. Better Noise Cancelling powered by state-of-the-art DSP algorithms.

Our DSP (digital signal processor) algorithms help Smark to filter and reduce noise so you can converse freely without worrying about whether or not you’ll be understood.

 

 

4. Smark is made for travel. 

Smark can be used as a Wi-Fi hotspot for multiple devices while on the go. With a built-in SIM card, a flat rate roaming plan can be purchased to create a shareable Wi-Fi access point for your phone, tablet and laptop. The roaming plan covers 100+ countries and regions in total, so you’ll almost never have to worry about being out of range or out of touch with your family and friends.

 

 

5. Roaming coverage in over 100 countries and regions.

Cameroon, Canada, Cape Verde, Cayman Islands, Chile, China, Colombia, Congo, Republic of the, capital: Brazzaville, Congo, The Democratic Republic of the, ex Zaire, capital: Kinshasa, Costa Rica, Croatia, Curaçao, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Dominica, Dominican Republic, Ecuador, Egypt, El Salvador, Estonia, Faroe Islands, Fiji, Finland, France, French Guyana, Gabon, Gambia, Georgia, Germany, Ghana, Gibraltar, Greece, Greenland, Grenada, Guadeloupe, Guam, Guatemala, Guernsey (UK), Guinea, Guyana, Haiti, Honduras, Hong Kong, Hungary, Iceland, India, Indonesia, Iran, Iraq, Ireland, Isle of Man (UK), Israel, Italy, Ivory Coast, Jamaica, Japan, Jersey (UK), Jordan, Kazakhstan, Kenya, Kosovo, Kuwait, Kyrgyzstan, Laos, Latvia, Lesotho, Liberia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Macao, Macedonia, Madagascar, Malaysia, Mali, Malta, Mayotte, Mexico, Moldova, Monaco, Montenegro, Montserrat, Morocco, Mozambique, Myanmar (Burma), Nauru, Netherlands, New Zealand, Nicaragua, Niger, Nigeria, Norway, Oman, Pakistan, Palestine, Panama, Papua New Guinea, Paraguay, Peru, Philippines, Poland, Portugal, Puerto Rico, Qatar, Réunion, Romania, Russia, Rwanda, Saint Kitts and Nevis, Saint Lucia, Saint Vincent and the Grenadines, Samoa, San Marino, Senegal, Serbia, Seychelles, Sierra Leone, Singapore, Slovakia, Slovenia, South Africa, South Korea, Spain, Sri Lanka, Sudan, Suriname, Swaziland, Sweden, Switzerland, Taiwan, Tajikistan, Tanzania, Thailand, Tonga, Trinidad and Tobago, Tunisia, Turkey, Turks and Caicos Islands, Uganda, Ukraine, United Arab Emirates, United Kingdom (UK), United States (USA), Uruguay, Uzbekistan, Vanuatu, Venezuela, Vietnam, Yemen, Zambia

 

 

 

 

 
 

Misway is a group of Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Speech Intelligence design experts committed to changing the way the world communicates by using the power of AI and cloud computing. With Smark, travelers can enjoy an incredible new degree of freedom when meeting people, getting around a foreign city or working with international clients.

 

Risks and Challenges

As our product design and testing are gearing up to the final stages and heading to large-scale product, we’d like to invite you to the last chapter of this adventure to enjoy the convenience of smart translator as much as we do.

We know that the most important part of our process is the commitment we made to you and to deliver Smark to you on time! All rewards are expected to start shipping in December, 2018. We are confident in our supply chain management and production capability. However, if there are any uncontrollable factors, such as component delays or unexpected shortages, we will be sure to keep you well informed every step of the way and do our best to quickly solve the problem. We are excited to bring Smark to life and get this revolutionary smart translator into your hands!

story:
Snowboarders have mountains. Why don't longboarders? The Vallum Venture aims to change that. We've started planning a longboarding mountain/park and we're launching a crowdfunding campaign on Indiegogo to speed up the process.

www.vallumcompany.com

Background: Longboarding Popularity

Google trends shows Longboarding searches at their highest since 2004, growing at an annual rate of 21% since '08. The NY Times, LA Times, and USA Today have written articles on the growing trend of longboarding as a form of transportation.

These boarders hail from across the globe. They skate in their neighborhoods and travel across the globe to skate. They teach others to skate. It's not just transportation, it's also recreation.

Snowboarders have mountain. Surfers have surf parks. And there's not one mountain for longboarders−novice and experienced−to skate.

The Mountain

We've designed and sketched a mockup of how the Mountain would be laid out−courses, roads, skate store, apparel store, and food. We've designed this based on various commercial real estate in the most popular skate zones−NorCal & SoCal, Tristate, and New England. But we wanted to hear from The Boarders first−where do you want this Mountain?

The Crowdfund

We've planned the success of the Vallum Venture right down to how many combinations of boards, tees, hoodies, and Mountain passes we would need to succeed. We're ready to go to investors. We just need your help−we need to finalize the engineering of the Venture and we want supporters to vote on the final location of the Venture. We need to show an active interest in the Venture.a

Rewards

Apparel

Vallum Apparel
   Unisex Triblend V-Neck in Royal Blue
   Men's Triblend Crew Neck in Light Red
   Women's V-Neck in Navy
   Unisex Fleece Hoodie in Slate (model is 6'5" in M)


Sunglasses

Vallum is working with Woodwear Sunglasses based in Southern California to offer handmade Eco-Friendly bamboo sunglasses, the Malibu Whites.  


"Inspired by beautiful Malibu, California, we have created our own unique experiment with current pop-cult, nature and art. The result is youthful, hip and unmistakably classic."

Woodwear's photoshoot by PFPhotos (http://instagram.com/pfphotos).

Eco-Friendly sunglasses handcrafted from sustainable bamboo and classic PC frames. They come with Polarized lenses and stainless steel spring hinges to ensure a comfortable fit.  


Customizable Longboard

1) Choose your deck: Jawdrop Freeride, Hangten Pintail, Proteus Freestyle

The Jawdrop is a symmetrical freeride/freestyle deck with a flared nose and tail.  Great for pushing to class or work as well as sliding down hills!



The Hangten Pintail boards are available in either 36", 40", or 46".  Great for pumping, dancing, and carving.



The Proteus DK deck is a classic symmetrical twintip topmount deck with a flared nose and tail. 

2) Handles and Chamfer "Gas Pedals" 

Carry your board with ease using a signature Vallum handle. For your freeride deck, choose between chamfered edge "gas pedals" to initiate slides easier, or a hard straight edge to lock your feet in when bombing. Get your freeride dropped through to get even lower.

3) Choose Design 

Choose any paint combination on our racing-stripe or side-stripe designs (or request a design!). We even have stained painting. We've just added a screen press to our shop and we're excited to include screen pressed Vallum logos on all our orders. 

On Indiegogo only, we're offering our freestyle and freeride boards with newspaper clippings; headlined with the date your board was produced.  Feel free to request newspapers or magazines for your board!

They come with Polarized lenses and stainless steel spring hinges to ensure a comfortable fit.  Customizable Longboard1) Choose your deck: Jawdrop Freeride, Hangten Pintail, Proteus FreestyleThe Jawdrop is a symmetrical freeride/freestyle deck with a flared nose and tail.  Great for pushing to class or work as well as sliding down hills!The Hangten Pintail boards are available in either 36", 40", or 46".  Great for pumping, dancing, and carving.The Proteus DK deck is a classic symmetrical twintip topmount deck with a flared nose and tail. 2) Handles and Chamfer "Gas Pedals" Carry your board with ease using a signature Vallum handle. For your freeride deck, choose between chamfered edge "gas pedals" to initiate slides easier, or a hard straight edge to lock your feet in when bombing. Get your freeride dropped through to get even lower.3) Choose Design Choose any paint combination on our racing-stripe or side-stripe designs (or request a design!). We even have stained painting. We've just added a screen press to our shop and we're excited to include screen pressed Vallum logos on all our orders. On Indiegogo only, we're offering our freestyle and freeride boards with newspaper clippings; headlined with the date your board was produced.  Feel free to request newspapers or magazines for your board!

story:
FEATURES:

  •  High Quality Material: For the blade, we selected 440C Heat Treated Stainless Steel for its excellent edge retention and superior corrosion and wear resistance.
  •  Razor sharp blade: Sharp out of the box and guaranteed to maintain its sharpness for a long time. Easy to sharpen blade material.
  •  Added ball bearing to enhance smooth opening motion and secure blade closing.
  •  Unique Handle Grip: With a smaller sized pocket knife, gripping becomes much more difficult. For this reason, we have redesigned the handle area carefully to maximize grip.
 

  •  Flipper:  Smooth flip action of the blade. Also, a perfect flat head screwdriver when you need it. A portion of the handle snaps in place to provide a safe and secure lock.

 

  •  Thumb Stud:  In addition to the flipper, you can also use the thumb stud to easily open the blade.
  •  Key chain hole: Separate piece added to ensure it fits in with your key ring perfectly without getting in the way.

  •  Pocket Clip:  Clip it on to your jeans, bag, etc. Can also hold folded cash.

OUR MICRO BLADE SPECS:

  • Handle Material: 420 Stainless steel
  • Blade Steel: 440C HT Steel
  • Blade Length (Closed):  2.48” (62mm)
  • Blade Length (Open):  4.10" (104mm)
  • Weight: < 1.5 oz
  • Lock Type: Frame-lock 
  • Pocket Clip
  • Key chain Hole
  • Lifetime Warranty

Examples of Dart Blade Uses:

  • Opening cardboard boxes and thick plastic packages
  • Loosen and tighten screws
  • Belt cutting
  • Cutting fruits
  • Removing staples
  • Fire starting
  • Stripping wires
  • Carving wood
  • And much more...

Our goal has been to design a highly functional pocket knife that can be carried everywhere you go (except the airport security) without the unnecessary weight and size of a full-sized pocket knife. Additionally, we wanted to design the micro blade to look appealing on your key chain, so you can carry it discreetly and comfortably. 

Blade: The design of the blade is carefully selected to maximize cutting edge area while making it an “all-purpose” pocket knife that is perfect for everyday uses. Drop point blades are the most popular blade shapes on tactical and survival knives. With a strong point that is sharp and controllable, it is a perfect blade shape to have on your key chain every single day to take on any difficult situations, expected or unexpected. 

Sizing: One of the most important factor for us. We wanted a pocket blade that is not too large for everyday carry but not too small for everyday use. As you make a pocket knife smaller, the functional aspect is also diminished. For this reason, we created a perfect balance. At closed position, the blade is only 2.48 inches and in open position, it is 4.1 inches. 

Flipper: The flipper is perfect to initiate the blade opening with very little effort. Additional purpose of this feature is to serve as a hand guard. When closing the blade, it protects the index finger from getting in contact with the sharp blade. Lastly, the flipper design allows you to use as a flat head screwdriver.

Thumb Stud: In addition to the flipper, we added a thumb stud to enhance blade opening. Allows quick one-handed opening of the blade.

Locking Mechanism: We chose to go with frame lock mechanism because it’s sturdy, reliable and dependable. It uses the strength of the handle/frame to lock the blade in place while minimizing any play. When the blade is fully open, it perfectly SNAPS in place and prevents accidentally closing when in use. With tight tolerance spec and excessive testing, we can ensure there is no wiggle room. 

Material: The material used for the handle is 420 stainless steel. This steel combines the excellent wear resistance of high carbon alloys with the corrosion resistance of chromium stainless steel. The blade is made of high quality 440C Heat Treated Stainless Steel. Grade 440C has the highest strength, hardness and wear resistance of all the 440-series stainless alloys.

Surface Finish: We offer two surface finishes: Brushed and Jet Black.  Choose a style that best suits you, or get both!

Handle Design: Designed to enhance handle comfort and grip without the boring appearance of traditional knives.

We started this pocket blade design with a rough sketch on paper then we developed a 3D CAD model. After analyzing and refining certain elements of the design, we printed our first prototype using 3D printer. We printed numerous components to perfect the design. Once we finalized, we decided to create our first stainless steel handmade prototype. After months of strength and durability testing, we're proud to introduce our final prototype.

Surface Finish: We offer two surface finishes: Brushed and Jet Black.  Choose a style that best suits you, or get both!
Handle Design: Designed to enhance handle comfort and grip without the boring appearance of traditional knives.



We started this pocket blade design with a rough sketch on paper then we developed a 3D CAD model. After analyzing and refining certain elements of the design, we printed our first prototype using 3D printer. We printed numerous components to perfect the design. Once we finalized, we decided to create our first stainless steel handmade prototype. After months of strength and durability testing, we're proud to introduce our final prototype.

story:
On the road or off-road, your biking journeys should be unstoppable—which is why we created SURPMAX, the world’s first ultra-high endurance electric foldable mountain bike equipped with fast-charging technology. In a nutshell, SURPMAX makes your biking journeys as unstoppable as this very special mountain bike was built to be.

 

 

These days, you don’t want to let anything stop you from going places. That’s why SURPMAX is so ultralight, compact, and easy to store and carry. Just fold it, put it in the trunk of any car, unfold it, and it’s good to go! All so that you can keep moving, no matter what!

 

SURPMAX is not just an upgraded version of conventional mountain bikes. This e-bike embodies the future of what electric mountain bikes will be—with the only difference that, for you, this future is now a bike that you can already ride. SURPMAX’s lightweight and solid aluminum alloy keeps it ultra-light but also means that the bike has a full-shock folding frame. This bike is as robust and shockproof as it gets but features such as its ultralight snow wide rim make it feel closer to an all-terrain weightless feather instead of being heavy just because it’s strong.

 

Oh, and since it’s made to be your sidekick for all your commuting and outdoor adventures, the SURPMAX Electric Mountain Bike is waterproof in every way that matters—in its connector, charge interface and battery. After all, it wouldn’t really be robust if it wasn’t waterproof, would it?

SURPMAX has a battery diagnosis function that lets you know how its battery is doing. That means you always know beforehand when you should re-charge it, so that you can plan your rides better. At the same time, its anti-theft alarm function lets you know when someone attempts to move your bike! 

 

It’s not just because this e-mountain bike is designed to be resistant, safe, and comfortable to you as its rider. SURPMAX adds one extra layer of safety by coming with a free First-Aid Kit. If you’re presented with an unexpected danger, you’ll have the proper First-Aid Kit to deal with it immediately.

 

Rustproof and solid. That’s the reason why we chose the super-light magnesium alloy that’s also used in car rims. SURPMAX’s rims are 45% lighter than aluminum alloy yet they have better shock absorption, being much stronger than carbon fiber. That’s what makes this e-bike so durable: one single rim can withstand 440 lbs / 200kg of weight. In addition to that, a magnesium alloy is an environmentally-friendly material, given that it greatly reduces the discharge of toxic gases and waste liquids when it’s produced.

 

Ok, let’s talk motor business. It all ultimately comes down to the motor, right? Well, SURPMAX is equipped with an especially customized 500W high-speed, high-power brushless motor that also has a magnesium alloy shell. It weighs only 2kg—which is 68% lighter than the traditional motor—and it can achieve a 95% high-energy conversion rate. Compared with a traditional motor, SURPMAX’s motor performance is improved by 42%, and the higher conversion rate ensures a longer riding distance, lower battery consumption, and significantly improved overall efficiency.

 

Avoid crowded places, stay off crowded buses. Get your SURPMAX and to forests, mountains, swamps, snowfields, or to the beach. Here’s why you can go anywhere and have a blast:

 

 

Speed - 25km/h (Europe), 32km/h (USA), maximum speed can reach 50km / h(To achieve this speed it needs to unplug the speed limit wire which we do not recommend for safety purpose)

Tire - CTS 20" * 4.0" comfortable fat tire

Waterproof signal cable - Waterproof plug-in signal cable, support quick replacement of accessories.

Frame - 20" Aluminum alloy full shock folding snow frame

Front Fork - Aluminum shoulder locked titanium shock proof front fork

Shock Absorber - 750 LB spiraled sealed adjustable shock absorber adjustable soft hard

Disc Brake - 160 Mechanical disc brake

Handlebar -  Aluminum alloy double fold adjustable patent handlebar

Transmission - Shimano 7 S

Flywheel - Shimano Class 7 Silent Flywheel

Battery - 48V 10Ah Aluminum alloy detachable lithium battery, from zero to full charge for 2 hours

Motor -  500W customized high-speed high-power fat-wheel motor

Rims -  Front/rear magnesium alloy ultralight 12 blades snow wide rim

Control Unit - 1:1 assistant / thumb knob

Instrument - LCD 5-gear instrument Battery Diagnostics System

Seat Tube - aluminum alloy with scale and code ed seat tube

Fender - PVC front and rear widened snow fender

Chain - Custom snowmobile transmission mute

Endurance - 120km at full power

Distribution - Common kit and special first aid kit for mountain riding

Anti -Anti-theft Alarm

 

Rebels on wheels challenging the limits of what’s regarded as possible… these are today’s street bikers, passionate about enjoying themselves while riding a bike, challenging conventions, and having a blast. For street bikers, a bike is so much more than a medium of transportation. For us, a bike is a statement of autonomy, courage, style and vision. That’s the culture we stand with: the street bike culture that SURPMAX embodies.

 

Binghuo has been hard at work since 2018 developing the world's first ultra-high endurance electric mountain bike equipped with fast-charging technology. Today, SURPMAX has finally been launched, reflecting the enthusiasm for bikes, and electric bikes in particular, that drives our company.

story:
"They say every time Chuck Norris signs an autograph the pen turns into a tiny diamond. Well Norris fans, your search for an indestructible pen is over." - Batman Factor

"[The Rohk Pen from Australian company Ketalon] has developed a cult following among professionals who appreciate the pen’s sturdy build quality." - Cool Backer

The Rohk Pen has a phenomenal list of features (below), rarely seen even in well-designed EDC products. Its striking aesthetic is the result of extensive research on the weaknesses of disposable plastic pens and heavy metal tactical pens.

The bolt action system has proven to be an exceptional mechanism for EDC pens. Its simplicity makes it fail-proof - the pen will last a lifetime while preventing inked pockets through accidental refill exposure. The absence of pen caps or twist mechanisms also allows single-handed use :

The bolt is the only moving part, and features an ergonomic handle that's swiftly activated with the flick of a finger. The satisfying bolt latching sound is addictive (and gets you through those long meetings!)

Above : The Rohk has been successfully funded by passionate backers in 3 other colours.

Backer research revealed some recurring issues with metal pens - the Rohk eliminates these weaknesses and more. As a result, it is guaranteed for life.

Take a look at the Rohk's user-friendly design features that cater to every aspect of your daily pen usage. Its shockproof design and tactical aesthetic are inspired by the world's toughest watch, the legendary G-Shock line. And like G-Shocks, it is not only comfortable to use and carry, but will also outlast most of your gear.

Dozens of refills match the Parker brand size, which means you have a ton of options and nib point sizes for the Rohk Pen. The pen comes with a Parker-style refill (sometimes incorrectly called a 'G2') - this is the industry standard, and is used by 90% of ballpoint pens.

For those who prefer Fisher Space refills - you'll be happy to know every SPR-series Fisher refill comes with a Parker-style insert that is compatible with the Rohk (also applies to RiteintheRain refills).

  • Length : 4.3" (110mm)
  • Width : 0.6" (15mm)
  • Weight (including refill+spring) : 0.8 oz (25 grams)
  • Mechanism : Bolt action
  • Material : Tough thermoset polymer reinforced with 30% glass fiber
  • Integrated pocket clip with zero assembly hardware
  • Black Parker-style refill included
  • Compatible with most Parker-size refills
  • Airport-friendly with zero metal content

The Rohk Pen is made of a special Glass Fibre Reinforced Polymer. Our impact-specific GFRP formula results in a brutally tough structure. Fibre-reinforced polymers are commonly used in making ballistic armor, and in aerospace, automotive, marine and construction industries.

Due to its simple mechanism and shockproof construction, the Rohk Pen will likely outlast all others.

As always, every effort has been made to provide attractively priced rewards to the amazing backer community here on Indiegogo. You may multiply your pledge for additional pens. For parcel tracking, please add AUD 30 (~USD 21) to your chosen reward.

But it's not all about pre-ordering goodies, right? Lending a hand is its own reward. Backers come together from around the world to help bring a cool product to life - and this is no different (Just see what our KS backers say!)

We've been able to make and test an up-to-spec prototype, and also produce the few samples you see above. After yet another successful Kickstarter campaign, we need some help to complete a full manufacturing run and meet minimum order quantity requirements. This is where you come in... and in exchange, you get a one-of-a-kind product that screams style :)

Thanks for reading! For questions, reach out anytime at hello [at] ketalon [dot] com

 

 

Risks and challenges

Yes, there are risks involved in designing something from scratch and bringing it into the world. However, this is our ninth crowdfunding campaign and we know what to expect. In addition, we've designed, manufactured and sold products to customers all over the world, and can leverage our experience to deliver the highest quality and service. If delays occur, as they sometimes can, we'll keep you posted along the way. Those who know us from Kickstarter will also know that we go all out for our backers.

story:
Hello

I've seen other people crowd fund through indiegogo, so I thought I'd give it a shot.
On the 17th of July, I am going to Ecuador for a month, to help in communities by teaching and renovating the buildings there, as well as planting trees in the rainforest to counter deforestation, and constructing and putting in place octopus and turtle houses off the coast. I only need a couple hundred more (I've raised £3,700 so far) and most of the money raised goes to the people and places I will be helping.

I've seen other people crowd fund through indiegogo, so I thought I'd give it a shot.On the 17th of July, I am going to Ecuador for a month, to help in communities by teaching and renovating the buildings there, as well as planting trees in the rainforest to counter deforestation, and constructing and putting in place octopus and turtle houses off the coast. I only need a couple hundred more (I've raised £3,700 so far) and most of the money raised goes to the people and places I will be helping.

story:
Short Summary

My name is Declan Kelly and I have been involved with FIngallians for nearly 30 years

Fingallians GAA Club is a central part of  life in the Swords Community and I plan to cycle 300km to Clifden, Co. Galway on the May Bank Holiday Weekend in a fundraising drive to help upgrade the Fingallians pitches and clubhouse.

10% of funds raised will be donated to the Irish Heart Foundation.

Please find the time to give what you can by card using the link or by donating to me personally.

Thank You

Please find the time to give what you can by card using the link or by donating to me personally.
Thank You

story:
With a full charge the Pomelo Pro can carry you for 38 kilometres, making any city seem small. Thanks to its incredible range, large battery, efficient hub wheels, and regenerative braking you’ll never have to worry about running out juice while on a long cruise.

 

Get everywhere you need to go faster than you thought possible with Pomelo Pro’s dual 200W motors and 4 nm of torque.

Pomelo Pro offers multiple riding modes to accommodate any rider no matter their skill, whether you are a beginner, seasoned veteran, or a casual cruiser. 

 

Pomelo Pro’s advanced battery and dual Hub motors let you make easy work of hard hills. Reach speeds of 25km per hour on 17° inclines and hills and never break a sweat again.

 

Built to be long lasting and endure whatever you put it through, Pomelo Pro has a high structural strength thanks to its Fiberglass and Bamboo deck. It has been tested against high compression, temperature, water resistance, and collision to ensure the highest grades of safety.

 

 

 

Go the distance with Pomelo Pro’s 5700mAh easily swappable polymer battery. Its high capacity is guaranteed to last you for any trip or daily commute you need to make.

Fast Charging
It also is capable of fast charging, meaning you can charge your Pomelo Pro battery to 100% in just 2 hours and be back on the road in no time.



USB Charger
The battery has a built-in USB output so you can charge your devices on-the-go using your Pomelo Pro as a power bank.

 

Pomelo Pro uses dual changeable Hub motors with 200W of power and 4 nm of torque for quick acceleration and braking. They are also easily interchangeable, so you can swap out the polyurethane tire around your Hub motors when they wear down.
 

 

Pomelo Pro uses an intuitive remote trigger so you can control every aspect of your board with one hand. Change the direction, speed, or check the battery with a simple press of a button.




 

We aim to make every Pomelo Pro with precision and care. Check out some pics of our workshop where our team is hard-at-work building and testing the electronic longboard with the world’s longest range!

 

 


Press and Media

Interested in writing or featuring the Pomelo Pro in one of your upcoming articles or reviews? You can find a copy of our press kit HERE or you can reach out to us to chat more at team@pomelopro.com

 

How fast and how far can it go?
The Pomelo Pro can reach a top speed of 42 km an hour and can cover a distance of 38 km.

Will you be shipping globally?
Yes, we will be offering global shipping.

When will you start shipping?
We will start shipping in July of 2018.

What is the max load weight of the board?
The max load of Pomelo Pro is 120kg.

How long does it take to charge?
Pomelo Pro takes 2 hours to charge.

Is the Pomelo Pro water resistant?
Yes, it is IP54 water resistant.

How do I control the board?
You can control your board with the remote trigger.

What do I do when the tires around my Hub Motors wear down?
Pomelo's Hub Motors use polyurethane tires so you can easily swap them if they wear down.

Can I ride it uphill?
Yes, Pomelo Pro can go up 17° hills with ease.

Can I bring it on an airplane?
No, the battery power is too large. You can only check it. However, some airlines may have various rules as the battery is detachable and may allow you to bring it. 

Do you offer any warranty?
We offer warranty only on quality problems in relations to the motor, motherboard, panel, remote, charger, and the T-wrench that is applicable for 1 year

As for the battery we offer a half year warranty.

Will I have to pay the import cost for Pomelo Pro in my country?
If you'd like you can request us to send the Pomelo pro to you AS A GIFT for tax purposes. Please email us at support@pomelopro.com.

 

What is the difference between the Pomelo P5 and the Pomelo Pro?

The biggest differences between the two boards are based on the upgraded series of HUB Motors Pomelo Pro uses, leading to increased range, speed, motor power, and torque, while reducing the overall weight of the board.

Further, we've also added more protection for the battery, using stronger sealing to better protect it from water and debris, and we turned into a screwed battery for rider safety.

story:
Clothes, shoes, makeup, cords for your phone/laptop, headphones, documents, and that does not complete the list of things we take with us when travelling. How to keep a perfectly organized luggage and not to forget the essentials for traveling when packing so many different things?

Vasco smart packing cubes and bags will allow you to keep your luggage in order and help you quickly find what you need. 7 unique bags with the highest number of valuable features will make your trip incredibly easy.  

 

 

The Clothes bag lets you compactly pack your clothes in a luggage, which will also help save space in the luggage. There are three bags with different sizes (small, medium, large). The bags have a special design that will keep your clothes from getting wrinkled and will keep your belongings in a perfect condition. Unique compression zippers help reduce space in the luggage by 60%.

 

Your shoes can travel neatly separated from clothes and other things. Special material absorbs odors.

Vasco cosmetic's bag compactly encloses personal care products for traveling. Sometimes we do not have enough space to put all the personal care products we take with us, using the hook found on the inside the bag is easy to place even in the smallest bathroom. Waterproof material will keep moisture from getting in and accumulating in the bag.

When traveling, we often carry a large number of wires, charging devices, headphones, SIM cards, etc. And they often end up in the same bag and get tangled up. With our Electronics bag you no longer need to worry about how to pack the cables, and you won’t have tangled or torn cables from now on. The cables will be easy to pack, to find and to use. 

The wallet has a special anti-theft RFID technology. You don't need to search for your ticket, passport or the boarding pass anymore. Now all the travel documents are in one place, and you won’t need to search for them. The bags have a special waterproof fastener that will protect your documents from water and rain.

 

Vasco Laptop Sleeve

We use a special soft material that will protect your laptop and add a pocket for notebooks or cables. 

We always have to remember to take so many things on a trip that sometimes we forget the very important ones: a toothbrush, deodorant, chargers, etc. You won’t have to worry about that anymore: multiple pockets in Vasco bags will remind you to fill them in with travel essentials.

We responsibly chose material for Vasco bags and picked a high-quality and durable fabric for each bag that fits its purpose. Our material is waterproof and durable. We chose high-quality, stylish and water resistant fasteners.

Our team specializes in design, technology and marketing. We are enthusiasts who love their craft and love to create innovative products that help people simplify, organize and improve their lives. Founder of the company - Artur Stelmakh have launched successful campaign earlier (including Leveraxe - The Smart Axe) and succeeded in get products to Lowe’s and QVC after crowdfunding campaigns, even failed once.

We believe that our product will benefit everyone, and we are glad to give you the ability to quickly and easily go on a trip or an unforgettable journey. Enjoy your travels!

Risks and challenges

We spent many months working on the origin of the idea and creating the first samples of our products.

We have found a partner for the production of our bags, who has more than 20 years of experience working with leading brands.

We are already in close contact with the manufacturing plant, and they are fully prepared and are awaiting the start of the production.

Our team also has an opportunity to personally verify each shipment to make sure that every customer receives their order without any defects.

We have established the entire process and have prepared the team that will handle all the matters upon the end of the project.

We are hoping to be able to deliver the products even prior to the deadline.

story:
Short Summary

Rotaract clubs around the world organize trips, called Roundtrips, to promote international relations and the importance of building cross-cultural friendships. In May 2012 ASU Rotaract's Abbey Pellino attended Ukraine Trip and returned with the knowledge of Ukrainian culture and the passion to bring Rotaractors to Arizona.

We are a relatively small club based in the Tempe campus of Arizona State University. Our members are dedicated to fostering positive relations with international clubs and spread the word of how much service Rotaract and Rotary International provides for the community. We began constructing the trip in Fall 2013 and on May 14 the first of our six confirmed trippers will arrive.

This trip will allow our guests to experience American and Arizonian culture, meet dedicated Rotarians and Rotaractors, and build friendships to collaborate on future international service projects and work towards a world filled with only peace. 

What We Need & What You Get

We are in need of sponsorships to ensure a successful trip. ASU Rotaract will be putting funds towards:

  • Safety supplies (sunscreen, first aid kits, etc.)
  • Transportation costs 
  • All meals of six international guests for 10 days
  • National park and museum entry fees and parking passes
  • Welcome bags that will include a bag, Arizona Trip shirt, water bottle, sunglasses, and information on the Grand Canyon state
  • Party materials and supplies for the Welcome and Departure dinners
  • Food for all events held with international guests and Rotarians

With your contributions you will be able to experience the United States' second annual Rotaract Roundtrip and be a integral part of putting District 5510 on the international Rotaract map! You will also receive gifts and invitations to events based on your contribution level, and no gift is too small to make this trip unforgettable!

Donations that are not used by the Arizona Trip 2014 fund will be donated on behalf of District 5510 to the Rotary Foundation and End Polio Now Campaign.

The Impact

Rotaractors are not only the future leaders of Rotary, but also the future leaders of the world. Our sole purpose is to bring about peace, fostered through service and international relations. This trip defines what we as Rotaractors are working for, what Rotarians are working for and that is a better world for all. We want to inspire those through the Arizona Trip that ASU Rotaract, and Rotaract as whole, is the first step as young adults and professionals into the world of Rotary.

Other Ways You Can Help

Tell others about it! Use Twitter, Facebook, and email to spread our message around Arizona and the world! Find more at http://asurotaract.weebly.com/

We also understand that financial contributions may not be possible, but do not let that discourage you from being a part of this awesome experience! We are also seeking the following gifts in kind:

  • Loan of camping supplies (four tents, folding chairs, coolers, canopies, sleeping bags)
  • 10-15 24-packs of water bottles to ensure everyone is hydrated
  • Printing services for water bottles, fliers/packets, polyester bags, sunglasses
  • Hosting a Rotaractor for 3-4 nights 
  • Sunscreen and other safety materials such as band-aids, disinfectants, over-the counter medications for food poisoning, motion sickness, headaches

story:
Contact


TreemOutdoors
treemoutdoors@mail.ee
 

What's New and Innovative About Treem Hammock?

Treem hammock is not an ordinary bridge hammock. It may even need a new classification (let's propose "tension hammock"). Unlike other bridge hammocks, it is not its shape but tension that gives the hammock flat lay. Shape just improves it further. Treem hammock hangs from 2 trees but has 4 connection point suspension system, which makes it exceptionally stable and impossible to flip over. It's likely the most comfortable hammock for side sleeping and its very small packed size is also unmatched.

 

The Beginning

It all started a few years ago when my sister gave me a Brazilian hammock. I wasn’t into hammock camping at that time but I gave it a try. Despite a warm summer and having a 3-season sleeping bag I still felt surprisingly cold by the morning and the sleeping position wasn’t great either (I’m a side sleeper).

It all got me thinking: "What if... a hammock could be like a stretcher, so I could have a horizontal lay on it on a sleeping pad?". (read more)

 

The Present

The crowdfunding campaign on Indiegogo was successful and the finances have been disbursed by Indiegogo. I have bought all the materials, made and shipped the hammocks to the backers, thus fulfilling the campaign perks. Now I just continue making hammocks and keep a small quantity in stock for quick delivery. This Indiegogo campaign page is scheduled to be active till the end of this year and will close on the 1st. of january 2020. After the campaign is closed, just write me to treemoutdoors@mail.ee and I will make you a hammock.

  
 

The Hammocks

Treem hammocks come in 2 sizes:
29.5" / 75 cm wide "Side Sleeper" and 33.5" / 85 cm wide "Back Sleeper".

Download: Treem_Hammock_User_Guide.pdf






 

Perks



 

Media Coverage

 
 
 



The Future

The very next addition to the hammock will be a bug net because many people have asked for it.
I have prototyped a cover that fits and looks really good on the hammock. The bug net will likely look similar to this and will fit to current Treem hammocks.

  
 

You can already use a pop up bug net on the hammock, such as "Catoma Adventure Shelters IBNS (Improved BedNet System)" or similar.


 

Why am I doing all this?

I'm hoping to make a living out of it for myself in a way that's both satisfying and meaningful, while making a small contribution to the world.

 

"Moon rays through the leaves,
may tree with dream converge.
A whisper silence cleaves,
from words let "Treem" emerge."
-Indrek

story:
------------------------------------- ! Voor Nederlandse tekst, scroll naar beneden ! -------------------------------------

Imagine a car which produces more energy than it uses. How great would it be if it is your car that powers your house? It's possible when you choose for a car powered by nature’s free energy: solar energy.

                                     We build world's first solar powered family car.

Who are we?

We are the students from Eindhoven University of Technology and we form Solar Team Eindhoven. Eindhoven University of Technology is known for creating some of the newest technologies. Why not use this knowledge and bring our sustainable future a step closer? Last year we decided to form a team with some of the best students from six faculties. We’ve put our studies on a hold for a year to make our dream come true.

Participating in the ‘Cruiser Class’ of the World Solar Challenge 2013®

To show the capabilities of the car, our team will participate in the famous Australian solar car competition. The organization of this event has launched a new class this year for solar cars that are capable to be used in a practical way. Judgment will be based average speed, number of passengers, energy usage and practicality. In October this yea

r, we’ll meet teams from all over the world to compete on being the best practical solar car.

More than the competition

Our goal is not only to win the World Solar Challenge 2013®, we really want to take it a step further and bring solar cars to the consumer. That’s why we’re aiming to obtain a license plate and we’ll continue to show the world our concept after the challenge. Visiting the Dutch embassy of Australia, the Singapore International Energy Week, the Electrical Vehicle Exhibition in Barcelona and many secondary schools are already on the program.

In the end, a research will be conducted to investigate the possibilities of up calling the production and bringing the car to the market. You can already start thinking about what to do with your car. Why not connecting the car to your house and provide it with electricity? Or what about delivering electricity to malls when parked instead of paying for your parking spot? 

Your support is crucial

We want to give you the opportunity to contribute to the creation of this incredible car. With your help we’ll be able to buy the solar panels which will be mounted on the roof of the car and provide us with energy. These panels really are the heart of the car, and you can make it happen!

Let’s do it together

Changing the world can’t be done alone. Become part of the team and join this opportunity. Feel free to contact us with any questions. Let’s do this together!

 

Solar Team Eindhoven

 

------------------------------------------------------ ! Nederlandse tekst ! ------------------------------------------------------

 

Stel je een auto voor die meer energie oplevert dan hij verbruikt. Hoe geweldig zou het zijn als het je auto is die je huis van energie voorziet? Het is mogelijk wanneer je kiest voor een auto aangedreven door de gratis energie uit de natuur: zonne-energie.

                          Wij bouwen ’s werelds eerste gezinsauto op zonne-energie

Wie zijn wij?

We zijn de studenten van de Technische Universiteit Eindhoven en wij vormen Solar Team Eindhoven. De Technische Universiteit Eindhoven staat bekend om het creëren van de nieuwste technologieën. Waarom gebruiken we deze technieken niet om onze duurzame toekomst een stap dichterbij te brengen? Vorig jaar besloten we om een team te vormen met studenten van zes verschillende faculteiten. We hebben onze studies voor een jaar op pauze gezet om onze droom werkelijkheid te laten worden.

Deelname aan de ‘Cruiser klasse’ van de World Solar Challenge 2013®

Om het kunnen van de auto te laten zijn zal ons team deelnemen aan de bekende Australische zonneauto competitie. De organisatie van dit evenement heeft dit jaar een nieuwe klasse geïntroduceerd voor zonneauto’s die geschikt zijn voor praktisch gebruik. Beoordeling zal gebaseerd zijn op de gemiddelde snelheid, het aantal passagiers, het energieverbruik en het gebruiksgemak. In oktober dit jaar zullen wel teams van over de gehele wereld ontmoeten en strijden om onze auto de beste praktische zonneauto te mogen noemen.

Meer dan competitie

Ons doel is niet alleen om de World Solar Challenge 2013® te winnen, we willen echt de stap verder maken en zonneauto’s naar de consument brengen. Daarom zullen we een nummerbord aanvragen en verder gaan met het enthousiasmeren van de wereld voor ons concept. Het bezoeken van de Nederlandse ambassade in Australië, de Singapore International Energy Week, de Elecrical Vehicle Exhibition in Barcelona en middelbare scholen staat al in ons programma.

Op het eind willen onderzoeken of het mogelijk is de productie op te schalen en de auto naar de markt te brengen. Je kunt nu al beginnen te fantaseren over de mogelijkheden van je auto. Waarom je auto niet aan je huis verbinden en deze aan stroom voorzien? Wat denk je van elektriciteit leveren aan winkelcentra tijdens het parkeren in plaats van betalen voor je parkeerplek?

Uw hulp is cruciaal

We willen u de mogelijkheid geven deel te nemen aan de creatie van deze geweldige auto. Met uw hulp kunnen we het zonnepaneel kopen dat op het dak bevestigd zal worden en ons de energie zal leveren. Deze panelen zijn echt het hart van de auto, en u kunt het waarmaken!

Laten we het samen doen!

De wereld veranderen kan niet in je eentje. Wordt deel van het team en neem deel aan deze kans. Voel je vrij om contact met ons op te nemen of vragen te stellen. We kunnen dit samen!

Solar Team Eindhoven
story_txt:
------------------------------------- ! Voor Nederlandse tekst, scroll naar beneden ! -------------------------------------
Imagine a car which produces more energy than it uses. How great would it be if it is your car that powers your house? It's possible when you choose for a car powered by nature’s free energy: solar energy.
                                     We build world's first solar powered family car.

Who are we?
We are the students from Eindhoven University of Technology and we form Solar Team Eindhoven. Eindhoven University of Technology is known for creating some of the newest technologies. Why not use this knowledge and bring our sustainable future a step closer? Last year we decided to form a team with some of the best students from six faculties. We’ve put our studies on a hold for a year to make our dream come true.

Participating in the ‘Cruiser Class’ of the World Solar Challenge 2013®
To show the capabilities of the car, our team will participate in the famous Australian solar car competition. The organization of this event has launched a new class this year for solar cars that are capable to be used in a practical way. Judgment will be based average speed, number of passengers, energy usage and practicality. In October this yea
r, we’ll meet teams from all over the world to compete on being the best practical solar car.

More than the competition
Our goal is not only to win the World Solar Challenge 2013®, we really want to take it a step further and bring solar cars to the consumer. That’s why we’re aiming to obtain a license plate and we’ll continue to show the world our concept after the challenge. Visiting the Dutch embassy of Australia, the Singapore International Energy Week, the Electrical Vehicle Exhibition in Barcelona and many secondary schools are already on the program.
In the end, a research will be conducted to investigate the possibilities of up calling the production and bringing the car to the market. You can already start thinking about what to do with your car. Why not connecting the car to your house and provide it with electricity? Or what about delivering electricity to malls when parked instead of paying for your parking spot? 
Your support is crucial
We want to give you the opportunity to contribute to the creation of this incredible car. With your help we’ll be able to buy the solar panels which will be mounted on the roof of the car and provide us with energy. These panels really are the heart of the car, and you can make it happen!
Let’s do it together
Changing the world can’t be done alone. Become part of the team and join this opportunity. Feel free to contact us with any questions. Let’s do this together!
 
Solar Team Eindhoven
 
------------------------------------------------------ ! Nederlandse tekst ! ------------------------------------------------------
 
Stel je een auto voor die meer energie oplevert dan hij verbruikt. Hoe geweldig zou het zijn als het je auto is die je huis van energie voorziet? Het is mogelijk wanneer je kiest voor een auto aangedreven door de gratis energie uit de natuur: zonne-energie.
                          Wij bouwen ’s werelds eerste gezinsauto op zonne-energie
Wie zijn wij?
We zijn de studenten van de Technische Universiteit Eindhoven en wij vormen Solar Team Eindhoven. De Technische Universiteit Eindhoven staat bekend om het creëren van de nieuwste technologieën. Waarom gebruiken we deze technieken niet om onze duurzame toekomst een stap dichterbij te brengen? Vorig jaar besloten we om een team te vormen met studenten van zes verschillende faculteiten. We hebben onze studies voor een jaar op pauze gezet om onze droom werkelijkheid te laten worden.
Deelname aan de ‘Cruiser klasse’ van de World Solar Challenge 2013®
Om het kunnen van de auto te laten zijn zal ons team deelnemen aan de bekende Australische zonneauto competitie. De organisatie van dit evenement heeft dit jaar een nieuwe klasse geïntroduceerd voor zonneauto’s die geschikt zijn voor praktisch gebruik. Beoordeling zal gebaseerd zijn op de gemiddelde snelheid, het aantal passagiers, het energieverbruik en het gebruiksgemak. In oktober dit jaar zullen wel teams van over de gehele wereld ontmoeten en strijden om onze auto de beste praktische zonneauto te mogen noemen.
Meer dan competitie
Ons doel is niet alleen om de World Solar Challenge 2013® te winnen, we willen echt de stap verder maken en zonneauto’s naar de consument brengen. Daarom zullen we een nummerbord aanvragen en verder gaan met het enthousiasmeren van de wereld voor ons concept. Het bezoeken van de Nederlandse ambassade in Australië, de Singapore International Energy Week, de Elecrical Vehicle Exhibition in Barcelona en middelbare scholen staat al in ons programma.
Op het eind willen onderzoeken of het mogelijk is de productie op te schalen en de auto naar de markt te brengen. Je kunt nu al beginnen te fantaseren over de mogelijkheden van je auto. Waarom je auto niet aan je huis verbinden en deze aan stroom voorzien? Wat denk je van elektriciteit leveren aan winkelcentra tijdens het parkeren in plaats van betalen voor je parkeerplek?
Uw hulp is cruciaal
We willen u de mogelijkheid geven deel te nemen aan de creatie van deze geweldige auto. Met uw hulp kunnen we het zonnepaneel kopen dat op het dak bevestigd zal worden en ons de energie zal leveren. Deze panelen zijn echt het hart van de auto, en u kunt het waarmaken!
Laten we het samen doen!
De wereld veranderen kan niet in je eentje. Wordt deel van het team en neem deel aan deze kans. Voel je vrij om contact met ons op te nemen of vragen te stellen. We kunnen dit samen!
Solar Team Eindhoven

story:
This is my story in a nutshell. I joined the US Army in May 2011 to serve my country and earn great benefits for my family. Since my enlistment I have been home with my family a total of 6 months in the past 2.5 years. I recently returned from Afghanistan towards the end of January having spent 9 months in country. I have always been a hard worker and provided everything possible for my family.

I have always wanted to buy a motorcycle for myself since joining the Army but finances have always been a hinderence. I am currently selected to leave again for another year serving active duty in just over 35 days. I would love a shot at trying to fund the purchase of a cruiser flat out. I can't take any loans out because I am trying to purchase my family a home with my VA loan benefits. If you know anything about mortage lending, then opening a new loan prior to trying to qualify for a home won't work. 

I figured I'd give this route a chance to see I can get the finances together to buy a bike outright for myself. I spent most of my downtime in Afghanistan watching Sons of Anarchy and fell in love with Harley's and Dyna Custom bikes. The sound of them gives me goose bumps. I've begged the wife for a bike but the timing hasn't been right financially due to last minute finance issues.

She told me if I can get the money without selling my soul and/or blood then I can have a bike. I'd love to get a Harley but the likelyhood of that is slim. Honestly anything that runs well and looks half way decent is all I'd ever want.

Here is my pitch, Look at it as a tax write off or a donation to a good cause. I have spent the last 2 years as a behavioral health specialist in the Army and will be heading back out again to do the job that I love for 1 more year, helping soldiers find a way back home from injuries that can't be seen. Mental trauma for these men and women who have volunteered to serve our country is still going untreated or undiagnosed. I have seen first hand the destruction it can have on relationships and military careers. Sometimes its draining and stressful to do what I do, but I do believe I was put on this earth to help. For me, a motorcycle would be an amazing stress relief for the days I have to absorb alot of bad energy and help my battle buddies sort through the fog that is civilian life.

My goal is 10K so that I can buy something nice and hopefully have enough left over for taxes, tags, title and riding equipment.

I thank you in advance for anything you have to contribute to this campaign.

story:
If you’ve ever tried setting up a remote video monitoring device you know how difficult it can be. With traditional IP cameras, you must have a PC, and you have to know how to configure DDNS, Ports and Firewalls. Or you have to pay big bucks for costly installations. Not anymore!

 

 

 

 

 

 

No PC required. With 3G/4G or Wi-Fi Connects Directly to Your Mobile Devices

With link-U there’s no need to connect to a PC. Instead, link-U connects directly to your smartphone or mobile device via its built-in 3G/4G cellular modem or Wi-Fi. Thanks to this flexible ‘hybrid’ configuration, link-U finds the best way to establish the connection between itself and your mobile device automatically.

 

 

 

 

     

 

 

Why it’s different.

 

Link-U makes sure you are always in touch, even when you move link-U to another location. Move it upstairs or downstairs, take it outdoors, to your motorhome, to the park, to the pool… anywhere you want to monitor! And link-U comes with two sources of power: standard Power over Ethernet (PoE), and a backup 8-hour battery — so link-U is available even when the power goes out.

 

 

Remote Control from IPhone and Android

 

Use the link-U mobile app to control up to ten link-U devices from your iOS or Android smartphone or mobile device. Receive alerts, connect to your home, interact with people remotely (video chat), or retrieve past events recorded in the internal memory. Using the link-U app is simple. Set the ‘events’ that should trigger the sensor to start automatic video recording, and the alerts you want to receive. When you receive an alert, use link-U to see what triggered the sensors. You can access video recorded at the time of any event. Or you can check on what is happening live, with full control over the video camera, including pan and zoom. On board speakers and an internal microphone allow you to video chat with people right through the link-U app.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Bluetooth Smart Hub. Control Your Other Smart Home Devices

 

Link-U includes a Bluetooth Smart hub that allows you to remotely monitor and control up to ten Bluetooth Smart Home devices, directly from the app interface installed on your smartphone. You can use link-U to intelligently manage devices such as:

·  Carbon monoxide and fire detectors

·  Window intrusion alarms

·  Remote locks for doors and garages

·  Light fixtures

 

 

 

 

 

Press Coverage

"None of the models we've reviewed offer quite as many contingencies in case of spotty Wi-Fi, power outages…or both"

 

"The new link-U Hybrid SmartCam by Link-Union, in fact, is a video monitoring camera with first-of-its-kind patent-pending hybrid technology."

"Using your smartphone, you can check in on your son at home in real time -- in full, interactive HD -- and gain peace of mind."

"link-U is designed so well that it handles everything."

"link-U is different from other IP cameras on the market."

"No problem. You can go anywhere with link-U."

"It intuitively – and automatically – uses either LAN (home network) or 3G/4G connections, for easy, 24/7 access without complicated setup and configuration."

"The link-U camera/hub works with Android or iOS apps that let users monitor home devices from a mobile device via Wi-Fi, Ethernet or 3G/4G cellular connection."

"What happens when there's a power outage or your sometimes-spotty Internet craps out? Interestingly, Link-Union has a solution."

"What if your Internet service goes out? That's where link-U comes in."

"The Hybrid SmartCam isn’t just a home monitoring camera, it can also connect to smart home devices too. This works using low-energy Bluetooth 4.0 and a main hub, featuring an 8-hour backup battery, does the connecting."

"Whether you want a reliable home camera for security or just to stay in touch with the family while you’re on the road, the new link-U Hybrid SmartCam is the perfect choice."

"Because it’s a “hybrid,” it can also connect via 3G/4G—and can actually do that automatically in case your web connection gets cut off."

"It’s the first complete hybrid smart cam to enter the domain. Link-U is also the perfect monitoring cam that makes use of features like motion sensing, audio sensing and infrared vision to enhance footage shot during the night."

 

 

 

What can link-U do for you?

 

Your son is having a piano lesson, and you are stuck in traffic?
No problem! 

Are you away, and you want to make sure everything at home is well?
No problem!

Do you need to monitor an area without LAN or without power?
No problem!

Nobody is at home, but your link-U sends you an  alarm?
No problem!

 

                     

                           Just like U being there!

 

 

How do you  control it?

1. Settings

Set the events that should trigger the sensor to start automatic video recording, and the alerts you want to receive.

2. Alerts

When you receive an alert, you can check the event list and see what triggered the sensors.

3. Recorded

From the list preview you can access the video recorded at the time of any event...

4. Live

...or check on what is happening live. Listen, speak, interact, and remotely control your Bluetooth Smart devices at home.

 

What do we pack inside?

Vision.

Progressive scan CMOS up to 1080p/30fps for crisp high quality video output; 130 degree Wide Angle Lens;  Internal Infrared LED for night vision .

 

Always connected.

LAN (Ethernet port or Wi-Fi) and internal 3G/4G modem. No need to set-up DDNS, Routers or Firewalls.

Remote monitoring.

Remote monitoring on smartphones or tablets running Apple iOS or Android. No need for computers.

Alert message system.

Alerts are based on movement or noise-triggering events and are sent directly to your mobile devices via push notifications.

Live interaction.

On board speakers and an internal mic allow you to see, speak and interact with those at home from your mobile devices.

Dual power.

Twice the power with a PoE plug and an internal 8-hour battery. 35W PoE injector is included.

 

Smart.

Connect and control a wide variety of home devices from door detection and temperature control to carbon monoxide and fire alarms via the internal Bluetooth Smart interface from your mobile devices.

SD Storage.

You can review recorded events at any time directly from your mobile devices thanks to the internal SD memory card. 

         

About Us

 

At Link-Union we have devoted all of our efforts to building a device that connects you with what you care about most. Stay close to your children, elderly family members, pets and belongings. With link-U, it’s just like U being there.

The link-U Hybrid SmartCam also brings a sense of security to your home. Even when you are away, it’s possible to keep an eye on your garage or home office and be alerted to any intrusions.

With Bluetooth Smart technology, you can connect other devices you need and personalize your Smart Home. 

 

 

 

     

Our story

 

Andy is link-U’s founder, and he is always traveling for business. So much so, that he once received a message from his favorite airline, stating: “Congratulations! You have more flying hours than our pilots!!!”

But, with having a family, he faced a hard task. How could he feel closer to his children and elderly mother, while also keeping an eye on his belongings and the mischievous pets back at home? And how could his wife feel safer when she was at home alone with the children?

He started by buying several webcams to connect at home, but the router configuration, DDNS problems and invasive firewalls were always so troublesome.

When he discussed his troubles with Link Union IT Designer, the idea was born. Why not create a hybrid SmartCam by combining 3G-4G technology with an internal battery to solve any connectivity problems?

So link-U was born, and a design team was created in San Jose, California.

Taiwan-based technical partner guaranteed the feasibility of the project, and now link-U needs your support to reach production.

 

 

We need your help to bring link-U to the world

We love link-U and have worked hard to make a working prototype. We’ve put countless development and testing hours into link-U’s software. To make it available to everyone for a reasonable price, we need your contribution. Help us reach our goal and bring the link-U Hybrid SmartCam to the world.

 

 

 

 

FAQ

 

 

Do I need to setup my router and firewall to connect link-U with my smartphone?

No. Thanks to its Hybrid configuration, link-U can find the best way to establish the connection between itself and your mobile device automatically.

Where are my video files stored? Is my privacy safe?

We take storage and privacy very seriously. That’s why we created link-U to store and encrypt all data in its internal memory, so you are the only one who can access its files. Nothing is stored on our servers. 

Does link-U consume a lot of data on my 3G/4G plan?

link-U will try to use your LAN to send data to mobile devices. If LAN is unavailable, it will switch to its 3G/4G internal modem. Data consumption is very low in down streaming and it will only consume the data necessary for pinging your request. 

Will one or several link-U Hybrid SmartCams in the same home consume a lot of bandwidth on my LAN?

No, all video data is stored in the internal SD memory card, and video streaming will be launched only when required by the user from a mobile device.

Can I easily move my link-U from one place to another?

link-U has an internal battery and an internal 3G/4G modem, so it can work anywhere with or without power, and with or without LAN or Wi-Fi for approximately 8 hours.

Can link-U work without the 3G/4G connection or without a SIM card?

Yes, but then you need to properly setup your router and firewall configurations in the same way you would for most other webcams and home monitoring devices.

What kind of Bluetooth Smart home devices will my link-U connect to?

We are compiling a list of them, but basically all the BTLE devices which run in an ON-OFF environment are compatible. For example gas or fire detectors, sirens, windows intrusion sensors, door or garage remote locks, lighting fixtures and switches are all compatible. More complex devices like thermostats are not compatible right now, but we will work hard to make them compatible in a future App upgrade.

Can link-U accept several smartphone logins? Can one smartphone access several link-U Hybrid SmartCams?

Yes, both are possible up to 10.

When will link-U be available?

October 2015.

Does link-U setup require a computer?

No, the App installed on your mobile device gives you access to all configuration settings.

Is link-U compatible with Android?

Yes, link-U works with both Android and Apple iOS mobile devices.

Do I need to set up a DDNS service?

No, link-U will use the 3G/4G modem to define the proper IP address, then switch to LAN. Your link-U is ready to use from the second you open the box; just set a data SIM card inside the bay and you're ready to go.

 

Does link-U allows for different mounting positions?

The round base is screwed to the link-U with a standard camera screw. This makes it easy for to customize a mounting position with any standard camera mounting arm.

What is the video sensor's definition?

The link-U video sensor  has a resolution  up to 1920x1080 at 30fps.

How good is the quality of link-U night vision?

 

link-U has  LED Infrared (IR) night vision , so  you can see up  to a guaranteed 25 feet (8 meters). Image quality is pretty awesome (we are using a new type of LED IR which is really powerful), but please note that in most cases, final video quality is mainly related to connection  strength more than the video sensor’s capability.

 

Does the 130 degree lens creates distortion?

 

The level of distortion is related to distance. Objects very near the lens will be  slightly distorted, but from a distance of 4 feet or more, distortion is unnoticeable.

Does my link-U come with a power adaptor? How many devices can it support?

link-U come with a PoE injector of 24W which can power one unit only. If you use power from a standard PoE Hub, each port can serve only one link-U unit (PoE standard  IEEE 802.3at).

Can I record the video streaming directly to a computer or a video recorder server?

At this moment link-U can only record to its internal SD card memory only. One of the key-design points from the beginning was to avoid any LAN bandwidth occupation.

Can I install link-U outside?

 

No, link-U is not IP-66 rated, so it cannot be installed outside and should not come in contact with water. Of course its 4G internal modem and back-up battery allow you to use it outside for a limited time (up to 8 hours) and in normal weather conditions.

 

 

 

 

We need your help to bring link-U to the world

We love link-U and have worked hard to make a working prototype. Now we need your help to make it available to everyone for a reasonable price. Please contribute, and help us reach our goal and bring the link-U Hybrid SmartCam to the world.

 

Problem backing us?

 

Please contact info@link-union.com

 

 

 

Linky T-Shirt

Get a fantastic T-shirt with our logo “Linky” on it!
