     Our story
 Andy is link-U’s founder, and he is always traveling for business. So much so, that he once received a message from his favorite airline, stating: “Congratulations! You have more flying hours than our pilots!!!”But, with having a family, he faced a hard task. How could he feel closer to his children and elderly mother, while also keeping an eye on his belongings and the mischievous pets back at home? And how could his wife feel safer when she was at home alone with the children?He started by buying several webcams to connect at home, but the router configuration, DDNS problems and invasive firewalls were always so troublesome.When he discussed his troubles with Link Union IT Designer, the idea was born. Why not create a hybrid SmartCam by combining 3G-4G technology with an internal battery to solve any connectivity problems?So link-U was born, and a design team was created in San Jose, California.Taiwan-based technical partner guaranteed the feasibility of the project, and now link-U needs your support to reach production.  We need your help to bring link-U to the worldWe love link-U and have worked hard to make a working prototype. We’ve put countless development and testing hours into link-U’s software. To make it available to everyone for a reasonable price, we need your contribution. Help us reach our goal and bring the link-U Hybrid SmartCam to the world.    FAQ  Do I need to setup my router and firewall to connect link-U with my smartphone?No. Thanks to its Hybrid configuration, link-U can find the best way to establish the connection between itself and your mobile device automatically.Where are my video files stored? Is my privacy safe?We take storage and privacy very seriously. That’s why we created link-U to store and encrypt all data in its internal memory, so you are the only one who can access its files. Nothing is stored on our servers. Does link-U consume a lot of data on my 3G/4G plan?link-U will try to use your LAN to send data to mobile devices. If LAN is unavailable, it will switch to its 3G/4G internal modem. Data consumption is very low in down streaming and it will only consume the data necessary for pinging your request. Will one or several link-U Hybrid SmartCams in the same home consume a lot of bandwidth on my LAN?No, all video data is stored in the internal SD memory card, and video streaming will be launched only when required by the user from a mobile device.Can I easily move my link-U from one place to another?link-U has an internal battery and an internal 3G/4G modem, so it can work anywhere with or without power, and with or without LAN or Wi-Fi for approximately 8 hours.Can link-U work without the 3G/4G connection or without a SIM card?Yes, but then you need to properly setup your router and firewall configurations in the same way you would for most other webcams and home monitoring devices.What kind of Bluetooth Smart home devices will my link-U connect to?We are compiling a list of them, but basically all the BTLE devices which run in an ON-OFF environment are compatible. For example gas or fire detectors, sirens, windows intrusion sensors, door or garage remote locks, lighting fixtures and switches are all compatible. More complex devices like thermostats are not compatible right now, but we will work hard to make them compatible in a future App upgrade.Can link-U accept several smartphone logins? Can one smartphone access several link-U Hybrid SmartCams?Yes, both are possible up to 10.When will link-U be available?October 2015.Does link-U setup require a computer?No, the App installed on your mobile device gives you access to all configuration settings.Is link-U compatible with Android?Yes, link-U works with both Android and Apple iOS mobile devices.Do I need to set up a DDNS service?No, link-U will use the 3G/4G modem to define the proper IP address, then switch to LAN. Your link-U is ready to use from the second you open the box; just set a data SIM card inside the bay and you're ready to go. Does link-U allows for different mounting positions?The round base is screwed to the link-U with a standard camera screw. This makes it easy for to customize a mounting position with any standard camera mounting arm.What is the video sensor's definition?The link-U video sensor  has a resolution  up to 1920x1080 at 30fps.How good is the quality of link-U night vision? link-U has  LED Infrared (IR) night vision , so  you can see up  to a guaranteed 25 feet (8 meters). Image quality is pretty awesome (we are using a new type of LED IR which is really powerful), but please note that in most cases, final video quality is mainly related to connection  strength more than the video sensor’s capability. Does the 130 degree lens creates distortion? The level of distortion is related to distance. Objects very near the lens will be  slightly distorted, but from a distance of 4 feet or more, distortion is unnoticeable.Does my link-U come with a power adaptor? How many devices can it support?link-U come with a PoE injector of 24W which can power one unit only. If you use power from a standard PoE Hub, each port can serve only one link-U unit (PoE standard  IEEE 802.3at).Can I record the video streaming directly to a computer or a video recorder server?At this moment link-U can only record to its internal SD card memory only. One of the key-design points from the beginning was to avoid any LAN bandwidth occupation.Can I install link-U outside? No, link-U is not IP-66 rated, so it cannot be installed outside and should not come in contact with water. Of course its 4G internal modem and back-up battery allow you to use it outside for a limited time (up to 8 hours) and in normal weather conditions.    We need your help to bring link-U to the worldWe love link-U and have worked hard to make a working prototype. Now we need your help to make it available to everyone for a reasonable price. Please contribute, and help us reach our goal and bring the link-U Hybrid SmartCam to the world. Problem backing us? Please contact info@link-union.com   Linky T-ShirtGet a fantastic T-shirt with our logo “Linky” on it!

story:
Hi! My name is Nolan Baker and I'm in the eighth grade at Edvisons Off Campus and I have been offered an opportunity to travel to London for 10 days in March as part of a school trip to study the art and history of this large city. I will be traveling with 18 other students and I'm excited to learn the history as I experience the city firsthand! We will spend the entire time in the city of London visiting  Windsor and Stonehenge. I think this trip will be a great experience for me as I get ready to enter high school next year. 

 

My goal is to raise $1,500 to cover travel, supplies and meals.  I know that you will want to see how your donation is contributing to my trip so every donor will get access to a Vimeo link where I will be uploading pictures from my travels so you can see the sights and follow along.  Donations of any amount are welcome and greatly appreciated.  For a $25 donation, you will receive an original linoleum print there are twenty of these items that you can claim by donating. For those that can contribute $75, you will receive one of four framed photos from the trip and for the first donor to contribute $100 or more will receive a one of a kind framed original sketch of one of the places we are going to visit in London.  It would be really helpful if you could share the link so I can get the word out and reach my goal. 

 

Thank you,

Nolan

story:
goTele sold in Amazon:

https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0775FXG6N

What is goTele?   

goTele is an off-grid outdoor tracking device specifically for outdoor enthusiasts and their friends, families, and pets to experience safe and exciting adventures. Everyone can check all (at most 30) group members' real-time positions and trajectories in one map, communicate with each other by sending SMS texts, send SOS signals in an emergency, etc – all without using any smartphone service and data! goTele was developed and continuously optimized by our hard-working R&D team who has been spending countless days and nights working on its unique DS-SS technology since 2013.

When to Use goTele？

Besides common outdoor activities, goTele can also be widely used in the following scenarios:
*Skiing and Snowboarding
*Camping, Hiking and Hunting
*Children and Pets Supervision
*International Travels or Family Vacations
*Team Activities, e.g. Road Trips
*Outdoor Games, Cross Country Races, Cycling, Motorcycling
*Festivals and Concerts
*Emergency, Rescue and Disaster Relief
*Boy/Girl Scouts Acitivies
*Water Sports, e.g. Kayaking, Rafting

How Does goTele Work?

 

Mesh and Our Core DS-SS Technology

Mesh requires fixed team formations to support its transmission network, therefore it is only suitable for military use. However, team formation is random in outdoor activities, making it difficult to form an effective Mesh transmission network; people always lose connection with each other even when they are apart in short distances. In addition, Mesh's high power consumption and short continuous working time proves that it is not the best choice for outdoor activities.

In order to improve all these defects, goTele adopts revolutionary DS-SS technology because of its advantages in low power consumption, strong anti-interference ability, and high sensitivity of receiving signals. goTele's transmission distance is enhanced by 5 times, which is 3-5 times stronger than Mesh's. 1W of goTele's transmission distance is equivalent to 5W of a walkie-talkie. Furthermore, goTele has a unique communication protocol, which can easily support networking of up to 30 users.

Independent Built-in GPS Module

After a year of outdoor testing and intensive research, we decided to build a cutting-edge GPS module with the highest precision into goTele despite its high cost.

goTele effectively tracks your position stably and continuously under any troublesome and emergent situation. It saves on smartphone power consumed by GPS positioning and greatly improves team safety in outdoor adventures, furthermore, the precision is higher than GPS inside the phone.

Main Features

All thoughtful functions of goTele are deliberately designed for the easiest and most convenient operation for your outdoor adventures, and we will introduce the main features for you as follows.

Real-time Tracking

goTele app enables you to view and compare real-time locations and trajectories of all 30 teammates directly in the same map without sending requests to each other. 
Whether you’re watching the personalized avatar icon of your friends in the map during your trip or reviewing the saved trajectories record after trip, you’ll feel goTele rather interesting, and it can really bring more fun and happy memory for your trip.

SOS

One SOS button is specifically designed on goTele device to enable its owner in trouble to send out SOS signals and real-time location to your teammates in case of emergencies (e.g. smartphone lost or with no power).

Geo-Fence

The Geo-Fence function lets you monitor and protect your loved ones by simply setting a safety distance in the app (100, 200, 300, 500, 1000, 2000 and 3000 meters). When the goTele device is carried by your kids or pets, the app will alert you once they exceed the safety distance.

Off-line Map

goTele provides the free using and downloading of the top 5 common high-definition off-line maps, which includes Google Satellite, Google Map, Google Relief, Open Cycle and Open Street.

Message

You can send messages, emojis, and real-time locations to your group members even when your smartphone is out of service. It makes sure that each group member gets connected at any time under any situation.

Three Proofings

goTele is a high-quality product that is designed with 3 types of protection. (IP67 waterproof, dustproof and shockproof). In addition, goTele can resist extreme weather conditions between -20℃ to 60℃.

goTele on the Media

Product Specification

Latest Progress

We have conducted field testing of goTele all over the world, including distributors and outdoor influencers from USA, Canada, Australia, Norway, Hungary, African countries, India, New Zealand and so on. 

We have achieved large-scale testing and mass production of goTele, which is already our second generation product, therefore goTele is undoubtedly a satisfactory product with thoughtful functions and high quality.

Company Introduction

Beijing Tele Industry Information Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in December 2013. It is specialized in outdoor sports safety communication solutions.

In virtue of our accumulated industry experience over years, we were awarded the following awards：

  • Beijing division champion of Chinese intelligent hardware competition in 2015;
  • The best business value award winner of China smart hardware competition;
  • China outdoor sports association designated supplier.

Our company is the standard setter of Chinese national digital walkie-talkie FDMA. Other core team members are experienced senior executives from well-known enterprises, including following companies and institutes:

  • Hytera, the Chinese leading private network company and global second private network company;
  • NOKIA Mobile Telecommunications;
  • Beijing Sougou Science and Technology Development Co., Ltd;
  • Synertone Communication Corporation, the private network leader for Chinese army;
  • Chinese famous research institutes.

Product Iteration

Time Line

FAQ

1.Where can I download the goTele app? 
You can download the app in goTele official website, App Store, and Google Play, by simply searching “goTele”. Or, you can scan the QR code behind the goTele devices.

2.How to fix goTele GPS signal?
The goTele device can be paired and searched by goTele app with smartphone inside the building, while the goTele GPS signal has to be fixed outside building in the open air.
 
3.How does goTele work? 
goTele network works well by its devices and powerful app.
Each goTele device has GPS and transmitters and receivers inside itself, and needn’t relay stations to transmit. Each goTele can send and receive information within a direct point-to-point transmission range. As long as the devices are in the transmission range of each other, they can send locations to each other and communicate with each other, creating a safe private wireless network.
The app is used for displaying and realizing all functions, such as connecting and searching devices, creating group, selecting maps, recording management, displaying all users’ locations, walking distance, recording time, sending text, SOS alerts, showing remaining power, setting geo-fence distance, saving trajectories and so on. 

4.Shall I pay extra charges for goTele from service provider? 
No, apart from goTele device itself, you don’t need to pay any extra fees.

5.How long is the warranty of goTele?
All goTele devices provide 1 year limited warranty.

6.How to charge the goTele and how long is its battery life?
goTele can be charged with any standard micro USB cable through a USB port, standard USB charger or portable source. 
If goTele is charged for 3-4 hours, it will continuously work for 48+ hours. 

7.How does goTele do real-time tracking?
Each goTele device consistently send out its GPS location through radio signal, and all the other goTele devices will soon receive it and store the location, then the app display all the locations simultaneously and link them up to form a trajectory.

8.Can goTele work at anywhere in the world?
There is no geographical restraint on goTele’s operation area, but it is necessary to understand the radio laws and regulations of the area before using it. The GPS satellites are for global use, as long as this area covered by GPS signal, goTele will work normally.

9.How to know if I need a goTele app or not?
goTele can work independently without pairing to phone and use app, if one (children or pets) doesn’t have a smartphone and needn’t to view other team members’ locations, he/she/it just need to take goTele device and needn’t to download app, as other users in the team with app can check the location of that user. 

 However, you still need the app in the following situations:
- When you pair your goTele with your own smart phone as a group leader;
- When you want to view your team members’ locations and trajectories; 
- When you want to receive the SOS signals. 

10.Can I save trajectory of each trip?
Yes, you can save the record of your and all other members’ trajectories for your trip.

11.What’s the difference between goTele app and Google Maps app?
Except own location tracking, goTele can display all group users' locations, but Google Maps app cannot do this. goTele also has other functions such as SOS and geo-fence etc.

12.How do goTele members share their locations?
After your friends, family, or pets are added to your group, goTele app will automatically display all their locations on the same map.
After joining the group, you can send your text and current location through team chat function to all team members manually.
If someone presses the SOS button, the app will send a SOS signal to all members on the sender's location, even if the sender doesn't download the app.

13.Has goTele been approved by the FCC?
Yes, goTele has been FCC approved.

14.Who can receive the SOS signal?
Every member in your group who have paired goTele with smart phone and has goTele app can receive SOS signals.

15.How far is the transmission range of goTele? 
It’s about 3-5 Km (1.8-3.1 miles) in the open wild, 1-3 Km (.6-1.8 miles) in the city, and it changes slightly and depends on different terrain and environment conditions as mountains, trees and buildings will block the signal.

16.Can you explain the differences between goTele and other outdoor communication products?
Their differences are displayed in the following pictures:

With 2 successful campaigns & more than 1000 orders fulfilled,  you can trust us to deliver our 3rd Campaign: The Black Ops Back Pack to you.  

Whether you are on vacation or commuting to work, Black Ops will protect your property and your safety discretely.

 

Crafted using our proprietary fabric with hi-tech high molecular weight polyethylene (HMWPE) fibers, also used in composite plates in military armor & even parachute suspension lines.

Our range of anti-cut fabrics are at least 3 - 5 times more cut resistant than Kevlar; a popular component in bullet proof vests.

Made with the same anti-cut fabric used by military & law enforcement agencies

It takes specialized tools to cut and prepare such fabric; so much so that it just doesn't make sense for the petty thief to waste time on your bag.
 

It would simply take too much time & draws too much attention!

 

Using a special steel cable strap, you can now lock black ops securely to any permanent fixtures.  

Think beach benches, while you surf some waves.

 

Focus on your dinner date, not your bag.

 

Specially designed buckles means you can remove them if TSA officers decide to be super strict!

 

 

Each day, an estimated 3,400 people are killed globally in road accidents!

 

3 light sequence ( TRON | SLOW FLASH | RAPID FIRE )

 

Interior lights means no more searching the dark abyss of your bag. Powered by drycell AA batteries means no issues with TSA checks!

 

Our smaller 11 litres Black Ops daypack even fits a 13" Macbook Air!

 

Did you know that the top 3 places that phones are stolen from are:

1.  Back Pants Pockets

2.  Side Pants Pockets

3. Jacket Side Pockets

 

With our anti-slip strap band, your phone is safer in front 

and it's also the perfect area to be an ACTION CAM.

 

Need more space?

Strap bands below Black Ops help you carry more!

Gym mats, sweaters or even a sleeping bag!

 

Rip-Stop Nylon Lining = lightweight + tough

 

Caught in a drizzle?  No worries, our rip-stop fabric has high water resistance too.

 

TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS

 

NEED MORE SPACE?   

 

 

 

 

By backing this project, you are helping to turn our dreams into reality.  As an added bonus, any backer who shares this project will receive free USB Flexi-light! 

So please share this project via social media, email and word of mouth to tell your friends and family about our campaign. 

Click the share button at the top of the page! 

(Post on the comment page us to let us know you have shared or just pm us your link).

Share to receive a free USB flexi-light with your pledge

 

A glimpse of our humble workshop 

We are February 29 Artisans. We create functional and thoughtful carry solutions.

 

 

Risks and challenges

This is our 3rd campaign since 2016.

With the experience gathered, we are confident that we will be able to deliver on our promises. Even if things goes southwards, we promise to give you full transparency and solve them in a way that leaves our backers happy and proud to support us.

Manufacturing Risk: Along the supply chain, our part suppliers may run out of raw materials, sometimes something along the way breaks and takes a couple of days to fix. These things happen from time to time and can affect how long it takes to craft our products. Should the response by overwhelming, production & shipping would be done in batches and delivery dates would be extended accordingly.

Shipping Risk: Shipping world wide is no easy feat. Our experienced fulfillment partners would do their best. If you live down the dust path in the middle of nowhere, do allow more time for your pledge to reach you.

Acts of God: There are just too many things we mere mortals can't control. We'll do our best to get through it together.

Duty/VAT charges: “In this world, nothing can be said to be certain except Death and Taxes” - Benjamin Franklin. Do check with your local customs & tax office.

Expectations: We are using high grade anti-cut material but that doesn't mean they are invincible. It would be a pain to craft them into bags if they were. Rest assure, black ops is still going to protect your valuables against the typical pickpocket and petty thief. It is still important to practice common sense and street smarts to avoid the super villains!

story:
Short Summary

On Jan 1st, 2014 I will board a plane headed for the Leyte province in the Eastern Visayas region of the Philippines. Leyte weathered the brunt of Typhoon Haiyan that in early November stripped the region of almost everything essential for survival. After consideration I will offer my hands, body, and mind to aid in the most devastated areas. The choice became obvious to me after stressing, nearly to tears, that I was underpaid, overworked, and not living out the picture I had constructed in my mind as the perfect life. All the while, thousands and thousands of people are attempting to survive and rebuild a small resemblance of the life they remember only a month ago before the storm struck. The tremendous guilt that followed led to introspection and nearly immediate action on my part to recenter, rebalance, repaint the image of what I perceive to be a valuable existence among my fellow humans.

I will build structures, clear debris, restructure distribution lines for food and water, and offer any aid that i am capable of under the guidance of the crew leaders. The days will be very long and very rewarding.

I have set a goal of $2,000.00 that must be raised by December 19th. The funds will go directly to the travel and living costs associated with the project. Any additional funds raised will go to the All Hands Response team.

Warmly,
Parker Tulloch Bolden

story:
Missed our campaign?

If you have come here and missed our Indiegogo Campaign - you can now order directly through our website using the amazing TryCelery.com - please visit us at http://wantcardboard.com to order yours.
-----------

Why WantCardboard?

Google has handed out the plans to produce your very own Google Cardboard VR, but we quickly discovered that doing so was not going to produce the best results and buying all the components in small batches was pricey. 

I mean, who would want to order a minimum of 8 magnets when you only need one of each kind? Thats why 'WantCardboard' has decided to manufacture a batch of high quality kits and pre-builts for shipping mainly in Europe with amazing quality control assembled here in central London.  

We're using UK based suppliers that are custom cutting, manufacturing, and assumably - so no wait times from the far east. WantCardboard - Europe's Google Cardboard kit manufacturer.

Questions? if you have any B2B questions or an enquiry about your delivery or contribution please email info@wantcardboard.com or contact us via Twitter


Price and Sourcing 

After watching what unfolded as something so simple but effective, we called suppliers direct to obtain the best prices in bulk along with finding professional card suppliers, laser cutters based right here in London, magnet stockist and not forgetting the lenses.

Unlike sourcing our products from the far east, we've found sellers in the UK able to provide all the components required for our batch (and a few more) so we're not subject to expected delays for sourcing products and waiting for ships to arrive in a port. 

Because we're able to order in bulk, we're are producing the Kit for £15.00GBP with extra £1.00 for set NFC sticker inside. The pre-built service for £20.00GBP through IndieGOGO will be built solid for instant use!

All elements included are of the finest quality so you can enjoy your Google Cardboard to the max and for the longest period of time possible!


Delivery and Quality Control.

Because we've sourced materials and items from within the UK we're able to ship out for delivery our Flat Kits between the 1st and 2nd week of August 2014. 

The Pre-built Kits will be shipped between the 2nd and 3rd week of August 2014. Over-seas (outside of UK) delivery of Flat Kits will be shipped by the 1st Week August and expect a 14 day delivery time. 

Delivery Included inside UK, extra £2 for rest of world and £3.00 for pre-built kits.

We're proud to be able to produce this batch and keep a close eye on the quality of the finish with laser cuts as well as the lens clarity. We will only be shipping the best quality products, 'Made In Britain' - yes sir!

  • Our London based laser provider are able to print the batch in house with an eye for detail.

  • Lenses are custom made by an awesome and very helpful manufacturer just for this project! We're not shipping in from overseas.

    Pictured below are 2x 25mm (50mmF)  just to show you the quality of the lens end results. (We will be producing at actual optimal focus distance but want to share the image).

Lens Image - Copyright 2014 © WantCardboard.com



Whats Included

In the Flat Kits we're including the following:

  • Quality corrugated walled card, 2mm thickness, smooth outside finish.
  • 2 x 25mm, Optimal Focus Distance Lenses
  • 1 x Neodymium Magnet and 1 x Ceramic Disk Magnet
  • Strong black Velcro heat glued to cardboard
  • 2 x Strong Rubber Band(s)
  • NFC Pre-set Sticker (optional)
  • Printed instructions

Pre-built kits will be shipped pre fabricated and shipped safely in a padded box to keep your Google Cardboard pristine and solid. 


School or Company?

Using our rewards, you can purchase up to 5 in a single reward, by doing this you can supply as a logo in black and white that can be printed onto the side of your Google Cardboard Kits! This is only for rewards of 5 Google Cardboards at no extra cost. 

Here is some locations where a WantCardboard has already been purchased across Europe! (Last Updated 09/07/14 @ 15:01)
story_txt:
Missed our campaign?
If you have come here and missed our Indiegogo Campaign - you can now order directly through our website using the amazing TryCelery.com - please visit us at http://wantcardboard.com to order yours.-----------Why WantCardboard?Google has handed out the plans to produce your very own Google Cardboard VR, but we quickly discovered that doing so was not going to produce the best results and buying all the components in small batches was pricey. I mean, who would want to order a minimum of 8 magnets when you only need one of each kind? Thats why 'WantCardboard' has decided to manufacture a batch of high quality kits and pre-builts for shipping mainly in Europe with amazing quality control assembled here in central London.  We're using UK based suppliers that are custom cutting, manufacturing, and assumably - so no wait times from the far east. WantCardboard - Europe's Google Cardboard kit manufacturer.Questions? if you have any B2B questions or an enquiry about your delivery or contribution please email info@wantcardboard.com or contact us via TwitterPrice and Sourcing After watching what unfolded as something so simple but effective, we called suppliers direct to obtain the best prices in bulk along with finding professional card suppliers, laser cutters based right here in London, magnet stockist and not forgetting the lenses.Unlike sourcing our products from the far east, we've found sellers in the UK able to provide all the components required for our batch (and a few more) so we're not subject to expected delays for sourcing products and waiting for ships to arrive in a port. Because we're able to order in bulk, we're are producing the Kit for £15.00GBP with extra £1.00 for set NFC sticker inside. The pre-built service for £20.00GBP through IndieGOGO will be built solid for instant use!All elements included are of the finest quality so you can enjoy your Google Cardboard to the max and for the longest period of time possible!Delivery and Quality Control.Because we've sourced materials and items from within the UK we're able to ship out for delivery our Flat Kits between the 1st and 2nd week of August 2014. The Pre-built Kits will be shipped between the 2nd and 3rd week of August 2014. Over-seas (outside of UK) delivery of Flat Kits will be shipped by the 1st Week August and expect a 14 day delivery time. Delivery Included inside UK, extra £2 for rest of world and £3.00 for pre-built kits.We're proud to be able to produce this batch and keep a close eye on the quality of the finish with laser cuts as well as the lens clarity. We will only be shipping the best quality products, 'Made In Britain' - yes sir!
Our London based laser provider are able to print the batch in house with an eye for detail.

Lenses are custom made by an awesome and very helpful manufacturer just for this project! We're not shipping in from overseas. Pictured below are 2x 25mm (50mmF)  just to show you the quality of the lens end results. (We will be producing at actual optimal focus distance but want to share the image).

Lens Image - Copyright 2014 © WantCardboard.comWhats IncludedIn the Flat Kits we're including the following:
Quality corrugated walled card, 2mm thickness, smooth outside finish.
2 x 25mm, Optimal Focus Distance Lenses
1 x Neodymium Magnet and 1 x Ceramic Disk Magnet
Strong black Velcro heat glued to cardboard
2 x Strong Rubber Band(s)
NFC Pre-set Sticker (optional)
Printed instructions
Pre-built kits will be shipped pre fabricated and shipped safely in a padded box to keep your Google Cardboard pristine and solid. School or Company?Using our rewards, you can purchase up to 5 in a single reward, by doing this you can supply as a logo in black and white that can be printed onto the side of your Google Cardboard Kits! This is only for rewards of 5 Google Cardboards at no extra cost. Here is some locations where a WantCardboard has already been purchased across Europe! (Last Updated 09/07/14 @ 15:01)

story:
Haven is a hammock, only comfortable. It's a tent, but easy to set up and take down. We've combined the best of hammock camping and tent camping into one amazing lay.

We've raised more than $300,000 in crowdfunding globally and are now officially launching in Europe! This campaign is specifically for European orders. Click here to order outside Europe.

Our patent-pending design creates a flat and ergonomic sleeping platform, no matter how you sleep.

Every package includes the shell with detachable rainfly and mosquito netting, two lightweight poles, straps, guy lines, and an insulated air mattress.

Suspension Arcs keep the sidewalls low while supporting the flat sleeping platform. Think suspension bridge! 

  • Unobstructed views
  • Easy in and out
  • Lay flat as a pancake

Internal Spreader Bars keep the interior space open.

  • No pressure on sides

The Air Mattress with horizontal tubing creates a soft spacious sleeping platform.

  • More wiggle room
  • Insulation

The Structural Ridgeline means you lay flat regardless of tree spacing.

  • Stability
  • A place to hang your gear 

Along with the tent body, the air mattress has been meticulously designed. 198x59x9cm (23”x78”x3”) An estimated R4 insulation keeps you warm, and the easy pump bag will save your lungs!

New to hammock camping? All overnight hammocks require an air mattress or underquilt for insulation.  A comparable air mattress costs +90€

Does the forecast call for rain? Or just heading to the park? Be prepared with the whole system wherever you go, or trim it down further to reduce weight. Rainfly .34 kg (12 oz) Bug Net  .17 kg (5 oz) 

 

Do you need a hammock, bug net, rainfly, camp shelter, playground, or bivy?

No trees? No problem... Haven makes a great bivy. Trekking poles not included.

The Haven Tent with Insulated Pad will retail for 299€. By placing your pre-order here on IndieGoGo, you can get the entire package (tent, pad, straps, rainfly, guy-lines, and stakes) for 262€ with free shipping. That's 37€ in savings!

Or share this project with a friend and save even more by buying two.

Our tents have been available in the US for the past 5 months and we have been overwhelmed with support from Europe. Amazing people, willing to pay high shipping costs and import duties, to try our platform. 

July Delivery. We have already started production on the tents going to Europe. All we need is your shipping info... oh, and money! 

We expect to have all tents delivered by July. Although there is always uncertainty doing something for the first time, and global conditions have made it harder than ever to project timelines. July is our expectation, but it could be August.

By supporting this project you are bringing Haven to new heights in new places. Thank you, danke, tak, merci, gracias!

The Haven Tent was created by Derek Tillotson. He lives with his family in Sandy, Utah but loves traveling in Europe. With his young family, Derek has visited +20 countries in Europe.  

Derek has a background in sales and marketing and has been supported by amazing prototypers and manufacturers over the development of the Haven Tent.

The Haven shell and rainfly constructed with High Tensile 70D Rip-Stop Polyester PU Coated. The air mattress is made with 40D Diamond Rip-Stop Nylon. 3000 HH rating on hammock body, and rainfly.

Weight capacity 127 kg (280 lbs) and pad length 198 cm (6'6")

story:
MISS THE CAMPAIGN?

ORDER AT TORCHAPPAREL.COM

FOR IMMEDIATE SHIPPING!




Durable

Following the heritage of the T1, the T2 is the latest in cycling tech for urban commuters. It not only includes 10 integrated LED lights, but two rechargeable batteries offering up to 36 hours of continued use in a weather resistant design for safe riding in any type of weather, day or night!


Safe


The T2 helmet is fully CPSC and CE certified. We will also be using the funds of this campaign to test for the AS/NZS standards so that it will become available to the Australian market in 2015.

The T2 lighting system is protected by shatter-proof polycarbonate lenses. The lenses not only protect the LED lights from damage, but act as a diffuser making the rider just as visible from the side as the front or rear. The lenses also happen to be an integral part of the impact structure of the helmet's front and rear.

Rechargeable

Using the included USB cable, the front and rear battery can be charged simultaneously. A red indicator light will indicate the batteries are charging and will turn off once they have been fully charged in about 1.5 hours.

 


More Choices



Keeping the original four colors of the T1, we have added four new colors so you can find the right one to fit your look.

With a newly molded shell and improved dial-adjuster fit system we are able to offer the helmet as a single size that fits 54-61cm. The T2 will come with two sets of interior pads of different thicknesses for added adjustability.

Improved Quality

With upgraded tooling and machinery, we are able to offer a more precisely cut shell that improves the overall look of the helmet along with a new and lighter dial-adjust fit system for a more comfortable fit. 



Specifications

  • In-mold construction
  • 10 integrated LED lights
  • Rechargeable batteries (1.5 hrs with included USB cable)
  • 4 different light functions including two flash options
  • Up to 6 hours battery life on steady or 36 hours on flash 
  • Shatter proof polycarbonate lenses
  • 13 oz. weight / 370 g
  • 8 air vents, interior air channeling 
  • Upgraded and lighter dial-adjust fit system
  • 2 sets of removable interior mesh pads included


What Your Contribution Means

As a small company Torch has worked hard to change the way the industry views safety apparel over the past three years. We have accomplished so much in this time by listening to our fellow cyclists and backers in order to improve our product's  performance and quality, but we still need your help. By upgrading to a higher quality and more advanced manufacturer, we are required to place a much larger order and this is why we are asking for your help. The funds raised will go to starting production immediately. 
As you can see below, our tooling is already completed and we have approved production samples from our suppliers for the electronics, helmet and packaging. We are ready to begin production and delivering orders as soon as possible. 



Press

Torch has received amazing reviews from the industry over the T1 and we expect that the T2 will exceed all expectations! Here are some examples to what people are saying about Torch recently.



New York Times

London Evening Standard

Fast Company Magazine

The Washington Post

FAQ

- What makes the T2 different from the T1? - The T2 has been completely                 re-engineered and retooled to create a more precisely trimmed outer shell, a more flexible dial-adjuster and a much more durable lighting system with battery life that far surpasses many lights. We've also added a battery level indicator so you'll know how much battery life remains each time you turn the lights off.
- Is the helmet crash certified? - Yes. The T1 and T2 are CPSC and CE certified and will become AS/NZS certified once funding has completed. This makes the helmet safe for use in North America and South America, Europe, and soon to be ready for Australia and New Zealand. 
- Are the lights bright enough to light my path? - No. The lights of the T1 and T2 are meant to make the rider visible to motor traffic, not to light the road way. The lights are visible from all angles and large enough to draw attention to the rider in order to prevent collisions with motorists. The lights are however, bright enough to light reflective signs, a map or be useful when changing a flat tire in the dark. 
- Can the front and rear lights work on different modes at the same time? - Yes.The front and rear lights work on separate buttons and batteries allowing the user to operate each light independently of the other. This means you can run the front lights on steady and the back lights on flash if that's your choice.
